1b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa//
1b2('bum): dum bu bcu pa/ bam po dang po/ ke'u shi ka kA
1b3('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
1b4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyind pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
1b5('bum): tu phyind pa sa rlom sems su myi byed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa
1b6('bum): la rlom sems su myi byed na/ dkyilam rlom sems su m+b+ha byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems
1b7('bum): su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlob sems su myi byed do// de sgyum rlom sems su myi byed
1b8('bum): sgyums rlom sems su myi byed/ sbrum la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smig rgya rlom da
2a1('bum): sems su myi byed smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed do// de smra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis
2a2('bum): sems su myi byed smra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor kyong sems su myi byed/ myig yer la rlom sems su myi byed do//
2a3('bum): de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
2a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'itshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rlom sems su myi byed tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas rlom sems su myi byed
2a5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi/ lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sas
2a6('bum): su myi byed do// de smra ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom
2a7('bum): sems su myi byed smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do//
2a8('bum): de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sas
2b1('bum): su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
2b2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa rlom sems su myi byed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas rlom sems su myi byed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de myi
2b3('bum): lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed
2b4('bum): sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom se/ mas su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smra brnyan rlom
2b5('bum): sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis
2b6('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed do//
2b7('bum): ke'u shi ka galar te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyind pa rlom sems su myi byed/ brtson
2b8('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas rlom sems su myi byed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su myi byed na dkyil sa rlom sems su myi byed rmyi lam gyis rlom
3a1('bum): mams su kyi byed skyes pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ de snyam rlom sems su kyi byed/ sgyus sa rnam sems su myi byed/ snum la rlom sems su kyi byed do/
3a2('bum): de sbyin napa mam pa mi rnyed skyeg rgyas rlom sems su mi byed/ phyig sbrul rlom sems su myi byed do// de sna brnyan rlom sems su kyi byed sku brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed
3a3('bum): sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ dmyig yor rlom sems su myi byed myig yod kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig sor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprulang pa rlom sems su myi
3a4('bum): byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka ga la te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
3a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshebasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa rlom sems su myi byed bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pas rlom sems su myi byed
3a6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rlom sems su myi byed na de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smra ma
3a7('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom seMs
3a8('bum): su myi byed do// de smra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ smra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// dmyig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis
3b1('bum): rlom sems su myi byed myig sor la rlom sems su myi byed do// re sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do
3b2('bum): ke'u shi ka kal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa rlos sems su myi byed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
3b3('bum): phyi na pas rlom sems su myi byed/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de myis ma rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi la ma la rlos
3b4('bum): sems su myi byed do// de smra ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyum la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed
3b5('bum): smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom se mas su myi byed do// de smra brnyan rlomo sems su myi byed sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la
3b6('bum): rlom sems su myi byed do// de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul
3b7('bum): pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
3b8('bum): nang stong pa nyid rlom sems su myi byed nang stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems
4a1('bum): su myi byed/ rmyil ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sbrum rlom sems su myi byed/ sbrums rlom sems su myi byed/ smras la rlob sems su mi byed do// de myig tu rlob
4a2('bum): sems su myi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smig rgyal rlom sems su myi byed do// de sna brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlob sems su myi byed sgra brnyan sa rlob sems
4a3('bum): su myi byed do/ de byig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myin yor kyis rlob sems su mi byed/ myig sor la rlos sems su myi byed do/ de stsal pa rlom sems su myi byed/ smras pas rlom
4a4('bum): sems su myi byed smras pa la rlos sems su sbyi / ke shi ka ka kyai byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa dzin po gis rab kyi pha rol dadu rtsed po ma myong ba'i/

4b1('bum): myi byed sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi nang stong pa nyid rlom sems
4b2('bum): su myi byed/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems
4b3('bum): su myi byed do// de sgyum rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ sbyig
4b4('bum): rgyus rlom sems su myi byed do// de smra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ smra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// de myig sor rlom
4b5('bum): sems su myi byed/ myig yod kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul dpa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems
4b6('bum): su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'istong pa nyid tong pa
4b7('bum): nyid rlom sems su myi byedastong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma rlob sems su myi byed / dmyis sa rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyims kyis rlom mos
4b8('bum): su myi byed/ rmyil ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyum rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyums rlom sems su myi byed/ smra ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de skyig su rlom sems su myi byed
5a1('bum): smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi
5a2('bum): byed do// de myig sor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed/ de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi
5a3('bum): byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chen po stong pa nyid
5a4('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ chen po stong pa nyid la rlob sem sa su myi byed na/ de rmyil ma rlom sems su myi byed/
5a5('bum): rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi
5a6('bum): byed do// de smig tu rlom sems su myi byed smyig rgyas rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyul rlom sems su myi byed do// de sla brnyan rlo ma sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlob sems su
5a7('bum): brta pa rnaMm sems su ma byed / tsug pa rnam ma kyi sa ma pa kyi da so ma kyi sa / das
5a8('bum): bgyi byed/ sprulang bas rlos sems su mi byed/ stsal pa sa rlos sems su mi byed do// ke shig ga ge byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa / gsarab kyi ros byed/
5b1('bum): pas spyor pa'i tshe don dam pa stong pa nyid rlom sems su myi byed/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis rlos sems su myi byed/ do ngam pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems su myi byed na/ dkyil ma rlom sems
5b2('bum): su myi byed/ rmyi lam kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myi la ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smra ma rlom sems su myi byed/ smra mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sbru ma la rlom sems su myi byed do//
5b3('bum): de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyas rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyul rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan pa
5b4('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ de myig sor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myin sor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sas
5b5('bum): su kyi byed/ sprul dra pas rlos sems su myi byed sprul pas rlos sems su myi byed ro ken kakal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
5b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid rlom sems su myi byed/ 'dus rgyab nga nyid kyim chos sems su mi byed/ 'dus rgyas song pa nyid marlos sems su kyi
5b7('bum): byedan/ de kyil marlom sems su su byed/ rmyilas kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ skyes sa sa rlos sems su myi myed do// de sbrul rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed
5b8('bum): snam pa rlo sems su myi byed / phyis rgyu po sems su kyi byed/ byig rgyas rlom sems su myi byed/ byig sul rlob sems su myi byed do/ den pa rlom semams kyi byed
6a1('bum): rlos su myi byed smra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed/ de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi
6a2('bum): byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
6a3('bum): pa'i tshe/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rlom sems su myi byed/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su
6a4('bum): myi byed/ rmyi las kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyil/ ma la rlom sems su myi byed// de spya ma rlom sems su myi/ byed/ smra mas rlom sems su myi byed/ smra ma la rlom
6a5('bum): sems su myi byed do// de smyig sgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ smra brnyan
6a6('bum): kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// dmyig sor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig sor kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smral
6a7('bum): brlom sems su myi byed/ skal dpas rlos sems su myi byed/ snad pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke ni klakas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen // rnam kyi
6a8('bum): rom bye pa sa gyud pa 'i/ mamamasapa 'das pa stongs nyid rlos sems su myi byed/ sob mam 'dam ma kyang sa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mtha'asas 'das pa stong pa nyid cwo
6b1('bum): sems su myi byed na/ demyi la ma rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyis ma sa rlob sems su myi byed do// de smra ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyums rlom sems su kyi
6b2('bum): byed/ ma sa rlos sems su myi byed do// de smrig turlos sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyas rlos sems su myi byed/ smig rgyal rlom sems su myi byed do/ de zla brgya rlom sems su myi byed/
6b3('bum): smra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sna brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// dbyig yong rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do/
6b4('bum): de sprul dpa rlom sems su kyi byed/ sprulgang pas rlom so mas su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed do dke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
6b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold du phyind pa la spyod pa'ithog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rlom sems su myi byed/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis rlob sems su myi byed
6b6('bum): thog pa dang bu ma byed pa stong pa nyid la rlos sems su myi byed na/ dkyims rlob semasmras mi byed/ rmyilas kyis rnam sems su myi byed/ byis sa sa rlom sems su myi byed do// de smram ma
6b7('bum): mas su kyi byed/ snyam sa rlos sems su myi byed/ sbrus sa rlom sems pa kyi hUMd / de lbos rgyu sa thams su rnab pas sakyig thus kyi
6b8('bum): bkyi bya'o// des brjid rnamasams su su byeng/ sna brgyan gyi rlomasas sa su myi byed bci sa tham sa phyog sa rnam sas subyin
7a1('bum): gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do//
7a2('bum): ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dor ba myed pa tong pa nyid rlom sems su myi byed/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems
7a3('bum): su myi byed/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems su myi byed na de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyu ma
7a4('bum): rlom sems su myi byed sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig
7a5('bum): rgyal rlom sems su myi byed do// de smra ba rnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// de myig yor rlom
7a6('bum): sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprus pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la
7a7('bum): rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gsad te byang chub sems dpa' sem pa 'dzin po zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid rlos sems su myi byed/ rang bzhin
7a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis rlos sems su myi byed rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rlom sems su myi byed na/ dekyil sa rlom sems su myi byed/ rmis ma gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyim ma la rlom pos
7b1('bum): su myi byed do// de smras rlom sems su myi byed/ sbrums rlom sems su myi byed/ smra ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de steg su rlos sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyas rlos sems su myi byed/ sbyin/
7b2('bum): rgyas rlos sems su myi byed // de ska brnyad rlom sems su myi byed/ smra brgyad kyis rlo'i sems su myi byed sna brnyan la rlob sems su myi byed do// dmyig pa'i rlos sems su myi byed/ myig sor
7b3('bum): gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smras pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprusad pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do//
7b4('bum): ke'u shi ka kasad te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na po zhes rab kyi pha rosad tu phyid pas myong ba'i thams cad stong ba nyid rlom sems su myi byed chos thams cad
7b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su myi byed chong pa nyid sa rlob sems su mi bye ma/ dkyis rdo/ sems su myi byed/ rmyil ma gyis rlom sems su myi byed/
7b6('bum): myis ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyums rlom sems su myi byed/ smram la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom
7b7('bum): sems su myi byed smig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// de myig yor rlom
7b8('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ myig 'ayor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul
8a1('bum): rlob sems su myi byed do// ke gags te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che / shes rab kyi pha ro sa tu byin pas myod pa'i ma #
8a2('bum): nyid kyis rlom sems su myi byed rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems su myi byed na/ demyil ma rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi la ma la rlos sems su myi byed de
8a3('bum): de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyums rlom sems su myi byed/ smra sa la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems
8a4('bum): myi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ smra brnyan la rlom se mas su myi byed do// de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/
8a5('bum): myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smras pa rlob sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa
8a6('bum): la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rlom sems su myi
8a7('bum): byed/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de myi ma rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed
8a8('bum): rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom
8b1('bum): sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// de myig yor rlom
8b2('bum): sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlo
8b3('bum): sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rlom sems su myi byed
8b4('bum): dam po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis chos sems su myi byed/ dngos po skyed pa stong pa nyid ma rlos sems su myi byed nga/ dkyil ma rlom sems su myi byed/ skyes ma kyis rlo
8b5('bum): sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ snams rlom sems su myi byed/ sbrum la rlom sems su myi byed ngo // de smyig
8b6('bum): rlom sems su myi byed kyi d+hAs rlos sems pa myi byed tus rlos sems pa myi byed du dasgra brnya rlomasems sa kyi da ma mo'i mams mi byed/ ska
8b7('bum): po rlos sems su kyi byed do// dbyi rlom sems su myi byed/ myig ming kyi rlom sas mi byed/ phyin por la rdzob sa kyi rnyed / sa bathos pam sas kyi rnang/
8b8('bum): xxx
8'a1('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
8'a2('bum): la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshengo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtsom par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi sbyor myi 'byed de gang gi
8'a3('bum): tshe dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi
8'a4('bum): tshe dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtson par byed do// yang da ka bar spong ba rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byod de/ gang gi tshe yang da/
8'a5('bum): pa ra spang ba rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa'i legasang dag par spro nga ba rnams la brtson par byed do/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa na mas la myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ gang gi tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
8'a6('bum): pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la batshon par byed do// dbang po rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe dbong po rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa'i de'i tshe
8'a7('bum): dbang po rnams la brtson par byed do// stobs rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de gang gi tshe stobs rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i che stobs rnams la kha tshom par byed do/ gang ga cha stalas rnams la cas
8'a8('bum): bar byad po byang chub kyis na la ka rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe byang chub kyi yan laka rnams la myo sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brtson par byed do/ 'phags
8'b1('bum): ba'i las yan lag brgyad pa la gyi snor myi 'byed de/ gang gi ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sa ste sbyor myi 'byed pag/ de'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas btsun par byed do//
8'b2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mye sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshi 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bathon par byed do// bsam gtan rnams la myi sbyor
8'b3('bum): myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe bsam gtam rnams sa myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe bsam gtan rnams la bcom par byed do// chad byed pa rnams sa kyi sbyor gyi 'byed de/ gang gi ye tshad byed pa rnams la myi sbyor/
8'b4('bum): myi 'byed pa de'i tshe tshad myed pa rnams la brtson par byed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'phyo dngo/ gang gi tshe gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam
8'b5('bum): la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe gzugs myed pa'i snyoms para'adug pa rnams la brtson par byed do// rnam par tha rang pa pargyad la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rnam par tha rad pa brgyad
8'b6('bum): la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la brtson par byed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dku ma myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
8'b7('bum): 'jug pa dgus myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bcom par byed do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smo nang pa myed pa
8'b8('bum): la mye sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa sa myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshernam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
9a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid rlom sems su myi byed/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam/ rlom sems su myi byed
9a2('bum): skyil sa gyis rlom sems su myi byed rmyil ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smram rlob sems su myi byed/ smrams rlom sems su myi byed/ sbrum la rlom sems su myi byed do// de spris rgyu rlo
9a3('bum): sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgya la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom ses
9a4('bum): su myi byed do// de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul
9a5('bum): pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
9a6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rlom sems su myi byed/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems
9a7('bum): su myi byed ra// de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyum rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed
9a8('bum): sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sma brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ smal
9b1('bum): brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed sgra brnyam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de myig sor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul
9b2('bum): pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul dpas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlob sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
9b3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rlom sems su myi byed/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa na gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam
9b4('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyu ma rlo ma sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed
9b5('bum): sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sem su myi byed/ smug rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed// de smra brnyan rlom sems su
9b6('bum): myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// dmyig sor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su
9b7('bum): myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
9b8('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba rnams rlom sems su myi byed/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
10a1('bum): ma rlom sems su myi byed da/ demyil ma rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyim sa kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi la ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smra ma rlom sems su myi byed/
10a2('bum): sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyum la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smig rgyul rlom sems su mya byed do// de smra brnyan rlos
10a3('bum): sems su myi byed/ smra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ smra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// dmyig sor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor
10a4('bum): la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su/ myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka ka la
10a5('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rlom sems su myi byed/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis
10a6('bum): rlom sems su myi byed rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi la ma rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyu
10a7('bum): ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma sa rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed
10a8('bum): de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/
10b1('bum): myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' ses
10b2('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po rnams rlom sems su myi byed/ dbang po rnams kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ dbang po rnams la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam
10b3('bum): sems su myi byed/ myi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi la ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smra ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyums rlom sems su myi byed/ sbru ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sbyin
10b4('bum): rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan
10b5('bum): rlom sems su myi byed// de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom mas su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed
10b6('bum): sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mya byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs
10b7('bum): rnams rlom sems su myi byed/ hobs rnams kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ stobs rnams la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam
10b8('bum): la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi
11a1('bum): byed smyig rgyul rlom sems su myi byed do// de smra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// de myig yor rlom sems su myi
11a2('bum): byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do//
11a3('bum): ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rlom sems su myi byed/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis rlom ses
11a4('bum): su myi byed/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rlom sems su myi byed na/ dekyil ma rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyilam kyi sa rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi la ma la rlom sems su kyi
11a5('bum): byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems
11a6('bum): su myi byed/ smyig rgyul rlom sems su myi byed do// de smra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan kyis rlob sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// de myig yor rlom sems su
11a7('bum): myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig sor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul ba rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su
11a8('bum): myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rlob sems su myi byed
11b1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas rlom sems su myi byed/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi
11b2('bum): byed/ rmyi la ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smras rlom sems su myi byed/ sbrums rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig gyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyas rlom
11b3('bum): sems su myi byed/ smig rgyal rlom sems su myi byed do// de sna brnyaran rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sla brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// dmyig yor rlom sems
11b4('bum): su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig/ rgyu yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa
11b5('bum): la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pas spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nas
11b6('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ 'phags pa'i bder pa rnams sa rlom sems su myi byed na/ de kyis ma rlob sems su myi byed/ rmyims kyis rlo
11b7('bum): sems su kyi rje/ rmyisam sa rlos sems su kyi byed do// de smras rlos sems su myi byed/ rnams rlom sems sa myi byed/ rnas pa rlom sems su kyi byed do// de smig tu rlom sems su myi byed/
11b8('bum): khyis rgyas rlom sems su myi byed/ skyig rgyal rlom sems sa myi byed do// de ska brnyar rlos sems su myi byed/ sna brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ zla brgya sa rlos semams kyi bya / gyin
12a1('bum): sor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/
12a2('bum): sprus pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shig gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha sad tu phyir gas myong pa'i tshe/ gamam gtan nam sal sas su byang/ bamam
12a3('bum): gtan rnams rlom sems su myi byed/ bsam gtan rnams kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ bsam gtan rnams la rlom sems su myi byed na/ demyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam kyis rlom sems su gyi
12a4('bum): byed/ rmyil sa la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smram ro ma sems su myi byed/ sgyums rlom sems su myi byed/ smra ma sa rlom sems su myi byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sems
12a5('bum): su myi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ smra brnyan
12a6('bum): la rlom sems su myi byed do// de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul
12a7('bum): pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la myod pa'i tshe/ tshang myeng
12a8('bum): pa rnams rlom sems su myi byed/ tshad myed pa rnams kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ tshad byed pa rnams la rlom sems su myi byed na de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su
12b1('bum): myi byed/ rmyi la ma la rlob sems su myi byed do// de smra ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyums rlom sems su myi byed/ smram la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyug tu
12b2('bum): rlab sems su mya byad/ smig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyul rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ smra brnyan la
12b3('bum): rlos sems su myi byed do// dmyig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlob sems su myi byed/ myig yor sa rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul
12b4('bum): pas rlos sems su myi byed/ sprul pa sa rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gas te byang chub sems da 'asems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha ro sang du phyir
12b5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rlom sems su myi byed/ gzugs myed pa'i snyo mas par 'jug pa rnams kyis rlom sems su myi byed
12b6('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de myi la ma rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi la ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smras
12b7('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyul rlom sems
12b8('bum): su myi byed do// de smra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sA bernyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// dmyig sor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems
13a1('bum): su myi byed/ myig sor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprumad pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/
13a2('bum): ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe rnam par ba rad pa brgyad rlom sems su myi byed/ rnam par tha rang pa brgyad kyis rlom sems
13a3('bum): su myi byed rnam par thard pa brgyad la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ myi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi
13a4('bum): byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sbru ma la rlom se mas su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ spyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi
13a5('bum): byed do// de smra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyi sa rlom sems su myi byed/ sma brnyan la rlom sems su myi byer de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sos
13a6('bum): su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprus pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprulang ba la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sem
13a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rlol sems su myi byed/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus
13a8('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rlom sems su myi byed na/ dmyilam rlom sems su myi byed/ myi la ma gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom
13b1('bum): sems su myi byed do// de sbrum rlom sems su myi byed/ rnams rlom sems su myi byed/ smra ma sa rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu slo sems su myi byed/ sbyin
13b2('bum): rgyal rlob sems su myi byed do// de na brgyadang rlom sems su myi byed/ rna brgyad kyis rlob sems su myi byed/ sba brnyanas rlom sems su myi byed do// dbyin mar chum sems su myi byed/ myig yod kyi
13b3('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ myig sor la rlob sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ smras dpas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprusang pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// kes zhig
13b4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong pa'i rnam par thard/ pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon
13b5('bum): pa myed pa rlom sems su myi byed/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo ste/ nga pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas rlom sems su myi byed/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa
13b6('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smra
13b7('bum): ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su
13b8('bum): myi byed do// de smra ba rnyam rlom sems su myi byed/ smra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// de myig sor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems
14a1('bum): sa kyi byed byig sor la rlob sems su myi byed do// de smrasad pa rlos sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su kyi bye su ma ke'u shi ka kal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
14a2('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams rlom sems su myi byed/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ mngon par shes pa rnams
14a3('bum): sa rlom sems sa myi byed du/ de kyis ma rlom sems bu myi byed/ rmyilas kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ gyis ma ma rlom sems su myi byed do// de l+h+wam rlom sems su kyi byed/ zhum pa rlom mo
14a4('bum): su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de spyin/ rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyul rlom semasu myi byed do// de smra brnyan
14a5('bum): rlom sems su myi byed sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems
14a6('bum): su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ spruld pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprulang pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te
14a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin rnams rlom sems su myi byed/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis rlom sems su myi byed
14a8('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed
14b1('bum): sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom
14b2('bum): sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom
14b3('bum): sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprulang pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sos
14b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod/ ba'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams rlom sems su myi byed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ gzungs
14b5('bum): kyi sgo rnams la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom se mas su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sos
14b6('bum): su myi byed/ sgyums rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyum la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do//
14b7('bum): de smra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed smra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sma brnyam sa rlom sems su myi byed do// dbyig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed
14b8('bum): phyag yar sa rlos sems su myi byed do// de sprul dpa rlol sems su myi byed/ sprus dpas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlob sems su myi byed do// ke'u zhig gal te byang chub sems
15a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas spyod pa'i rtse/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rlom sems su myi byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus rlob
15a2('bum): sems su myi byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyil ma rlom sems su myi byed/ skyil sa kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myi la ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/
15a3('bum): desmras rlom sems su kyi byed/ smrasas rlom semams kyi byed/ smras sa rlom sems sa kyi byud ngo // de pyig tu rlos sem sa kyi byed TIg rgyum rnam sems su sa byed/ phyig sus rlom ses
15a4('bum): su myi byed do// de smra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ smra brnya/ na gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ smra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/
15a5('bum): myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom seMs
15a6('bum): su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi rlom sems su myi byed/ myi 'jigs pa bzhis
15a7('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ kyi 'jigs pa bzhi la rloms su myi byed na/ de myis ma rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi las kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myis ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyum rlom
15a8('bum): sems su myi byed/ sbrums rlom sems su myi byed/ sbrum la rlos sems su myi byed do// de smig tshu rlos sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smig sbrus rlom sems su myi byed do//
15b1('bum): de swA ban mos sems su kyi byed/ smra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ snabarnyan sa rlob sems su myi byed do// dmyig sar rlob sems su myi byed/ sbyin sor khyim rlob sems su myi byed/ myig yoms
15b2('bum): rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprus pa rlom sems su myi byed/ spruld pas rlob sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shika gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
15b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rlom sems su myi byed/ soso yang dag par rig pa bzhis rlom sems su myi byed/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la rlom sem
15b4('bum): su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyi sa rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed de smra ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi
15b5('bum): byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smra brnyan rlom sos
15b6('bum): su myi byed/ smra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// dmyig sor rlom sems su myi byed/ phyig sor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems
15b7('bum): su myi byed do// de smras pa rlom sems su sti byed/ sprul dpas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlo ba sems su myi byed do// ke'u shika gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
15b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sa spyod pa'i tshe byams pa chen po rlom sems su myi byed/ byams pa chen pos rlom sems su myi byed/ byams pa chen po la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de myi la ma rlom
16a1('bum): sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sbrum rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la
16a2('bum): rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed
16a3('bum): sna brgyad la rlom sems su myi byed do// dmyig sor rlom sems su myo byong/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yongs rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul
16a4('bum): pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod
16a5('bum): pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po rlom sems su myi byed/ snying rje chen pos rlom sems su myi byed/ snying rje chen po la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed
16a6('bum): rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom
16a7('bum): sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyul rlom sems su myi byed do// de smra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems
16a8('bum): su myi byed do// de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yir gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su
16b1('bum): myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyan
16b2('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la rlom sems su myi byedan/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/
16b3('bum): rmyi las kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyis ma sa rlos sems su myi byed do// de smram rlom sems su myi byed/ sbrums rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyum la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sbyin/ rlom sems
16b4('bum): su myi byed/ smyig rgyas rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig/ rgyal rlom sems su mi byed do// de smra ba rnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ smra brnyad kyis rlob sems su myi byed/
16b5('bum): smra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// de myig sor rnam sems su myi byed/ myig sor gyis rlom sems su myi rkye phyog yoms rlom sems su myi byed do/ de smramad pa rlom
16b6('bum): sems su myi byed/ sprus dpas rlom sems su myi byed/ skusna pa la rlos sems su myi bye // keT shi ga kas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
16b7('bum): byin pa la spyod pa'ithams pa shes pa nyid sa sems sa myi byed/ sas dgas pa nyid kyis chos semasas kyi byed/ mas dgas pa nyid ma rlos sems su mi byed du/ dekyis
16b8('bum): semam sa kyi byed/ kyil sa kyis rlos sems su myi byed/ skyes pa sa rlom sems sa myi byed do// dbus rnam thamams kyi byed/ ma pa rlom semam sa ca sum mi rlom semam su
17a1('bum): dkyis rgya rlos sems sa kyi byed/ sbyin rgyam rlos sems su kyi byed/ smig rgyul rlom sems su myi byed do/ de smra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed sla brnyad kyis rlom sems su myi byed
17a2('bum): ska brtad ma rlom sems su myi byed do/ dbyis sor rlom sems su myi byed/ phyin yod kyis rlom sems su mi byed byig song la rlos sems su myi byed de/ de sprul dpa rlos sems su myi byed
17a3('bum): ma pas rlom sems bu skye byed sprus pa la rlos sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa sa spyod pa'i rje
17a4('bum): lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rlom sems su myi byed la kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ lam/ kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de myi
17a5('bum): lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smra ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ smram
17a6('bum): la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan kyis
17a7('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// de myig sor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed/ de sprul da pa rlom
17a8('bum): sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
17b1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rlom sems su myi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rlom sems su myi
17b2('bum): byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi la ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/
17b3('bum): la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom
17b4('bum): sems su myi byed/ smra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed// do myig sor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do//
17b5('bum): de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed sprul pas rlom saM mas su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do//
17b6('bum): sa ras kyi pha ro sa du byi nang pa stong bkru ts+tsha / bam po gnyis pa// denas sangs rgyas kyi mthus grong gsum gyi grong chen po'i 'dzi
17b7('bum): xxx
18a1('bum): dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang tshangs chen gyi lha dang sdang ba'i lha dang / chung snad kyi lha dang
18a2('bum): tshad myed snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang / chung dge'i lha dang / tshad myed dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i lha dang / tshad myed che ba'i
18a3('bum): sgra dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / myi che ba'i lha dang / myi gdung ba'i lha dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha dang / 'og myin gyi lha gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag zas
18a4('bum): cad kyis lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos
18a5('bum): phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sna'i dbang po brgya byin dang / kyi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang / dge
18a6('bum): rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthus / shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa mtshan 'di
18b1('bum): dag nyid mnga' ba dge slong rab 'byor da ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po
18b2('bum): brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos stond pa mtshan 'di dag nyid
18b3('bum): mnga' ba dge' slong rab 'byor da ces bya ba sha zhag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya
18b4('bum): byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis/ chos stond/
18b5('bum): pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge' slong rab 'byor da ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i le'u 'di nyid
18b6('bum): shu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byind kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis
19a1('bum): chos nyond pa dang / mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba dge slong rab 'byor da ces bya ba sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab ma 'di nyid dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin rdzi e bu 'di nyid shu ba dang de na ska
19a2('bum): dbang po brgya byin gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston/
19a3('bum): mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba dge slong rab 'byor de ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /
19a4('bum): de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dI ba sems la sA pa bar gyur to// shar spro'i phyogs mtshams kyi sang
19a5('bum): rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos nyond pa man 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo
19a6('bum): 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rosad du phyind pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / den gA'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i se'u 'di nyid shu zhing yongs su dri ba semasas sngang
19a7('bum): bar gyur to/ sonub kyi phyogs satshams kyi sangs rgyas myong mi kye 'di dag nyid kyis chos son dpa/ mtshan 'didag nyid madra' la/ dge slong rab 'byor kyi ma zla bag sdug ga/
19a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha 'o sa na phyinang pa thas ma 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa'i le'u 'di nyid chu ba dang / den lha'i dbang po pa rgya byid dkyis sarabakyi sa ros tu byed
19b1('bum): nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos stonang pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong
19b2('bum): rab 'byor ces bya ba sha cag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa sab po 'di nyid da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / der lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
19b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinadang pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur roto/ 'og gi phyogs kyi sa ng+yas rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba
19b4('bum): dge slong rab 'byor de ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na smra
19b5('bum): dbang po brgya byind kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su drib sems la snang bar gyu rang to// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge
19b6('bum): 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor da ces bya ba sha hag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
19b7('bum): tu phyind pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na spu'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la sdang bar gyur to// denas bcom
19b8('bum): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du/ bla na myed pa yang dang /
20a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro// gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di la re
20a2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag kyang / sa phyogs 'di nyid du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab
20a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dang / rtags gang dang / mtshan ma gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
20a4('bum): chen po byams pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid nyond cing 'chad par 'gyur/ de skad ces
20a5('bum): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'di la rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byas
20a6('bum): pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am
20a7('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// gzugs bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// gzugs sdug ces bya ba'am/ myi sdug
20a8('bum): ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// gzugs zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// gzugs bcings shes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos stond par
20b1('bum): myi 'gyur ro// gzugs 'das shes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// gzugs ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar chos ston pa myi 'gyur ro// gzugs da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro//
20b2('bum): tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro// tshor ba bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/
20b3('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// tshor ba sdug ces bya ba'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos
20b4('bum): stond par myi 'gyur ro// tshor ba bcings shes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// tshor ba 'angs shes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// tshor ba ma
20b5('bum): 'ongs shes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// tshor ba da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// 'du shes rtag ces bya ba'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar chos
20b6('bum): stond par myi 'gyur ro// 'du shes bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// 'du shes bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur/
20b7('bum): 'du shes sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// 'du shes zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// 'du shes bcings shes bya ba
20b8('bum): 'am grol zhes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// 'du shes 'das shes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// 'du shes ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// 'du shes da ltar
21a1('bum): byung zhes bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// 'du byed rtag ces bya ba'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// 'du byed bde zhes bya ba'am
21a2('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// 'du byed bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// 'du byed sdug ces bya ba'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos stom
21a3('bum): 'du byed zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// 'du byed bcings shes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// 'du byed 'das zhes bya bar chos
21a4('bum): stond par myi 'gyur ro// 'du byed ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos/ stonang par myi 'gyur ro// 'du byed da ltar byung zhes bya bar/ chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa
21a5('bum): rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// rnam
21a6('bum): par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes
21a7('bum): pa zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// rnam pa shes pa 'das
21a8('bum): shes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro/
21b1('bum): myig rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// myig bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// myig bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag
21b2('bum): myed ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// myig sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// myig zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// myig
21b3('bum): bcings shes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// myig 'das shes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// myig ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// myig da ltar byung zhes
21b4('bum): bya ba bachos ston par myi 'gyur ro// na ba rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro// na pa bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos
21b5('bum): par myi 'gyur ro// rna ba bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// rna ba sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// rnam
21b6('bum): zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// rna ba bcings shes bya ba 'am gros zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro// rna ba 'das shes bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyuraro
21b7('bum): rnam ma 'angs shes bya bar chom gdang par gyi 'gyur ro/ nab d+mas zung zhes bya ba tsas kyid par gyi 'byung // swAd+ha gces bya ba 'am myi byab ros po dang par kyi
21b8('bum): bla mde zhes bya ba 'am phrag bsngal zhes bya bar chom sto dang par myi 'gyur ro/ sna bdag ces bya ba'am bdig byed pas bya bar gyim stodang par myi 'gyur ro// drugacas bya bam kyi snyun
22a1('bum): chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// sna zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// sna bcings shes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// sna 'das/
22a2('bum): shes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// snam 'ongs shes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// sna da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// lce rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces
22a3('bum): bya bar chos stond par 'gyur ro// lce bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// lce bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// lcel
22a4('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos nyo nad par myi 'gyur ro// lce zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos so/ nad par myi 'gyur ro// lce bcings shes bya ba'am grol
22a5('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro// lce 'das shes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// lce ma 'ongs pazhes bya bar chos stond par 'gyur ro// lce da ltar byung zhes bya
22a6('bum): bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// lus rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos gonang par myi 'gyur ro// lus bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos nyonang par myi 'gyur ro//
22a7('bum): yum bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro// lus sdug ces bya ba 'am mya sdug ces bya bar chos nyo nad par myi 'gyur ro// lus zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar
22a8('bum): chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// lus bcings shes bya ba'am grol shes bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// lus 'das shes bya bar chos tsho nang par myi 'gyur ro// lus ma 'ongs shes
22b1('bum): bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// sum da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos so nang bar myi 'gyur ro// yid rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// yid bde zhes bya
22b2('bum): ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos sond par myi 'gyur ro// yid bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// yid sdug ces bya ba'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos nyo nang par
22b3('bum): myi 'gyur ro// yid zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// yid bcings shes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos nyo nang par myi 'gyur ro// yid 'das shes bya bar
22b4('bum): chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// yid ma 'ongs shes bya bachos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// yid da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// gzugs rtag
22b5('bum): ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur// gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// gzugs bdag ces bya ba'am
22b6('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos nyonang par myi 'gyur ro// gzugs zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos nyond par myi
22b7('bum): 'gyur ro// gzugs bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// gzugs 'das shes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// gzugs ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos nyonang
22b8('bum): par myi 'gyur ro// gzugs da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos nyo nang par myi 'gyur ro// sma rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos nyonang par myi 'gyur ro// sma bde zhes bya ba'am sdug
23a1('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// smra bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// sgra sdug ces bya ba'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos
23a2('bum): stonang par myi 'gyur ro// smra zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// smra bcings shes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// smra 'das shes bya bar
23a3('bum): nyo nad par myi 'gyur ro// sma ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// smrang ltar byung zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// dra rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos ston
23a4('bum): par myi 'gyur ro// dri bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// dri bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// dri snus
23a5('bum): ces bya ba'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyuraro/ dri zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// dri bcings shes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos
23a6('bum): stond par myi 'gyur ro// dri 'das shes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// dri ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// tre da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro/
23a7('bum): ro rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// rob pe zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// ro bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos ston
23a8('bum): par myi 'gyur ro// ro sdug ces bya ba'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro/ ro zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro// ro bcings shes bya ba'am/
23b1('bum): grol zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// ro 'das shes bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// ro ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// ro bltar byung zhes bya bar chos stonang par myi
23b2('bum): 'gyur ro// reg rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// reg bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// reg bdag ces bya ba'am bdag
23b3('bum): myed ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// reg sdug ces bya ba'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// reg zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos nyonang par myi 'gyur ro//
23b4('bum): reg bcings shes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos nyon par myi 'gyur ro// reg 'das shes bya bar chos sto / par myi 'gyur ro// reg ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos
23b5('bum): stonang par myi 'gyur ro// reg da ltar byung zhes bya b.rachos nyo nad par myi 'gyur ro// chos rtag ces byaba'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro//
23b6('bum): chos bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// chos bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// chos sdug ces bya ba'am myi sdug
23b7('bum): ces bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// chos zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// chos bcings shes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos 'o/ nad par myi 'gyur ro/
23b8('bum): chos 'das shes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// chos ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar chos nyonang par myi 'gyur ro// chos da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos stond pa kyi 'gyur ro// myig gi rna
24a1('bum): par shes pa rtag ces bya ba myi rtag ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// myig gi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos banyond par myi 'gyur ro// myig gi rnam par shes
24a2('bum): pa bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// myig gi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba'i myi sdug ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// myig gi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya
24a3('bum): ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// myig gi rnam par shes pa bcings shes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// myig gi rnam par shes pa 'das shes bya bar chos
24a4('bum): stond par gyi 'gyur ro// myig gi rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// myig gi rnam par shes pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos go rang par myi 'gyur/
24a5('bum): na ba'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngas zhes bya bar ros stonang par myi
24a6('bum): 'gyur ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos stonam par skye
24a7('bum): 'gyur ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bcings shes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos nyo nang par myi 'gyur ro//
24a8('bum): na nam pa gas pa 'angab shes byas ma tsha da par kyi 'gyur ro// na ba'i rnam pa rigs pas songs shes bya bar cho sa sod da par gyi 'byung // rna ba'i rnam pa rigs par snang chung 'i
24b1('bum): bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos
24b2('bum): stonang par myi 'gyur ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos gonang par myi 'gyur ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar chos nyond par gyi
24b3('bum): 'gyur ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa bcings shes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro//
24b4('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa 'das shes bya bar chos sond par myi 'gyur ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs shes bya bachos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa
24b5('bum): star byung zhes bya bar chos nyo nad par myi 'gyur ro// skye rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya bar sa ho nad par myi 'gyur ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa bde
24b6('bum): zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos go nad par myi 'gyur ro// lce'i rnam par shes
24b7('bum): ba sdug ces bya ba'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos sond par myi 'gyur ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa bcings
24b8('bum): shes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa 'das shes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos nyon
25a1('bum): par myi 'gyur ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos stonapa
25a2('bum): par myi 'gyur ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar cho
25a3('bum): stond par myi 'gyur ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar chos sond par myi 'gyur ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos nyo nang par
25a4('bum): myi 'gyur ro/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bcings shes bya/ pa'am grol zhes bya bar chos sond par myi 'gyur ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'das shes bya bar chos ston
25a5('bum): par myi 'gyur ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos gyond par myi 'gyur ro// sus kyin ma par shes pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos sto nga bar
25a6('bum): // da kyinam pa gas pardzu ces bya bas myi ces bya bu sa na pa myi gyu / kyinas ra shes pa byed sa smra panas skyes bya
25a7('bum): chom gyi nang par myi 'gyur ro/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'as bdag myed ces bya bar thom ston kyi myi bur srid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya babs kyi lha gces bya bar chom po
25a8('bum): yar gyi 'gyur ro// mid kyirnam par gas pa shes bya ba'am ma ni zhes byab tsam ston par gyi 'gyu / mi kyinas pa shes pa sa pa zhes bya ba ma pos sa bya ma
25b1('bum): par myi 'gyur ro// yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'das shes bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// yid kyi rnam par shes
25b2('bum): pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// myig gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// myig gi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes
25b3('bum): bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// myig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// myig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces
25b4('bum): bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyuraro// myig gi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos btond par myi 'gyur ro// myig gi 'dus te reg
25b5('bum): pa bcings shes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos nyond paramyi 'gyur ro// myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'das shes bya bachos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// myig gi 'dus te reg pa
25b6('bum): ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// myig gi 'dus te reg pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos nyo nang par myi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces
25b7('bum): bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos nyonang par myi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed
25b8('bum): bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba'am mya sdug ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar
26a1('bum): chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bcings shes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'das shes bya bar chos nyon
26a2('bum): par myi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am 'ongs shes bya bar chos nyo nad par myi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos nyo nad par myi 'gyur ro// sna'i 'dus
26a3('bum): te reg pa rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// sna'i 'dus te
26a4('bum): reg pa bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa sdug sa bya ba'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar chos stond par myi
26a5('bum): 'gyur ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// sA'i 'dus te reg pa bcings shes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar
26a6('bum): chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'das shes bya bar chos nyo nad par myi 'gyur ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// sna'i dus
26a7('bum): te reg pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos stonong par myi 'gyur ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro// sde'i 'dus te reg pa brje
26a8('bum): zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhe bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// sde'i
26b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la
26b2('bum): bcings shes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'das shes bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos nyon
26b3('bum): par myi 'gyur ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar chos nyond par myi 'gyur
26b4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug pa/ sngal zhes bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// lus kyi 'dra sa te reg pa bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos
26b5('bum): stonang par gyi 'gyur ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro/ sus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar
26b6('bum): chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// sus kyi 'dus te reg pa bcings shes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'das zhes bya bar chos stond par myi
26b7('bum): 'gyur ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// sus kyi 'dus te reg pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos nyo nad par myi 'gyur ro// yid kyi 'dus
26b8('bum): reg pa rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos tsho nang par myi 'gyur ro/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngam zhes bya bar chom tshonang par myi 'gyur ro// yid kyi
27a1('bum): te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag byed ces bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur//
