122a2('bum): po stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal
122a3('bum): te 'dus byas stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la
122a4('bum): myong do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid zab
122a5('bum): ces bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/
122a6('bum): gas te rang bzhin stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi myong ma ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ngo // galar te chos thams cad stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi myod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
122a7('bum): byind pa la spyod do// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod do// gas te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi myong ma
122a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi dpyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ngo // gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab ces bya
122b1('bum): bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab ces bya ba kyi spyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ngo // gal te dran pa nye bar
122b2('bum): gzhag pa rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod ngo // gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la byed/
122b3('bum): gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dbang po rnams zab ces bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
122b4('bum): skyong do// gal te stobs rnams zab ces bya bar myi skyo da na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zab ces bya bar myi myod na/
122b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// gal te'aphags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab ces bya bar myi gyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do//
122b6('bum): gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan rnams zab ces bya bar myi myong na shes rab kyi pha rol
122b7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshad myed pa rnams zab ces bya bar myi myong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zab ces bya bar
122b8('bum): myi myong ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod do// gal te rnam par tha rang brgyad zab ces bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pas myod do// gal te mthar da kyis
123a1('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa sub ba ces bya bar myi spyo / shes rab kyi pha rol pan byed da pal pyod do/ gas tenam thar tha pa'i sgom papa nyid dang / rgya ma myed
123a2('bum): snong sa byed pa zab pas bya bar gyi / shes kyi pa'i yo tu sa byud // kus d+he mngon pa dashes pa nas su bcas / sa rab kyi roladu
123a3('bum): pas myong ngo // kas te ting nge 'dzin rnams thob ces bya bar myi gyu / shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu byin pa ma myong nga/ gal te gzungs kyi sgornams za bac+doMs bya bar myi sbyong ma/ zhes rab kyi com
123a4('bum): tu phyind pa la myong ngo // gal te de bzhin ka shes/ sa pa'i stobs bcu zab ces bya bar myi myong nga/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas myong / ka lad te myi 'jigs
123a5('bum): pa bzhi zab ces bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la gyod do// gal te so so yang dag par rig bzhi zab ces bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
123a6('bum): byind pas myod // gal te snying rje chen po zab ces bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod // gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma brjes bya ba cwo brgyad bab ces bya bar myi gyong ma
123a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas spyod do// gal tu thams cad shes pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi bya ngon/ shes rab kyi pha ro sod tu phyind pa la spyod do// gas te las kyi rnam pags pa
123a8('bum): nyid zab ces bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ngo // gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyirang ba la
123b1('bum): spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin no// tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin no// 'du shes kyi zab
123b2('bum): bo nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'du shes ma yin no// 'du byed kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yino//
123b3('bum): myig gi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ myig ma yin no// rna ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba ma yin no// sna'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sna ma yin no// lce'i zab pa nyid ka
123b4('bum): yin pa de ni lce ma yin no// lus kyi zab pa nyid ka yin pa de ni lus ma yin no// yid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ yid ma yin no// gzugs kyi zab
123b5('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// smra'i za ba pa nyid gang yin pa de ni smra ma yin no// dri'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dwil ma yin no// ro'i zab pa
123b6('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni rom yin no// reg gi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni reg ma yin no// chos kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chos ma yin no// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i zab pa
123b7('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid
123b8('bum): gang yin pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sde'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang
124a1('bum): yin pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ myig gi 'dus te reg/
124a2('bum): pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid
124a3('bum): gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin
124a4('bum): ba de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
124a5('bum): tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// rna ba'i dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin
124a6('bum): ba de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyu nad kyis tshor ba ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no//
124a7('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// sus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyund kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni
124a8('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no//
124b1('bum): sa'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sa'i khams ma yin no// chu'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ chu'i khams ma yin no// mye'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni
124b2('bum): mye'i khams ma yin no// rlung gi khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rlung gi khams ma yin no// nam mkha'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ nam mkha'i khams ma yin no// rnam par
124b3('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no// ma rig pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni ma rig ma yin no// 'du byed kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni
124b4('bum): 'du byed ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// mying dang gzug sa kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mying dang gzugs ma yin
124b5('bum): skye mched drug gi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ skye mched drug ma yin no// reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ reg pa ma yin no// tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/
124b6('bum): tshor ba ma yin no// sred pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sred pa ma yin no// lend pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni le nad pa ma yin no// srid pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/
124b7('bum): srid pa ma yin no// skye ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni skye ba ma yin no// shi'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rga shi ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de/
124b8('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinod pa ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i za ba
125a1('bum): sa pa da/ mang pa'i 'a'os bya ba gas kyi so gyi sa / kyi byan/
125a2('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha
125a3('bum): rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// nang tong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid ga yin pa de ni phyi hong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi nang hong
125a4('bum): pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yi na ba de ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// chen po
125a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid ka nga yin pa de ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus
125a6('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// mtha'
125a7('bum): mab 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid ga min pa de ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// thogs dang tha ma myed pa stong ma nyid kyi zab pa nying ga nga yin pa ni/ thog ma dang sam byed
125a8('bum): btong pa nyid ma yin no// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rang bzhin tong /
125b1('bum): pa nyid ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang gi sa tshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid ga pa sin pa de ni rang gi mnan/
125b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid ga ngasbyin pa de ni/
125b3('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni
125b4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnas kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no// yang dag par
125b5('bum): spong ba rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa ra spong ba rnams ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
125b6('bum): ma yin no// dbang po rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnams ma yin no// stobs rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ stobs rnams ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lakra rnams
125b7('bum): kyi bab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub kyis na lag rnams ma yin no// 'phags pa'i sam yan sag brgyad pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no//
125b8('bum): phags pa'i bad pa rnams kyi bcopa nyid ga bayin par ni / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams pa yi do// bamam gtan rnams kyi bab pa nyid gang yin pa de'i bsam gtan nams ma yan ni
126a1('bum): tshad myed pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ tshad myed pa rnams ma yin no// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs myed pa'i
126a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no// rnam par thard pa brgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ma yin no// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i zab pa nyid gang
126a3('bum): yin pa de ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par
126a4('bum): tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smo nad pa myed pa ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi za ba pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mngon par shes pa rnaMs ma
126a5('bum): yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzind rnams ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnam sa kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
126a6('bum): ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no// myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/
126a7('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no// snying rje chen po'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/
126a8('bum): snying rje chen po ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no// thams cad shes pa
126b1('bum): nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no// rnam pa tham
126b2('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
126b3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
126b4('bum): tu phyi nad pa la gyod do// gal te 'du shes gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod do// gal te 'du byed gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar
126b5('bum): myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// kal
126b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te myig gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// ga lad te rna ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi
126b7('bum): myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sna gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar
126b8('bum): myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid gting dpa/
127a1('bum): dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
127a2('bum): spyod do// gal te sgra gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tri gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
127a3('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te ro gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te reg gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
127a4('bum): pa la myod do/ gal te chos gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya
127a5('bum): bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la s+yo da do/ ga lar te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka la zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin
127a6('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar
127a7('bum): myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam
127a8('bum): par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
127b1('bum): tu phyind pa la gyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes
127b2('bum): bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te kye'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus
127b3('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sa myod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
127b4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen/ kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus
127b5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mya spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba gting dka' zhes bya
127b6('bum): bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ngo // gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ngo
127b7('bum): gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
127b8('bum): tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sa'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
128a1('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te/ chu'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mye'i khams gting dpag dka'
128a2('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rlung gi khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te
128a3('bum): nam mkha'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab
128a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ma rig pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa la spyod/ gal te 'du byed gting dpag
128a5('bum): dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu rgya nad pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa gting bag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
128a6('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod do// gal te mying dang gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod do// gal te skye mched drug gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi
128a7('bum): myong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba gting dpag
128a8('bum): dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sred pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal
128b1('bum): te le nad pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi gyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ngo // gal te srid pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod ngo //
128b2('bum): gal te skye ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rga shi gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do//
128b3('bum): gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi gyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myod na
128b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod do// gal te bzod dpa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ngo // ga
128b5('bum): te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka' zhe sa bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la skyong ngo // gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting
128b6('bum): dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod ngo // gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
128b7('bum): lamyong ngo // gal te nang stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te phyi stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na
128b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid /
129a1('bum): dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te chen po stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
129a2('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid gting dpag zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus byas tong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/
129a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus ma byas tong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi pyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa tong
129a4('bum): pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi gyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te thog ma dang tha ma myed pa tong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myong na
129a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi skyo da na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do//
129a6('bum): gal te rang bzhin tong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te chos thams cad tong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/
129a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myi dmyigs
129a8('bum): pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes
129b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba/
129b2('bum): nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi gyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
129b3('bum): phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod ma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod do// gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes
129b4('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyo do// gal te dbang po rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do//
129b5('bum): gal te stobs rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myod na/
129b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi s+yo da na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod do//
129b7('bum): gal te 'phags pa'i badren pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyong na
129b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshad myed pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
130a1('bum): 'jug pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par tha rid pa brgyad gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes
130a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par tha rad pa'i
130a3('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ngo // gal te mngon par shes pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar
130a4('bum): myi myong ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ting nge 'dzind rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzungs
130a5('bum): kyi sgo rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gting dpag gting dpag
130a6('bum): dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myi 'jigs pa bzhi gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal
130a7('bum): te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te snying rje chen po gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab
130a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te/
130b1('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha/
130b2('bum): rol tu phyind pa la myong ngo // gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti
130b3('bum): bu gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// tshor bI gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin no// 'du shes kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni 'du shes ma yin
130b4('bum): 'du byed kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni 'du byed mayin no// rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba kang yi na ba de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// myig gi gtings
130b5('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni myig ma yin no// rna ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba ma yin no// sna'i gting du bag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sna ma yin no// lce'i gting dang /
130b6('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni lce ma yin no// lus kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni lus ma yin no// yid kyi gting dpag dka' ba' gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin no// gzugs kyi gting dpag
130b7('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// sgra'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sgra ma yin no/ dri'i gting dpag dka' ba kang yin pa de ni dri ma yin no// rol gting dpag dka' ba' gang yin
130b8('bum): ba de ni ro ma yin no// reg gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rig ma yin no// chos kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni chos ma yin no// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka'
131a1('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag
131a2('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba'i gang yin pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba
131a3('bum): gang yin pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba'i gang yin pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dag
131a4('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba'i gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dku ba gang yin/
131a5('bum): ba de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin mo/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag
131a6('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba'i gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'am yin no// myig gi 'dus
131a7('bum): te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba la gang yin pa
131a8('bum): de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i gti ba dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// sle'i
131b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni s+ye'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bri gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa
131b2('bum): de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ma yin no//
131b3('bum): sa'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin no// chu'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams ma yin no// mye'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin/
131b4('bum): ba de ni mye'i khams ma yin no/ rlung gi khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams ma yin no/ mam kha'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa da neH/ nam
131b5('bum): mkha'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ninam mkha'i khams ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i
131b6('bum): khams ma yin no// ma rig pa'i gting dpag dka' ba' gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin no// 'du byed kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i
131b7('bum): gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// mying dang gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de nimying dang gzugs ma yin no// skye mched drug gi gting dpag dka' ba
131b8('bum): gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug ma yin no// reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni reg pa ma yin no/ tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin no// sred pa'i gting dpag dka'
132a1('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni sred pa ma yin no// le nad pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni le nad pa ma yin no// srid pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni srid pa ma yin no// skye ba'i gting dpag dka'
132a2('bum): ba gang yin pa de ni skye ba ma yin no// rga shi'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rga shi ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa
132a3('bum): ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/
132a4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ brtsa na 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// bsam gtan
132a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/
132a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ phyi hod/
132a7('bum): pa nyid ma yin no// phye na pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dga' ba gang yin pa na ni/ phye nang stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi
132a8('bum): gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi gting
132b1('bum): dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni don dam pa tong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'das ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no/
132b2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
132b3('bum): nyid ma yin no/ thog pa dang tha ma myed pa tong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa da ne thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
132b4('bum): pa hong pa nyid ma yin no// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi gting paka dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba la
132b5('bum): gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin stong po nyid ma yin no/ chos tha mas cad tong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid
132b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no//
132b7('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin
132b8('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid sa \u0f7f ting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni dram
133a1('bum): banye bar gnag pa ma yin no/ yang dag par spong ba'i gting dpag dga' ba ga nga yin pa deni/ sang dag par spong sas yis // chu 'brus kyi rkang pa'i gting dgag dga' ba ga yin pa de'i
133a2('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ma yimano dbang po'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni dbang po ma yin no/ stoms kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni stobs ma yin no/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi
133a3('bum): gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de nibyang chub kyi yan lag ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma
133a4('bum): yin no/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gting dpag dka' pa kang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa ma yin no/ bsam gtan gyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni
133a5('bum): bsam gtan ma yin no// tshad myed pa'i gting dpag dka'apa gang yin pa de ni tshad myed pa ma yin no// gzugs mye da pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin/
133a6('bum): bo de ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ma yin no// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ma yin no/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
133a7('bum): 'jug pa dgu'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed
133a8('bum): pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ma yin no/ mngon par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang
133b1('bum): yin pa de ni/ mngon par shes pa ma yin no// ting nge 'dzind kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzin ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgor gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ gzungs kyi sgo/
133b2('bum): ma yin no// de bzhiru gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma yin no/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i gting dpag dkal ba ga
133b3('bum): ba de ni myi 'jigs pa bzhi ma yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma yin no// snying rje chen po'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin/
133b4('bum): ba gang yin pa de ni/ snying rje chen po ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ma yin/
133b5('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ lam gyi rna
133b6('bum): pa nyid ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
133b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs myed do zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba myed do zhes bya
133b8('bum): bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ngo // gal te 'du shes tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myod nga/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ngo // gal te 'du byed tshad myed do zhes bya
134a1('bum): par myi spyod ma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gas ternam par shes pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig tshad myed do
134a2('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na
134a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
134a4('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid tshad myed do zhes bya ba dar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes
134a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sgra tshad myed do zhe sa bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myo/ gal te dri tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi
134a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ro tshad myed do zhes bya bar mya spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te reg tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
134a7('bum): phyind pa la spyod do// gal te chos tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi rnam par shes pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab
134a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed do zhes bya
134b1('bum): par myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa
134b2('bum): tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal
134b3('bum): te myig gi 'dus te reg pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod do// gal te kha'i 'dus te reg pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi gyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
134b4('bum): gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'du sa te reg pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab
134b5('bum): kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te re ga pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad
134b6('bum): myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
134b7('bum): spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba tshad myed
134b8('bum): do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
135a1('bum): spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
135a2('bum): tshor ba tshad bye du do zhes bya bar gyi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod do// gal te sa'i khams chad myed do zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rosang tu phyind pa la gyod //
135a3('bum): gal te chu'i khams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mye'i khams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
135a4('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te rlung gi khams tshad myed do zhes bya bar/ myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te nam mkha'i khams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myong na
135a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam pa ra shes pa'i khams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ma
135a6('bum): rig pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te
135a7('bum): rnam par shes pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mying dang gzugs tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
135a8('bum): la myong ngo // gal te skye mched drug tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te reg pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
135b1('bum): tu phyinang pa la myod do// gal te tshor ba tshad sbed do zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod do// gal te sred pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi gyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
135b2('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te le nad pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myong ngo // gal te srid pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la myong
135b3('bum): gal te skye ba byed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rga/ shi tshad myed do zhes bya ba kyi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/
135b4('bum): gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do zhes bya
135b5('bum): bar myi myong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/
135b6('bum): gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myod na/
135b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te nang stong pa nyid
135b8('bum): tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te phyi stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong
136a1('bum): gal te phyin pa stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshad byed do zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi
136a2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te chen po stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te don dam pa tong ba nyid tshad myad po zhes bya bar myi bya/
136a3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te chen po tang pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te don dam stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/
136a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod ngo // gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha ro/ lang tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus ma byas tong pa
136a5('bum): nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa tong pa nyid tshad myed po zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
136a6('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar
136a7('bum): myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod do// gal te chos thams cad hong
136a8('bum): pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
136b1('bum): spyod do// gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid tshad myed po zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes
136b2('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad myed do//
136b3('bum): zhes bya bar myi myong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams tshad myed do// zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod na
136b4('bum): zhes bya bar myi myongs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bya nga/ gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
136b5('bum): spyong do// gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te dbang po rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod/
136b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te stobs rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams tshad myed do/
136b7('bum): zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod ngo // gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod
136b8('bum): gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
137a1('bum): rol tu sbyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshad myed pa rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myong ma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myod do// gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
137a2('bum): 'jug pa rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par thar da pa' brgyad tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin
137a3('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la myod do// gal te rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa
137a4('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa chadamyed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi / nad pa la spyod do// gal te mngon par shes pa
137a5('bum): rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ting nge 'dzind rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
137a6('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnam tshad byed don kyab kyi skyod de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myod na shes rab kyi pha rol
137a7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myi 'jigs pa bzhi tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi tshad myed do zhes bya bar
137a8('bum): myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sa myong ngo // gal te snying rje chen po tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod // gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
137b1('bum): 'dres pa bcwo brgyad tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te thams cad shes pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
137b2('bum): pa la pyod do// gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sa myed do zhes bya bar myi myong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod ngo do// gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi myong na
137b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do//
137b4('bum): ga khan gyi mas mas kyi cha gyur la na / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po dgu pa// de ci'i phyir zhe/
137b5('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de nigazu gas ma yin no// tshor bI tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin no// 'du shes kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni 'du
137b6('bum): shes ma yin no// 'du byed kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// myig gi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni
137b7('bum): myig ma yin no// rna ba'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rna pa ma yin no/ sna'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni sna ma yin no// sde ched myed pa gang yin pa de ni lce ma yin no// sus kyi chad myed pa gang yin pa
137b8('bum): de ni lus ma yin no// yid kyi tshad byed pa gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin no// gzugs kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// smra'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni smra ma yin no//
138a1('bum): dri'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni dri ma yin no// ro'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni ro ma yin no// reg gi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ reg ma yin no// chos kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni
138a2('bum): chos ma yin no// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no//
138a3('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i
138a4('bum): tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg
138a5('bum): pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'am yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i'o/
138a6('bum): tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshad pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni lus
138a7('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni/
138a8('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye kyi tshor ba'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa/
138b1('bum): xxx
138b2('bum): kyis tshor ba ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ching myong ba
138b3('bum): gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yim no// sa'i khams kyi yang myed pa gang yin pa de ni mi'i khams sa yi no/ chu'i khams kyi chad byed pa gang yin pa de'i bu'i khams mayin
138b4('bum): mye'i khams kyi chadang myed pa gang yin pa deni gyi'i khams ma yin rlung gi las kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams ma'i nan/ nam mkha'i khams kyi chad byed pa gang yin pa de'i
138b5('bum): nam mkha'i khams ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i kham sa kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no// ma rig pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa
138b6('bum): de ni ma rig pa ma yin no// 'du byed kyi tshad skyed pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// mying dang gzugs kyi tshad myed pa gang
138b7('bum): yin pa de ni mying dang gzugs ma yin no// skyesached drug gi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni skye ma ched drugs yin do/ reg pa'i tshad byed pa gang yin pa de ni rig pa ma yin no/ rngo ba can kyang pa ga
138b8('bum): sem pa ma rag pa ma yin no/ tshor ba'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin no// sred pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni sred pa ma yin no// le nad pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni lend pa ma
139a1('bum): yin no// srid pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa ma yin do/ skye ba'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba ma yin no// rga shi'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rga shi ma yin no/
139a2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyind pa ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/
139a3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i tshad myed pa'i gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/
139a4('bum): ma yin no// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind po'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin
139a5('bum): ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// nang tong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi hong pa nyid tshad myed pa gang yin pa de
139a6('bum): ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chad pa gang yin pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// chen
139a7('bum): po stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang /
139a8('bum): yin pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang
139b1('bum): yin pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed
139b2('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni chos thams
139b3('bum): cad stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni myi dmyigs pa stong ba
139b4('bum): nyid ma yin no// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yi na ba de ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// ngo bo nyid hong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma
139b5('bum): yin no// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de
139b6('bum): ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sa yin no/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi cha byed pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no// nu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni nu
139b7('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no// dab po rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnams ma yin no// stobs rnams kyi tshad myed pa cin 'od stobs rnams ma yin no/ byang chub kyi yan la/
139b8('bum): rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no//
140a1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan rnams ma yin no//
140a2('bum): tshad myed pa rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni tshad myed pa rnams yin no// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin
140a3('bum): rnam par thard pa' brgyad kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de na rnam par thard pa rnams ma yin no// mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni mthar da kyis gnas pa'i
140a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no// rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar
140a5('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smonapa myed pa ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma
140a6('bum): yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzind rnams ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no/
140a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no// myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni myi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no//
140a8('bum): moso yang dag par rig pa zhizhi'i chad myed pa gang yin pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no// snyib rje chen po'i chid myed pa ga' yin pa de 'i snying rje chen po ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chom
140b1('bum): ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no// thams cad shes pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no// lam
140b2('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma yin no// /
140b3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni de ltar zab bo/ de ltar gting dpag dka'o// de ltar rtogs par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das
140b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni de ltar tshad ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i mdun du bshad par myi
140b5('bum): bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ 'jigs sdang zhing / skrag par gyur tu mchi'o// the tsom dang / nem nur 'tshal du mchi'o// mos par yang
140b6('bum): myi 'gyur du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand par bgyi ste/ des ni shes
140b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos nas myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ro// the tsom dang nem nur 'tshal par myi 'gyur de thos nas kyang gong nas gong du mos pa dang
140b8('bum): 'dzi nad pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byind kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
141a1('bum): dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol
141a2('bum): tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di bshad na/ nyes pa cir 'gyur/ ti sa rnas shes gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa zab mo
141a3('bum): 'di bstand pa na/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ 'jigs par 'gyur/ sdang bar 'gyur/ skrag par 'gyur te/ phyir zlog par 'gyur ro// spong bar 'gyur ro//
141a4('bum): de ni mos par yang myi 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems da' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di thos
141a5('bum): nam spangs pa'i phyir/ de log par ltung bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par byed cing / sogs pa dang / las byas pa dang / bstsags pa des kyang / bla na myed pas
141a6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chabargya bar yang dka' ba de lta bu'i gnas yod do// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
141a7('bum): dpa' chen po srungs bstand pa/ shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ myi 'jigs kyi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ba lta yod dam/ smras pa/ ke'u zhig byang chub sems dpa'
141a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ myi 'jigs kyi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ba/ de dag ni ring po myi thogs par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
141b1('bum): byang chub tu lung ba ha nad par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig gam/ gnyis la myi 'da' bar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
141b2('bum): kyi bar du lung bstand par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal da pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin no// de de bzhind te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu
141b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ myi 'jigs kyi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur zhing / thos nas kyang / gong nas gong du 'dzin pa
141b4('bum): dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / ji ltar bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ de dag ni yun ring po nas/ theg pa
141b5('bum): pa yang dag par zhugs pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa'o// sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkru ra byas pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa
141b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de'i dpe' gsal bar bdag gis spobs so// bde bar gshegs pa de'i dpe' bdag gis gsal bar spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
141b7('bum): khyod kyis spobs pa bskyed cig/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta nye dper na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'i rmyi lam na
141b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom zhing / bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / brtson 'grus chom pa dang / bzod pas sgrub pa dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / sbyin pa yongs su
142a1('bum): xxx
142a2('bum): xxx
142a3('bum): brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / mazod pas bsgrubs pa dang / tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang / sbyin pa yongs su btang ba lta smos kyang ci 'ichas date/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bus de
142a4('bum): blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur dpa ra rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang gis shes rab kyi pha rom tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di thos par gyur te/ thos
142a5('bum): nas kyang 'dzind cing 'chang la/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan tu bgyid pa de dag ni dge ba'i phra ba yongs su sbyind pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
142a6('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dzind cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni yun ring po nas/ theg pa la yang
142a7('bum): dag par zhugs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// sangs rgyas mang po bsnyend bkur ba'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs
142a8('bum): kye bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ba ha nad pa dang nye bar gyur pa ste/ bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ba ha nad par 'gyur ro//
142b1('bum): xxx
142b2('bum): babyung ba dang tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sas phyir gyi ldog par rig par bkyis dan gi ma
142b3('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta he dper na skyes bu la la 'brog dgon dpag tshad brgya pa zhig nas 'byung ba 'am/ 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad nyis brgya pa dang / sum brgya pa dang / bzhi brgya pa dang / lnga paH
142b4('bum): pa nas 'byung ba zhig mchis la de 'byung ba'i tshe grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi snga ltas pa ba lang rdzi 'am
142b5('bum): phyugs rdzi'am sa mtshams sam bza' shing gi ra ba phun sum tshogs pa 'amanags tshal phun sum tshogasapa mthong ngam de ma lags pa gzhan yang mtshan ma gad
142b6('bum): gis grong khyer ram/ grong rda la tam/ khams sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor mchis par mngon pa'i snga ltas de lta bu dag mthong na/ de 'di snyam du 'gyur te/ snga ltas 'di dag snang ba las
142b7('bum): ma 'di nas grong ngam klong khyer ram/ grong rnal lam/ rnams sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ni nye'o snyam te/ dbugs phyi nad par 'gyur zhing / de la de sman cad rkun pa'i 'jigs
142b8('bum): pa'am/ chom po'i 'jigs pa'am/ gcan zam tshwa ba'i 'jigs pa'am/ bkres pa'am/ skom pa'i 'jigs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bya
143a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'thad par gyur te/ 'thad par gyur nas kyang / 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba
143a2('bum): dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni lung bstand pa la nye bar gyur par
143a3('bum): rig par bgyi ba he/ ring po myi thogs par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des de slan cad nyan/
143a4('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis sa 'jigs par myi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du len/ 'di lta ho/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / byas
143a5('bum): bgyi ba dang / mnyand tu mchis pa de nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi snga ltas so// ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de
143a6('bum): ba'i mdo// de de bzhin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis dadung yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus spobs pa skyed cig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta he/ dper na/ skyes bu la la
143a7('bum): zhig rgyamatsho mching rnams chemo lta bar 'chal nas/ de rgyamatsho chen po lta 'tshal ba'i slad du/ dwa ji lta ji ltar rgya mtsho'u chen po dang nye bar mchis pa de lta de ltar sum bu 'am/ sbom bu'i
143a8('bum): mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am/ ri'i mtshan ma mthong na/ des 'di nas rgya mtsho'i chen po thag nye ste 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po dang po myang ngo do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni bags kyis gzhol ba ste/
143b1('bum): 'di nas rgya mtsho'i chen po'i drung du/ da ni ring po myed do// de dang nye ba na ni snum bu 'am/ ldum bu'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am/ ri'i mtshan ma gang yang myed do// zhes bgyi bar rig par bgyi'o//
143b2('bum): de ltar skyes bu de'i myig gis rgya mtsho' chen po ma mthong du lags kyang / des bdag ni rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar gyur to// rgya mtsho' chen po ni 'di na yod do// rgya mtsho'i chen po ni 'di phan chad myi ring
143b3('bum): ngo zhes bgyi bar rtogs par 'tshal da to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di nyand cing / 'dzi nad pa dang / 'chang zhing / klog pa dang / kund chub par
143b4('bum): bgyid pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / bdag de ba zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
143b5('bum): rgyas kyis khyod bskal pa ni 'di snyed cig/ bska lad pa brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig/ bskal pa stong phrag/ ni 'di snyed cig/ bskal pa brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di snyed/
143b6('bum): cig/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya hotong ka phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bla na myed pa yang dag
143b7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon su du rung ba sa nad pas/ da dung lung ma ba ha nad kyis kyang / bdag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ba ha nad pa dang / nye bar gnas par bdun
143b8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ re ni 'di ltar bdag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyend bkur du yod la mnyanang du yod do// thos nas rgya
144a1('bum): gzung du yod do// bcang du yod/ klag tu yod/ kun chub par byar yod/ tshul bzhin du yid la byar yod do zhes bgyi bar rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
144a2('bum): lta ste dper na/ dpyid kyi dus la ba ba he/ rtsi shing gi lo ma dang / 'dab ma lhags nas kha dog gyur da pa'i tshe/ 'dzam bu gling gi myi rnams kyis ring po myi thogs par lo ma dang / mye tog dang 'bras
144a3('bum): bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar snga ltas 'di dag rtsi shing las snang ngo zhes bgyi bar 'tshal bar bgyi he/ gang gi tshe ci shing rnams lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras
144a4('bum): bu phun sum tshogs par gyur pa de'i tshe yang bud myed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag gis ci shing gi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs
144a5('bum): pa de dag mthong nas nyams bde bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po yang gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
144a6('bum): zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur pa dang / mnyand tu mchis te/ thos nas kyang / 'dzi nad cing 'chang pa dang / klog cing kund chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul
144a7('bum): bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smyind par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub ses
144a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des kyang 'di ltar
144b1('bum): bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mnyand tu yod pa dang / ji skad du bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
144b2('bum): nan tan byar yod pa ni sngon gyi dge ba'i tha bas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur to zhes bgyi bar 'tshal par bgyi'o// de na lha'i bu sngon sangs rgyas
144b3('bum): mthong ba ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i snga ltas de dag mthong nas sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lung bstand par

144b5('bum): par 'gyur ro zhes dga' zhing spro la yid bde zhing nyams bdebar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta he dpe ra na/ bud myed sbrum ma ni ji lta ji ltar ba tsar nye

144b7('bum): des smra ba nyung zhing stend pa'i ngang tshul ma mchis la sngon tshul bzhin ma lags pa'i yid la bgyid pa bstend pa dang / bsnyend pa des rnam pa de lta bu'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur te/ bud myed gzhan
144b8('bum): dag gis zung myed de'i mtshan ma ji lta ji ltar mthong ba las kyang sa 'a da'i mtsham ma je lta ltar mthar pa las pa/ bud myed 'di ni rib po myi thogs par btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar 'tshal lo/
145a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i cha ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur ba/ legs pa'i myod pa'i spyad pa dge ba'i
145a2('bum): bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyin pa rnams la ang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'thad par 'gyur te/ 'thad par gyur nas kyang / 'dzind cing 'chang ba

145a6('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de ltar legs par yongs su bzung ba ni ngo mtshar che'o// bcom
145a7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da 'di ster byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying
145a8('bum): 'che ba dang / lha dang myi'i skye bo'i tshogs pal po che'i don dang / bde ba'i phyir/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/ de dag byang chub sem
145b1('bum): ra ba'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe bskul ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can brgya stong mang po la pam 'dogs te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / snyanang par smra ba dang / dodang tu spyod pa dang / do
145b2('bum): mthun par spyod pa de dag gis/ dge ba bcu'i lam la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug la gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag
145b3('bum): par skul lo/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug la gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par

145b6('bum): rje'i ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par 'jug la gzhan yang snying rje'i ting nge 'dzind la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par 'jug la gzhan yang dka' ba'i

146a1('bum): gzhan yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug la gzhan yang cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la yang

146a3('bum): kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtob la gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang tshul khrims srung la/ gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang bzod pa sgom la

146a8('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par myi byed do// gzhan dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'god kyang / bdag dgra bcom pa nyid thob par myi byed do// gzhan rang byang chub la rab tu 'god kyang
146b1('bum): bdag rang byang chub mngon tu myi byed do// bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod la byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag

146b7('bum): thub ma nang tu skye byed da/ bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gyad la byang chub sems dpa' gzhan yang phrag du ma dag kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu byand pa la yang dag par sprul la/ bdag

147a1('bum): sa yongs su gnon la/ gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu 'god do// bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed la/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing
147a2('bum): yongs su dag par bya ba la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang sems can yongs su sbyind par byed la/ gzhan yang sems can yongs su smind par bya ba la yang dag par skul lo// bdag
147a3('bum): kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa skyed la/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo yongasu sbyor la/ gzhan yang
147a4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo yongs su sbyong ba la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par byed la gzhan yang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par
