147a7('bum): 'dzin pa gzhan yang gzhon nu'i sa sum sum tshogs pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa pazhi rnam la/ gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang
147a8('bum): dag par sprul lo// bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom la gzhan yang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom la/ gzhan
147b1('bum): yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang dag par sprul lo// bdag kyang dbang po lnga sgom la/ gzhan yang dbang po lnga la yang dag par sprul lo// bdag kyang stobs lnga sgom la/ gzhan yang stongs
147b2('bum): stabs lnga la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sbom la/ gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
147b3('bum): brgyad pa sgom la/ gzhan yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgom la/ gzhan yang 'phags pa'i bden pa
147b4('bum): bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi bsgom la gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi la yang dag/ bdag kyang tshad myed pa bzhi sgom la/ gzhan yang tshad myed
147b5('bum): pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang gzugs mye da pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgom la/ gzhan yang / zugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang dag par
147b6('bum): skul lo// bdag kyang rnam par tha rad pa brgyad skom la/ gzhan yang rnam par thard dpa' brgyad la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom la
147b7('bum): gzhan yang rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug skam pa/ gzhan yang mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la
147b8('bum): yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa sgom la/ gzhan yang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
148a1('bum): ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang mngon par shes pa lnga sgom la/ gzhan yang mngon par shes pa lnga la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang /
148a2('bum): ting nge 'dzind thams cad la snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin thams cad la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad sgom la/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo thams
148a3('bum): cad la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom la/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang myi 'jigs pa bzhi
148a4('bum): bsgom la gzhan yang myi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mdo na bar sgrub la/ gzhan yang soso yang dag par rig pa
148a5('bum): bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang byams pa chenapo sgom la/ gzhan yang byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang snying rje chen po sgom la
148a6('bum): gzhan yang snying rje chen po la yang dag par sprul lo// bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad smra ba la/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la yang dag par skul lo//
148a7('bum): bdag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed la/ gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la yang dag par sprul lo// bdag kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i
148a8('bum): mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong la/ gzhan yang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor la/ gzhan
148b1('bum): yang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba la yang dag par skul lo// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te
148b2('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ yon tan mang po dang ldan pa de dag sems can thams cad kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / bla na myed pa yang
148b3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtsha rang to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtsha rang to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub
148b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba la gas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
148b5('bum): rab 'byor de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam gzugs kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma
148b6('bum): mthong ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol du pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa'
148b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam tshor ba'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
148b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
149a1('bum): nam 'du shes kyi 'phel pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
149a2('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam 'du byed kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems
149a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
149a4('bum): la skyong ba'i tshe nam rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsku
149a5('bum): ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam myig gi
149a6('bum): 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
149a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rna ba'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub
149a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
149b1('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam sna'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yong su rdzogs
149b2('bum): par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lce'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub
149b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dade byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
149b4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lus kyi 'phel ba yang da ga par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgo
149b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chusems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam yid kyi 'phel ba yang
149b6('bum): dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
149b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam gzugs kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
149b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pol shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
150a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam sgra'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa yongasu rdzogs
150a2('bum): bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam tI'i 'phel bsang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe
150a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
150a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rol 'phe la ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
150a5('bum): pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam reg

150a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ nam chos kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

151b6('bum): po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

154b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang/
154b2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su
154b3('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su
154b4('bum): ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs para'agyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' ses/
154b5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam nang stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
154b6('bum): chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam
154b7('bum): byi stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag pa dzes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' men po'i shes rab kyi pa ro la tu byind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab
154b8('bum): 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi sel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sem
155a1('bum): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la/
155a2('bum): myod pa'i tshe/ nas stong ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par
155a3('bum): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/
155a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
155a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam don dam pa nga pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
155a6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ba'i tshe/ namya 'dus byas stong pa nyid
155a7('bum): kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub
155a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
155b1('bum): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ba'i tshe/ nam mtha'
155b2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor/
155b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems
155b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'a byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab
155b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dor ba myed pa 'o/ nga pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol
155b6('bum): tu byind pa bsgos pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ nam rang bzhin stong pa nyid
155b7('bum): kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
155b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub
156a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes
156a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
156a3('bum): pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phel
156a4('bum): ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor/
156a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro/ lang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dngos po myed pa stong pa/ nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe
156a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha
156a7('bum): rol tu phyind pa la myong ba'i tshe/ nam ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgo/
156a8('bum): ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
156b1('bum): nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byorang
156b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rdza su ma mthong ba ra'i tshe/ nam dran pa nye bar
156b3('bum): gzhag pa rnams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab
156b4('bum): 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
156b5('bum): ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyu ra ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems
156b6('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes
156b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sa spyod pa'i tshe nam dbang po rnam
156b8('bum): kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub
157a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam stobs rnams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
157a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
157a3('bum): pa'i tshe/ nam byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs
157a4('bum): par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'phel
157a5('bum): ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen pol/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ nad pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
157a6('bum): rab 'byor dade byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub ses
157a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la

157b3('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sem
157b4('bum): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yo ngas su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
157b5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe byang chub sems sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
157b6('bum): pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
157b7('bum): 'jug pa dgu'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/
157b8('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa
158a1('bum): myed pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshebyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//

158a6('bum): sgo rnams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
158a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe
158a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol
158b1('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yong/
158b2('bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes
158b3('bum): su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
158b4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam sti brje chen po'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha
158b5('bum): rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam
158b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su

158b8('bum): mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dang
159a1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'an po'i/
159a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'arlom sa yos phyos pa phyogs khyod bya chum seMs dan me dan chen po kres kyi rol tu phyid pa khyod thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
159a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
159a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po / rab 'byord
159a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshenam gzugs kyi 'gri ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub
159a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
159a7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshenam tshor ba'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs
159a8('bum): par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dade byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam 'du shes kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i de'i
159b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

159b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
159b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam myi ga gi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'ibyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi
159b6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha/ nam rna ba'i 'gri
159b7('bum): pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa'
159b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam sna'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol
160a1('bum): sa #spyod kya chub ma mas dpa' sems shes rab kyi 'a rgyas#
160a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
160a3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lus kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab
160a4('bum): 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam yid kyi grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub
160a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu d+hi nad pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
160a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ nam gzugs kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i rtse/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzos
160a7('bum): par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ nam sgra'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang
160a8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
160b1('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dri'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
160b2('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rol 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
160b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
160b4('bum): pa'i tshe nam reg gi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mtsho dang ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par
160b5('bum): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rgya da pa'i tshe/ nam chos kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su
160b6('bum): ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
160b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol
160b8('bum): tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i

161a2('bum): 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'itshe/ byang chub
161a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod
161a4('bum): pa'i tshe/ nam lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' mas dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsgom pa
161a5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la myod pa'i tshe/ nam lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i

161a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ nam yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
161a8('bum): dpa' chen po'i/ shes rab kyi pha ro la tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
161b1('bum): ma myong ba'i nam myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs
161b2('bum): par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha ro sad tu phyind pas byed pa'imi/ nam rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
161b3('bum): byang chub sems dang rnams dpan can pa'i gas rab kyi sa tu myedad pa pa rnam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur / rab byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
161b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myod panam hA 'dus te ga pa'i 'grib pa yang dag pa rjes su ma mthong / de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
161b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzo/ sa par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' mas dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa sa
161b6('bum): spyod ba'i/ nas sgo'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa songs su rdzogs
161b7('bum): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/ nam sus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba ro
161b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi sa
162a1('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du tu

162a3('bum): kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor

162a6('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

165b1('bum): do dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa sang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba 'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ges rab kyi pha ro sa tu phyi nang pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab

165b6('bum): dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' seMs
165b7('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ nam thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
165b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
166a1('bum): kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor/
166a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
166a3('bum): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam chos
166a4('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma ma thob pa de'ibyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par
166a5('bum): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i rtsa/ nam rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par
166a6('bum): rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
166a7('bum): chen po gas rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyind pa sa spyod pa'i tshe nam myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab
166a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'inam dngos po myed
166b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang /
166b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sem
166b3('bum): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dngos
166b4('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su
166b5('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dran pa nye bar gzhanapa rnams kyi 'grib
166b6('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
166b7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sa myong ba'i tshe/ nam yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
166b8('bum): pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par
167a1('bum): rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sem
167a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyind pa la myong ba'i tshe/ nam dbang po rnams kyi 'grig pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol
167a3('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ba'i tshe/ nam stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par
167a4('bum): rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa'
167a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa tshe/ nam byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
167a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
167a7('bum): nas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i dgrib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i dzi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen no// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi dang pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzom
167a8('bum): par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myong pa'i tshe/ nam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma
167b1('bum): mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes
167b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam bsam gtan rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa
167b3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha/ nam tshad myed pa rnams kyi 'grib pa yang bdag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i
167b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byo rang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
167b5('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam gzugs myed pa'i snyo mas par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma ma thong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
167b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyi 'gri
167b7('bum): pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
167b8('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dkro' 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
168a1('bum): po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam par/
168a2('bum): tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub med dang sems dpa' chem po'i shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyind pa bsgom pa yong a
168a3('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dbyung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ nam mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/
168a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol pa
168a5('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa 'a sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa
168a6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba
168a7('bum): de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
168a8('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yong
168b1('bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ nam myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang
168b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
168b3('bum): nam soso yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
168b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro/ lang tu phyind pa la myong ba'i tshe/ nam snying rje chen po'i 'grib pa bdag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
168b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha
168b6('bum): ros tu phyind pa sa spyod pa'i tshe/ nam sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pharom
168b7('bum): tu byinang pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas myong pa'i tshe/ nas thams cad shes pa nyid kyi 'byim
168b8('bum): pa yang dag pa rjes su ma mthong bar mim / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i ges rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ rang byor byang chub sems dpa /
169a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
169a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam
169a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor/
169a4('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams na chos shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / chos
169a5('bum): ma yin zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / 'das shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / ma 'ongs shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / da ltar byung zhes
169a6('bum): bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / dge zhes bya ba dang myi dge zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / lung du hond ces bya ba dang / sung d+ha mye hond ces bya bar sa pa dag par rjes su kyi/
169a7('bum): mthong / 'dus byas shes bya ba dang / 'dus ma byas shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / 'dod pa'i khams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / gzugs kyi khams shes bya bar
169a8('bum): yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / gzugs myed pa'i khams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / tshul khris
169b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes
169b2('bum): su myi mthong / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / nang stong pa nyid ces bya
169b3('bum): bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag
169b4('bum): rjes su myi mthong / chen po stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya b.rabadag par rjes su myi mthong / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces
169b5('bum): bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba pa sang dag par rjes su myi mthong / mtha' sa 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi man
169b6('bum): thog ma dang ba ma skyed pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su kyi mayong / dor ba byed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba sang dag par rjes su myi mthong / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba sa bdag pa rjes su kyi
169b7('bum): mthong / chos thams cad stob pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / rang gi ma tshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar
169b8('bum): ya bdag pa rjesu myi mthong / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bams bdag pa rjes su myi mthong/ dngos po myed pa'i ngobo nyid tong/
170a1('bum): pa nyid ces bya ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong/ yang dag par spong ba rnams shes bya bar yang dag
170a2('bum): bar rjes su kyi mamang / rlubargyas kyi rkang pa rnams shes bya bar sa dag par rjes su myi mayong / dbang po rnams shes bya bar yang dag pa rjes su myi mthong / rkobs rnams shes bya ba yang dag par rjes su khyi mtho
170a3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes bya bar yang
170a4('bum): dag pa rjesu phyi mthong/ bsam gtan rnams shes bya bar nga dag pa rjes su gyi mthong / chad byed pa rnams shes bya ba yang dag pa rjes su myi mamyong / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
170a5('bum): par 'jug pa rnams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / rnam par thar da pa brgyad ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya bar
170a6('bum): yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / mngon par shes pa rnams shes bya bar yang
170a7('bum): dag par rjes su myi mthong / ting nge 'dzind rnams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
170a8('bum): zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / myi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / snying rje chen po zhes
170b1('bum): bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / thams cad shes pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / lam
170b2('bum): kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi
170b3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di lta chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid dang / phyir myi ldog pa dang / gsog dang / gso
170b4('bum): dang / snying po byed pa dang / dbang du gyur pa dang / ma myed pa dang / srog myed pa'i phyi ro/ gsol bcom ldan 'das thams kyis kyi khyab pa bas nga /
170b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor dag zugs bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstan to// tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/
170b6('bum): bams kyis kyi khyab pa'i bstan to// 'du shes bsas kyis sti khyab pa'i phyir/ bams kyis kyi khyab pa bdan / 'du byed bams kyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bams kyis myi khyab pa' bsam
170b7('bum): rnam pa shes pa bsam shes kyi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsas kyis kyi sgrub pa bstan to// rtsig bams kyis kyi khyab pa'i phyir/ bas du kyis kyi sa kyis kyi byab
170b8('bum): thams kyis kyi khyab pa bstam to// snabams kyis kyi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gis kyi khyab pa bsam / byamams kyis kyi khyab pa'i phyir/ tham kyis kyi byas pa 'dun to// sum
171a1('bum): gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstan dato/ yid bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstan to// gzugs bsas kyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/
171a2('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstan to/ smra bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa bahanang to// dri bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam kyis myi khyab pa bstan to// ro bsam kyis
171a3('bum): myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstan to// reg bsam kyis kyi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gis myi khyab pa bstan to// chos bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam kyis myi khyab pa banyam to/
171a4('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i kyibasam kyis myi khyab pa bstan to// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bams kyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bams kyis khyab pa bsdu
171a5('bum): to/ sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ kyi rgyas 'i rnam par shes pa bsam kyis myi byab pa'i phyir/ bsam kyis kyi thub pa bstan pa to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa bamam
171a6('bum): sa kyi sgrub pa'i phyi/ ma gyis kyi khyab pa btan to/ yid kyirnam par shes pa pas gas kyi rtsub pa'i byeng / mags kyi byab pa ba // cig gi 'dus te dag pa bams kyi
171a7('bum): xxx
171a8('bum): thams kyis kyi byab pa bstand to// kye'i dus te reg pa pas mi gas kyi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsas gis kyi khyab pa bsand to// lus kyi 'dus te ga sa mams kyis kyi khya ba thams kyis
171b1('bum): khyab pa bstan to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsas kyis kyi thub bya'i phying/ thams kyis myi khyab pa bsta to// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rten kyi mtshon ba bams kyis kyi khyab pa'i phyir/ bas
171b2('bum): gyis myi khyab pa bstan to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstan to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/
171b3('bum): bsam kyis kyi khyab pa bstan to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bams kyis myi khyab pa brda nga ti/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam kyis kyi bya ba'i
171b4('bum): da/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstan to/ med kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam kyis kyi rgya bkyis gyi khyab pa bstad to// sa'i khams bas
171b5('bum): gyis kyi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam kyis myi khyab pa bstan to// chu'i khams bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gas kyi khyab pa bgand to/ mye'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir
171b6('bum): sa kyis kyi khyab pa bstan to/ rlung gi khams pams kyis kyi byas pa'i phyid/ babam gyis kyi byab pa na te/ rnams pa'i 'as su byams kyis kyi rna nga bsas kyis gyi khyab pa bsdad do//
171b7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam kyis kyi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam kyis kyi khyab pa bstand to// ma rig pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam kyis myi khyab pa bsanang to// 'du byed bsam gyis
171b8('bum): byam pa phyir/ bams gis kyi khyab sa 'ad rtsa/ rnam parigs pa ba sakyis kyi byam pa tshor/ mas kyisad/ ma
172a1('bum): gyis myi khyab pa bstand to// skye mched drug bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstan to// reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa pa ha nad to//
172a2('bum): tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa ba ha nang to// sred pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstan to// le nad pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam
172a3('bum): kyis myi khyab pa banyanang to// srid pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstan to// skye ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstan to// rga shi bsam gyis myi
172a4('bum): khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstan to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsam kyis myi bya ba 'i byi sas kyis kyi bya lagan to/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/
172a5('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstan to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin da ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gis myi khyab pa' bsta/ nad to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis myi khyab
172a6('bum): phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa bahan to// lags byas na byal la gu phyen pa lasam byes myi khyab pa bsabasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstan
172a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gis myi khyab pa bstan to// nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gis myi khyab pa ba ha nang to// phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis
172a8('bum): myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa baha nad to// phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gis myi khyab pa baha nad to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi
172b1('bum): khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa kha hand to// chen po stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstan to// don dam pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi bya ba/
172b2('bum): pa banyand to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa ba hanang to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi bya ba la bstan to// mtha
172b3('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstan pa to// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam kyis myi khyab pa bstan to// dor ba myed pa stong
172b4('bum): nyid bsam gis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstand to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa ba ha nad to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid bas
172b5('bum): gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstan to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gis myi khyab pa baha nang to// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
172b6('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gis sti khyab pa'i bstand to// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstan to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gis myi khyab pa'i phyir
172b7('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstan to// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa ba ha nad to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bas
172b8('bum): kyis myi khyab pa bsanang to// yang dag par spong ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstand to// rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa ba han
173a1('bum): dbang po bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gas myi khyab pa ba ha na to// stobs bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa baha nang to// byang chub kyi yan lag bsam
173a2('bum): gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstand to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa ba ha nang ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa bsam
173a3('bum): gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam kyis myi khyab pa banyand to// bsam gtan bsas gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bams kyis myi khyab pa bstan to// chad myed pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam kyis myi khyab pa
173a4('bum): bstan to// gzugs byed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa bsam dkyis kyi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam kyis myi khyab pa banyan to// rnam par thar da pa brgyad bams kyis kyi khyab pa'i phyir/ bas
173a5('bum): kyis kyi khyab pa banyan to// mamad kyis gnas pa'i mapar 'dug pa dgu bsas kyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gas myi khyab pa bstan da / rnam ra tha rad pa'i sgostong pa nyid
173a6('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa skyed pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsas kyis myi khyab pa bstan to// mngon par shes pa bams kyis myi khyab pa'i phyir bams kyis kyi khyab pa' ba can
173a7('bum): yin pasas kyi kyi rtsum pa tshor/ kyi thub pa bstan to/ gzus kyin bams kyis kyi khyab pa'i gyi/ bsas kyis kyi khyab pa / de bzhidi gshegs pa
173a8('bum): bcub mas kyis kyi byab pa'i phyir/ bsam gas kyi khyab pa bsta to/ kyi 'jigs pa gzhibasas kyis kyi byab par bying / bam byas kyi rgyam pa bcas / masang dag pa marig sa pa'i tha sa gyi/
173b1('bum): gyi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam kyis kyi khyab pa bstan to/ snying rjechen po bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam kyis myi khyab pa bstand to// sangasargyam tu tsam ma 'dres pa co brgyad pa ca bya sa bams kyis kyi
173b2('bum): pa bstan to// thams cad shes pa nyid bsas kyis kyi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam kyis kyi khyab pa bsta to// mam gyi rnam pashes pa nyid bsam kyis kyi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam kyi gyi khyab pa bca
173b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstand to//
173b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa co phrag brgya pa/ bam pa / rab 'byor
173b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs bsam gyis kyi tu ma ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
173b6('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe gal te tshor ba bsam kyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes
173b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rosad tu phyind pa sa myod pa'i kas te 'du shes bsam kyis kyi khyab ces bya bar
173b8('bum): 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'du byed bsam
174a1('bum): kyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
174a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
174a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te myig bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'
174a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dpa'i tshe/ gal te rna ba bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'dun sa pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su
174a5('bum): rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ga la te sna bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na// shes
174a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lce bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na
174a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lus bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes
174a8('bum): pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yid bsam gyis myi khyab ces
174b1('bum): bya bar 'du shes pa skyed na/ zhes rab kyi pha ros tu phyinadapa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa ma spyod pa'i tshe g.yang te gzugs
174b2('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
174b3('bum): gal te smra bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sa myod
174b4('bum): pa'i tshe/ gal te dri bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs pa ra byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
174b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ gal te ro bas ma gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub
174b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i rtse/ klas te reg bsam gyis kyi khyab ces bya bar 'du she ba myed pa/ shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
174b7('bum): pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ga lad te chos bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su
174b8('bum): rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ ka lad te myig gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na
175a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
175a2('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa skyed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa che
175a3('bum): gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam kyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myedar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab
175a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la myong ba'i tshe/ gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//
175a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ba'i tshe/ galang te lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes
175a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ gsad te yid kyi rnam par zhes pa bsam kyis
175a7('bum): myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// bya ba chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
175a8('bum): gald te myig gi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
175b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ galar te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub seMs
175b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs
175b3('bum): par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ba'i tshe/ gald ta l+ya'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mye khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa mya ma a/ shes
175b4('bum): rab kyi la rol tu phyin pa la kyad pa 'am/ gal te s+ye'i 'dus te reg pa'i bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
175b5('bum): byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ba'igayad te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam gyis
175b6('bum): myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ g.yang te
175b7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsas kyis kyi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes bskyed na/ shes rab kyi pha ro mang tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
175b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dpyod pa'i che/ galar te myi gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam kyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o
176a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyind pa la myod pa'i ye gsang rten pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis kyi khyab ces bya bar 'du
176a2('bum): shes pa byed pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe g.yang te sna'i 'dus
176a3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub ses
176a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myong pa'i tshe/ gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyi sa tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na
176a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu byind pal myong ba'i gas te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i sbyin
176a6('bum): kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
176a7('bum): pa'i tshe/ galar te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'
176a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ galang te sa'i khams bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs
176b1('bum): par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe gal te chu'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi
176b2('bum): pha rol du phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ba'i me gal te mye'i khams bsam kyis myi khyab ces bya bar
176b3('bum): 'du shes pa myed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe gsang te rlung gi
176b4('bum): khams bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
176b5('bum): tu phyind pa la myong ba'i tshe/ gal te nam mkha'i khams pa sam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang
176b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ gald te rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
176b7('bum): tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ gal te ma rig pa bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du
176b8('bum): shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i tshe gal te
177a1('bum): 'du byed bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes
177a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gal te na par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems
177a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ galar te mying dang gzugs bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yo
177a4('bum): su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa 'i tshegasad te skye mched drug bsam kyis kyi khyab ces bya ba
177a5('bum): 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod sa su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sa gyod
177a6('bum): par 'du shes pad/ sa rab kyi rol tu phyi sa kyi rom tu phyin
177a7('bum): mas bsas kyis kyi byas ces byab bar 'du shes pa gyid// shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang na / sa
177a8('bum): pha rol du khyen pa sa pyod pa'i tshe/ gas te med pa thams kyis kyi khyab ces bya bar 'jugs pabyed na/ shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa
177b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ galar te lend pa bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par
177b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gald te srid pa bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
177b3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ galang te skye ba bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes
177b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rga shi'i bsam gyis myi khyab
177b5('bum): ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
177b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa skyed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems
177b7('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ galang te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs
177b8('bum): su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshegags te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes myed na
178a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gald te brtson 'grus kyi pha
178a2('bum): rol tu phyind pa bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
178a3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'
178a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa chud migag se kyi yo cid sakyi gyis bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub
178a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ galang te nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis rmyi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
178a6('bum): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ galang te phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na
178a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas myod pa'i rtse gsang te phyi na stong pa nyid bsam gyis kyi
178a8('bum): khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rolapa tu phyin pas myod pa'i tshe
178b1('bum): galar te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ shes rab kyi sa lalan tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byad ba/ byang
178b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ g.yad te chen po stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs
178b3('bum): su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gald te don dam pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/
178b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pharol du phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ galang te 'du byas stong pa nyid
178b5('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
178b6('bum): la gyod pa'i tshe/ gald te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
178b7('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam kyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa mye da/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par
178b8('bum): byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ galar te thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na
179a1('bum): gsarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa songs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// bya ba chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gyod pa'im/ gas te dor ba skyed pa
179a2('bum): nga pa nyid thams kyis kyi ches bya bar 'dushes pa byedas/ shes rab kyi sa sa khyim sa songs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// bya chums med thamamasas dpa' can pa/ gas mkhye la tshal du byes
179a3('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ka lar te rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam kyis mye khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa
179a4('bum): mye ngan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzog sa par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la myong ba'i tshe/ kAl
179a5('bum): te chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya ba ra 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod/ sa su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
179a6('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gald te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs
179a7('bum): par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ galang te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa
179a8('bum): myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dngos po myed
179b1('bum): patong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
179b2('bum): tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i rtsegal te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa
179b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ galang te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
179b4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myod pa'i tshe/ ga lar te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsam
179b5('bum): gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol
179b6('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sem
179b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ galar te rdzu 'phrus kyi rkang pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
179b8('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ g.yad te dbang po rnams bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/
180a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ galang te stobs rnams
180a2('bum): bsam kyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i/
180a3('bum): galar te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
180a4('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ galar te 'phags pa'i ma yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs
180a5('bum): par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ba'i tshe/ galar tepags pa'i bden pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du
180a6('bum): shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ba'i tshe gamad te bsam gtan
180a7('bum): rnams bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyi nang pas
