205b4('bum): chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phragamang po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'god par 'gyur/ yang dag par nyond par 'gyur/ yang
205b5('bum): dag par skul bar 'gyur/ yang dag par gzeng bstod par 'gyur/ yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur/ phyir myi ldog par lub ho nad par 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa
205b6('bum): ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg la mos pa brlabs chen por 'gyur te/ de dag sbyin pa rlabs po che gtong bar 'gyur ro/
205b7('bum): sbyin pa brlabs cher btang zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba brlabs po che mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro// de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che mngon par 'dus byas nas rnam par smyind pa rlabs chen po yongs su
205b8('bum): 'dzind par 'gyur te/ de dag rnam par smind pa rlabs chen po yongs su bzung nas/ sems can de dag nyid kyi don tu rnam par smind pa brlabs chen po las de bas kyang / ches brlabs che ba'i
206a1('bum): rnam par sbyid pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'di sar gyi'am ga ma pa da sa can dag nyid ma yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ de dag sa
206a2('bum): cha ba de nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gangan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong pa dang / 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab
206a3('bum): mo 'di nyid kyi chos nyo nad pa mngon du gyu rang pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag la rtend par 'gyur ro// de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams las shes pa
206a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di mngon sum du thos nas/ sang sa rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu yang srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag
206a5('bum): mang po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro// yang dag par skul bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par gzeng btod par 'gyur ro// yang dag par dga'
206a6('bum): bar byed par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams las chos gang
206a7('bum): thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so// de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / gang thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so// sems can rnams kyi sems thugs su mchus
206a8('bum): ba de lta bu gang yang ma mchis pa de ni/ ngo mtshar che ste/ 'di ltar 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyend to// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang yongs su mkhyenang to//
206b1('bum): 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to// ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyend to//
206b2('bum): ma byond pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to// da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos
206b3('bum): rnams kyang yongs su mkhyend to// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /
206b4('bum): chos nyond pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' rnam sa kyang yongs su mkhyend to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /
206b5('bum): nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyend do// bcom ldan 'das gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab pa dang pha rol
206b6('bum): tu phyind pa drug po 'di dag gi slad du/ brtson par bgyid cing / pha rold tu phyind pa drug po 'di dag chos pa dang / yongs su tshol ba'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo pha rol tu phyind pa drug
206b7('bum): po 'di dag tshol ba dang / yongs su chos pa las/ la las ni btsal ba las pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di dag thob par 'gyur la/ la las ni thob par myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
206b8('bum): kyis bka' stsal da pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni de lta ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo brtson 'grus kyi gtong ba de dag kun kyis kyang / pha rol tu phyi nang pa drug po 'di dag thams cad 'grub par
207a1('bum): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di dag gi dond tu brtson par byed pa'i phyir ro//
207a2('bum): gsol da pa/ ci lags bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi mdo'i sde zab mo pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa 'di dag kun kyang 'grub yar 'gyur ras bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
207a3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo sde zab mo zab mo pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa 'di dag myi 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas myed skabs myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
207a4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya chu sems can rnams yang dag par son cing / yang dag pa smras pa dang / yang dag par gzeng bstong pa dang / sang
207a5('bum): dag par dka' bar byed pa dnga'agod cing / rab tu gzhog pa las kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu rigs kyi bu mo de tshe 'das nas kyang / pha rol tu phyin pa
207a6('bum): drug pa 'di dag 'grub par 'gyur ro// de dag ni nas sangs rgyas kyi 'ingo sangs su dag par mabyas sems can yongs su srid par ma byas/ bran byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu
207a7('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur kyi bar du'i skad du ba hand pa'i pha'os du byi nang ba drug po de dag las brtson 'grus nyam zer gyi byed do// / shes rab kyi pha rom tu phyin pa nying dran
207a8('bum): brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu gcig go/
207b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la
207b2('bum): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyod pa/ sems can
207b3('bum): yongs su smyind par bgyid pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gi yon tan yongs su brjod pa ni 'di dag lags na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo bla na myed pa
207b4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa de dag par chad du 'gyur ba ji lta bu dag mchis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de spobs pa ha cang 'phyi
207b5('bum): d+he/ rab 'byor de 'ini byang chub sems dpa' sems de pa'i chen pos bdud kyisas su rig par byar// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du skabs pa
207b6('bum): 'phyi he skye bar 'gyur/ de ni ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su reg par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub ses
207b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dka' bar
207b8('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ tshul khrim
208a1('bum): xxx
208a2('bum): skye bar 'gyur ro// de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi sas su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang nidang du myung bar spobs pa sbyin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
208a3('bum): chen pos/ bdud kyisas su rig par bya'o// gsos pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ shin tu myur bar spobs pa skye bar 'gyur/ den ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
208a4('bum): chen pos/ bdud kyi las su rig par gyi// bcom lda na 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
208a5('bum): tu byind pas myong ba dang / chus khrims kyi pha rol nad pa ma gyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du byin dngos myod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod
208a6('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ba'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ ha cang myur bar spobs pa skye la des rlom sems su byed/
208a7('bum): rab 'byor nga rnam grangs de na/ spobs pa gtsang myur bar skye ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang glal cing/
208a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzin/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang 'god cing 'dzin/ rab
208b1('bum): 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga 'phan tshun steg cing 'drin/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
208b2('bum): chen pos/ bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// sems g.yeng zhing 'drin/ rab 'byor da de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// yi ge gzhan la chags
208b3('bum): shing tshig gi don myi shes par 'dri na rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// 'di'i ro ma myong nas stan las langs te 'gro na/ rab 'byor da de yang
208b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang glal cing lung 'bog na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
208b5('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gral cing kha ton byed dam/ 'dzind tam/ klog gam hon pa dang / glal cing / tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab
208b6('bum): 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang phan tshun dgod cing 'dzind tam 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par
208b7('bum): byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor du gzhan yang phan tshun teg cing 'dzin
208b8('bum): tam 'chang ngam/ klog gam kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor da de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//
209a1('bum): rab 'byor de gzhan yang sems g.yeng bas 'dzind tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam / kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor nga de yang byang chub sems dang
209a2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// / rab 'byor de gzhan yang yi ge gzhan dang gzhan la chags shing 'dzind tama'achang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul
209a3('bum): bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsa lad pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dkyis
209a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// !/ ba ma ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du 'di'i ro ma myong nas bahan la/ sa langs te 'gro narab 'byor da de yang byang chub sems
209a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ zhe/ sa bka' stsal dan/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'di'i ro myi myong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
209a6('bum): stsal pa'i/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang
209a7('bum): pa dang \u0f7fbzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la ma spyad pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di ba ha nad pa'i tshe/
209a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las bdag cag lung ma baha nad to// zhes ma dad pa'i yid kyis han las langs shing 'dong ste rab 'byor da de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/
209b1('bum): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las lung ma pa ha nad par de dag han da mas sangs shing mchi bar 'gyur// bcom
209b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyon myed par ma chud ba ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung myi bstand te/ de la bdag ni
209b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las myi 'byung ngo // bdag gi phying yang yongs su ma brjod do zhes dad par ma gyur dran/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su ma
209b4('bum): par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i sra dadu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi mying yongs su ma
209b5('bum): brjod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sram dang/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems pa' chen po/ lung ma bahand pa rnams kyi mying ni yongs su
209b6('bum): myi brjod de/ de la bdag gi mying yang 'di las myi 'byung / bdag gang du skyes pa'i grong ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal gyi myi 'di yang myi 'byung ngo zhes de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa phyi mnyand to snyam
209b7('bum): byed cing / 'khod de nas 'gro bar sems na/ sems bskyed pa desango ste ji ltar 'gro bar sems shing gom pa ji skad cig bor ba de snyed kyi bskal pa yongs su 'dzin par gyur te/ de dag
209b8('bum): gzod martson par dgos so / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bor zhing / mdo'i sde gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su kyi sgrub pa de dag kun chub par bya bar sems te/ res na
210a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi shing gi cha ba spangs te/ de nyid kyi yal ka dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma la 'ju
210a2('bum): bar sems par gyur pa dag ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
210a3('bum): nyid kyi ye shes yongs su myi sgrub pa'i mdo'i sde kun chub par bgyi bar sems par 'gyur ba de dag gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ mdo' sde gang nyan thos dang ldan pa 'am/ rang
210a4('bum): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag haM/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar ga zhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdulaphrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs snga dang
210a5('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong panyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa rnams te
210a6('bum): de dag la gnas shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid
210a7('bum): 'thob pa dang / rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur gyi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par myi 'gyur ba ste/ rab 'byor de de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo'i sde/
210a8('bum): gang la shes rab kyi pa bang du bye da pa por zhing kun chub par bya bar sems pa rtse/ rnam pa thams cad ma byed pa nyid kyi ye shes mongs su kyi sgrum po'o// bci'i phyi na/ rab 'thos
210b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni/ 'jig rtend pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol
210b2('bum): tu phyind pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'jig rtend pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la skyob pa yin no// rab 'byor du 'di lta ste/ dper/
210b3('bum): khyi la la zhig jo ba'i zan nar ma po rad te/ las myi las zan btsal bar sems pa dang 'dra bar de bzhin du/ rab 'byor dam 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs

210b8('bum): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ myi la la zhig glang po 'dod la/ des glang po rnyed na/ glang po'i rjes btsal bar sems pa yod na/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul
211a1('bum): can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang

211a7('bum): mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya bar sems pa de dag kyang / rnam pa de ltar rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang
211a8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor pa 'di lta he/ dper na/ bya mkha nad nam/ bya mkhan gyi slob ma/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad
211b1('bum): du khang pa zhig dbub cing bslab par 'dod de/ nyi ma dang / zla ba'i gzhal myed khang yongs su btsal bar sems shing / nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal myed khang las tshad blang bar sems na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
211b2('bum): sems skyes bu des/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal myed khang gi tshad kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad dang dpe' tshul bzung ste/ de dang 'dra ba'i khang pa dbub par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
211b3('bum): 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems phya mkhand nam phya mkha nad kyi slob ma de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa
211b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das skyes bu de ni byis pa'i ngang tshul can du rig pa darab kyi ste/ mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin
211b5('bum): du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo la la shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang / shes rab kyi
211b6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo'i sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor
211b7('bum): de la ji snyam du sems byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bde
211b8('bum): bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab
212a1('bum): 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong ba 'dod la/ des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong nas 'di snyam du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de
212a2('bum): de kha dog dang / dbyibs ji 'dra ba zhig yod ces des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs kyi mtshan ma gzung bar bsams te/ 'di skad du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i kha dog dang dbyings

212a5('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te

212a7('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam gsol da pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab
212a8('bum): 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta he dper na/ skyes bu shi nang tu bkres pa la la zhig gis ro brgya dang ldan
212b1('bum): ba'i kha zas rnyed kyang drug cu pa'i kha zas btsal bar sems shing / des kha zas ro rgya dang ldan pa de bor nas/ drug cu pa'i kha zas la bza' bar bsams na/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems
212b2('bum): skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam gsol dpa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs dus na/ byang chub
212b3('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos
212b4('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub
212b5('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de da ga mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan
212b6('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor da de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig
212b7('bum): gis nor bu rin po che ring thar myed pa rnyed nas nor bu mching bu dang skrun par bsams na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems pa/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam gsol pa/ bcom
212b8('bum): ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi
213a1('bum): bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di thos shing / rnyed nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
213a2('bum): dang ldan pa'i mdo'i sde dag las/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor de de la snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
213a3('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor da de yang byang chub
213a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
213a5('bum): zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe spobs pa mang po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i dkrugs mar 'gyur ba de lta bu skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ltar gzug
213a6('bum): kyi spobs pa dang / smra'i spobs pa dang / dri'i spobs pa dang / ro'i spobs pa dang / reg gi spobs pa dang / chos kyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i spobs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi spobs pa
213a7('bum): dang / bzod pa'i spobs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi spobs pa dang / shes rab kyi spobs pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang / gzugs
213a8('bum): kyi khams kyi spobs pa dang / gzugs byed pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / 'aton bya ba'i spobs pa dang / rim mo bya ba'i spobs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gal
213b1('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba'i spobs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i spobs pa dang / dbang po'i spobs pa dang / stobs kyi spobs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi spobs pa dang / lam gyi
213b2('bum): spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi spobs pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i spobs pa dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi spobs pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i spobs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /
213b3('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / byi nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / 'dus byas
213b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyi da kyi spobs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi spong sa pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi spos mdor ba
213b5('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / rang bzhin hong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi spob sa pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /
213b6('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /
213b7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i spobs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin 'i spobs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i spobs pa dang / batshon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i spobs pa dang
213b8('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i spobs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i spobs pa dang / stobs bcu'i spobs pa dang / myi 'jigs pa'i spobs dang / so so yang dag par rig
214a1('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun da tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i slobs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang
214a2('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i spobs pa dang / rang byang chub kyi spobs pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ro// de tsal
214a3('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni spobs pa myed pas rnam par byang ba'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// rab 'byor shes rab kyi sa
214a4('bum): rol tu phyind pa ni sems myed pa'o// rab 'byorashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni skye ba myed cing 'gag pa mye dpa'o// rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni
214a5('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa myed cing rnam par byang ba myed pa'o// rab 'byor da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni 'khrug pa rgya da po/ rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni brjod
214a6('bum): du myed pa'o// rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rnam par byang ba myed pa'o// rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol phyind pa ni dmyigs pa myed pa'o// rab 'byor de de ci'i phyir zhe na/
214a7('bum): chos de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la myed cing myi dmyigs te/ rab 'byor da gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
214a8('bum): pa zab mo 'dri ba'i tshe/ chos de dag gis 'khrug par gyur na rab 'byor da de yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//
214b1('bum): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bri bar nus sam/ bcom
214b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de lta ma yin no// rab 'byor de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te/ myi dmyigs so/
214b3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
214b4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te/ myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid
214b5('bum): yod pa ma yin te/ myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te myi dmyigs so// phyi ho/ nga pa nyid ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te myi dmyigs so// phyi nang
214b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te/ myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te myi dmyigs so
214b7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma
214b8('bum): yind te myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ myi dmyigs so// dor
215a1('bum): pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te/ myi dmyigs so rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid
215a2('bum): yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te myi dmyigs so// dngos po
215a3('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te/
215a4('bum): myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te/ myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs/
215a5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ myi dmyigs so// stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa
215a6('bum): ma yind te/ myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te/ myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te myi dmyigs so/
215a7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi phyigaso bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te myi dmyigs so//
215a8('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te/ myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa
215b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yind te myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ myi dmyigs so
215b2('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so//
215b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa
215b4('bum): ma yin te myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so//
215b5('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyi gas so// lam gyi rnam pa zhes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
215b6('bum): nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid myi dmyigs pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ dngos po
215b7('bum): skyed pas dngos po myed pa bri bar myi nus so// rab 'byor dgal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos/ shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di dngos po byed
215b8('bum): ces bya bar 'du shes na/ de yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gsos pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang ma las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
216a1('bum): pa zab mo 'di yig ger bris nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa zab mo 'di bdag gis bris so zhes mchin de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la yig ker mngon par
216a2('bum): chags pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa
216a3('bum): ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin dpa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ni sri gre ma mchis pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni yi ge sa
216a4('bum): mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'du shes ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis
216a5('bum): ba'o// rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// myig ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rna ba ni yi ge ma mchis so// sA ni si ge ma mchis pa'o// lce ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/
216a6('bum): lus ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// yid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// smra ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// dri ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// ron yi ge ma mchis pa'o/
216a7('bum): rin na la shes mchis pa'/ chos ma mi gas mchis pa'o// myig gi rnas par shes pa ni yi shes mchis pa'o// na ba'i rnam par shes pa ni mi sems / pa'i rnam par shes par
216a8('bum): yi ge sa mchis pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lo gas mchis pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mi ses mchis pa ma/ byig gi 'dus
216b1('bum): te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg
216b2('bum): pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni
216b3('bum): ge ma mchis pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni
216b4('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis so// sa'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// chu'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mye'i Shas
216b5('bum): ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rlung gi khams ni yi ge ma mchis ba'o// nam mkha'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis po// ma rig
216b6('bum): pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mying dang gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// skye mched drug ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// reg pa
216b7('bum): ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// tshor ba ni yi ge la ma mchis pa'o// sred pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// se nad pa ni yi ge mchis pa'o// sred pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// skye ba ni yi ge ma mchis so//
216b8('bum): ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// nang tong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis
216b9('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni yi le ma mchis so//
217a1('bum): pa'o// don dam stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa tong pa
217a2('bum): stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis so/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// chos
217a3('bum): thams cad hong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis
217a4('bum): pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis so/ yang
217a5('bum): dag par spong ba rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// dbang po rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// stobs rnams ni yi ge ma mchis
217a6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// bsam gtan rnams
217a7('bum): ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// tshad myed pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam par thar pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mtha
217a8('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mngon
217b1('bum): bar shes pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni yi ge ma
217b2('bum): mchis pa'o// myi 'jigs pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis po/ snying rje chen po ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni
217b3('bum): ge ma mchis pa'o// thams cad shes pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan
217b4('bum): 'das ga lad te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo yi ge ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par chags par bgyi la/ yi ge
217b5('bum): ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon bar chags par bgyid cing / yi ge ma mchis pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
217b6('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis
217b7('bum): pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i phyi stong pa nyid la mngon
217b8('bum): bar chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i stong pa nyid stong ba nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
217b9('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa zhen pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang yi ge ma mchis pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang
218a1('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'du kya tong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / mi ke ma mchis pa'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i ma
218a2('bum): las 'das pa' tong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i thog ma dang ma ma myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par 'gyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dor ba myed pa tong pa nyid la mngon
218a3('bum): bar chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i chos thas cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par
218a4('bum): bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis dpa'i myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa
218a5('bum): dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la ma don par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge
218a6('bum): ma mchis pa'i dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mtsham
218a7('bum): ba'i yang dag par spong ba rnams su mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / bshes 'i du thub gyi sa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid ba dang / mi ge ma mchis pa'i dbang po rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid
218a8('bum): ba dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i lag sa
218b1('bum): bal mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i ba sa pags pa'i ban rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
218b2('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i tshad myed pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam
218b3('bum): par tha rad pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam par tha rad
218b4('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang can byed pa rlo myed pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma
218b5('bum): mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzind rnams mngon par chags par bgyidapa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mdo na bar chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i de
218b6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i myi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i so so yang dag
218b7('bum): par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i snying rje chen po la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la
218b8('bum): bar chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid
219a1('bum): pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid na/ de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi'o//
219a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de de de bzhin no// de de bzhin no// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo// shes rab kyi sa
219a3('bum): rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / kha ton byed pa dang / zhu ba dang / 'dzind pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa'i tshe yul gyi yid
219a4('bum): la bya ba mang po skyed na/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
219a5('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo/ 'di 'dri ba dang / kha rton byed pa dang / zhu ba dang / 'arje/ nad pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul
219a6('bum): bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa'i tshe/ yul gyi yid la bya ba dang / rab 'byor dang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byarang gzhan yang
219a7('bum): dpa' thag sa 'apa' rags kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dre ba dang / kha ton byed pa dang / zhu ba dang / 'dzind pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa
219a8('bum): dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / skam pa'i'atsha/ grong gi yid la bya ba dang / grong rdal gyi yid la bya ba dang / khams kyi yid la bya ba dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi yid la bya ba dang /
219b1('bum): khyim gyi yid la bya ba dang / bla ma dang / mkhan po'i yid la bya ba dang / ma dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / pha dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / bu mu dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / sring mo dang ldan
219b2('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba dang / gnyen bshes dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / rkunang po dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / phyag rdar ba dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / 'jig rtend pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
219b3('bum): ba dang / srulang 'tshong ma dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / bud myed dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / yid la bya ba gzhan mang po skye na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /
219b4('bum): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha / ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ bar/ chad bya ba'i phyir bdud sdig to can 'khrug par 'gyur ba nye bar
219b5('bum): sbyor ba te/ de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
219b6('bum): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/ bye dang bkur bsti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / chos gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyend ce
219b7('bum): dang / yo byad mang po byung la/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / 'aton
219b8('bum): byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de'i tshe/ de dag gi ro myong bar byed na/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya ste/ shes rab kyi
220a1('bum): pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bor dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ bar chad de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
220a2('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
220a3('bum): byed pa dang / bsgom pa'i tshe bdud sdig to dag mdo sde zab mo zab mo gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phru
220a4('bum): kyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / hobs na/ rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar
220a5('bum): ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dag nye bar bsnyend par byed de/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo thabs ma khas
220a6('bum): pas bdud kyis bsnyend pa'i mdo sde zangasas de dag la 'dod pa myi bskyed do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de
220a7('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' thabs myi mkhas pa dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems te/ de la ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la thabs mkhas pa
220a8('bum): pa yang rgya cher bahand te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las kyang thabs mkhas pa rgya cher btsal bar bya'o// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu
220b1('bum): dang / rigs kyi bu mol shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thor zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las thabs mkhas pa btsal bar sems sa yongs/ rab 'byor de
220b2('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu gnyis so//
220b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po / rab 'byor nga gzhan yang chos nyand pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol
220b4('bum): tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya bar dga' la chos smra ba ni phyi shol byed na/ rab 'a byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
220b5('bum): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya bar phyi shol myi byed la/ chos
220b6('bum): nyand pa ni yul gzhan du 'gro nang / rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang chos nyand pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
220b7('bum): phyi nad pa 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya bar 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni yul gzhan du 'gro na/ rab 'byor da de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las
221a1('bum): su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/ bye dang bkur bsti dang / tshigs su bcad pa lhur lend cing / gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen
221a2('bum): pi dang / so byad skur le da la/ chos nya rad pa ni 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes la rab tu dben zhing / brtson 'grus pa rtsams pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myi g.yeng ba/ sems le gcig tu 'dus pa/ shes
221a3('bum): rab dang ldan pa zhig ste byer dang bkur bstis 'jigs na/ rab 'byor des bshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen gyi ldan pa nye
221a4('bum): rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan sa bachos smra ba ni/ 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes la rab tu dben
221a5('bum): zhing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myi g.yeng ba/ sems che gcig tu 'dus pa shes rab dang ldan bzhig te/ kye dang bkur bstis 'jigs la/ chos
221a6('bum): nyand pa ni 'dod pa che zhing / sdig to 'dod la/ kye dang bkur bsti dang / tshigs su bcad pa spur lend cing gos dang / zas dang / mas cha dang / nad kyi rkyen ci dang / yo byad lhur len na/ @
221a7('bum): 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
221a8('bum): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/ dgond pa pa bsod snyoms pa/ phyag dar khrod pa/ zas phyis myi lend pa/ ha nad cig pa/ ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms
221b1('bum): mend pa/ dur khrod pa/ bla gab myed pa/ shing drung ba/ cog pu pa/ gzhi bzhin pa/ chos gos gsum par gyur da la/ chos nyand pa ni/ dkon pa pa ma yin/ bsod snyoms pa ma yin/
221b2('bum): ma mi yini/ phyag dar khrod pa ma yin/ zas phyis myi lend pa ma yin/ han cig pa ma yin/ ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms lend pa ma yin/ dur khrod pa ma yin/ bla gab myed pa ma yin/
221b3('bum): shing drung ba ma yin/ cog pu pa ma yin/ gzhi ci bzhin pa yin/ chos gos gsum pa ma yin na/ rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu

221b5('bum): bsod snyoms pa/ phyag dar khrod pa/ zas phyis myi lend pa ha nad gcig pa/ zas ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms lend pa/ dur khrod pa/ bra ga ba myed pa/ shing drung pa/ cog pu pa
221b6('bum): gzhi ci bzhin pa/ chos gos gsum par gyur la/ chos smra pa ni dgond pa pa ma yin/ bsod snyoms pa ma yin/ phyag dar thod pa ma yin/ zas phyis myi lend pa ma yin/ stan da cig pa ma yin/
221b7('bum): ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms lend pa ma yin/ dur khrod pa ma yin/ bla gab myed pa ma yin/ shing drung ba ma yin/ cog pu pa ma yin/ gzhi ci bzhin pa ma yin/ chos gos gsum pa ma yin/ bsod
221b8('bum): snyoms lend pa ma yin na// rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen gyi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub seMs
222a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan la bcos nyand ba ni/ dad cing bsam pa dges shes rab kyi pha ros da tu byin pa zab mo 'di'
222a2('bum): bar 'dod/ sung 'bog par 'dod/ kha ton byed par 'dod la// chos smra ba ni ma dad pa/ tshul khrims ngand pa can sdig pa can zhig ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar myi 'dod/
222a3('bum): lung 'bog par myi 'dod/ kha ton byed par myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyend myi ldan pa ste/
222a4('bum): rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni dad cing bsam pa dge la/ shes
222a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'dod lung 'bogadapal ton byed par 'dod la/ chos nyand pa ni ma dang na rab 'byor da de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di
222a6('bum): 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byorang
222a7('bum): gzhan yang chos smra ba ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing / sems la chags pa myed/ chos nyand pa ni ser sna can chags pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'jungs par gyur na/ rab 'byor de de yang shes
222a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyining pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa'i he/ rab 'byor da de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las su rig
222b1('bum): par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyand pa ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing / sems la chags pa myed la/ chos smra ba ni ser sna can chags pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'jungs
222b2('bum): bar gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyend kyi ldan pa nye/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' ses

222b4('bum): su gtong bar 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni lend par myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor nga de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lu 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu
222b5('bum): rkyenang myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyisas su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor dag zhan yang chos smra ba ni/ glengs matsam
222b6('bum): gyis zhes lug chos nya nad pa ni dkro dgos zhing thig turdzas nang par gyur na/ tshub 'byor rje yang zhes rab kyi pha ro son tu phyin da bra la nam 'da'adri ma dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed
222b7('bum): pa'i rgyu rgyu dang myi ldan pa ste// rab 'byor da do yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyims su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang chos nyand pa ni glengs pa tsam gyis
222b8('bum): shes la/ chos smra ba ni dkri dgos shing tshig spur le nad par gyur da na/ rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i byed pa'i
223a1('bum): rgyu rkye nang myi ldan pa he// rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang chos smra ba ni mdo' dang dbyangs kyis
223a2('bum): bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shi nang tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung
223a3('bum): ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa ba ha nad pa'i chos kyi khyad par shes la/ chos nyand pa ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung ba ha nad pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang
223a4('bum): ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shi nang tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang rtog rlon/ tan la bab pa ba ha nad pa'i
223a5('bum): chos kyi khyad par myi shes na/ rab 'byor nga de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyenang myi ldan
223a6('bum): ba ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang chos nyand pa ni mdo' dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /
223a7('bum): lung ba ha nad pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi' dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shi nad tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang
223a8('bum): rtogs brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa mas nad pa'i chos kyi byed par shes la chos smra ba ni/ mdol dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung ba hand ba dang / tshigs mi pa dang / rer
223b1('bum): du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shi nad tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa rjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa bstand pa'i chos kyi khyad
223b2('bum): par myi shes na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di 'dra ba dang / sung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyend myi ldan pa'i ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

223b6('bum): ba drug dang myi ldan na/ rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa / rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dang
223b7('bum): sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug la/ thabs mkhas la/ chos nyand pa ni pha rol tu phyinang pa rdzun
223b8('bum): la thabs myi mkhas na/ rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems da
224a1('bum): sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni pha rol tu phyind pa drug la/ thabs mkhas la/ chos smra ba ni/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug

224a3('bum): chen pos/ bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/ gzungs thob par gyur pa la chos nyand pa ni gzungs ma thob na/ rab 'byor da de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
224a4('bum): phyin pa pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / ton byed pa rgyu rkyenang myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor da de yang byangachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las
224a5('bum): su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang chos nyand pa ni gzungs thob par gyur da la/ chos smra ba ni gzungs ma thob na// rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab
224a6('bum): mo 'di 'dri pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyend mya ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor da de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab
224a7('bum): 'byor nga gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/ 'dri bar 'dod/ klag par 'dod/ lung 'bog par 'dod/ kha ton bya bar 'dod/ bsgom par 'dod la/ chos nyand pa ni 'dri bar myi 'dod/ klag par myi 'dod
224a8('bum): lung 'bog par myi 'dod kha ton bya bar myi 'dod/ nyan par myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha tor byed pa'i rgyu rkyen kyi
224b1('bum): ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang chos nyand pa ni/ 'dri bar 'dod/ lung 'bog par 'dod
224b2('bum): kha ton bya bar 'dod/ mnyand par 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni 'di 'dri bar myi 'dod/ klag par myi 'dod/ lung 'bog par myi 'dod kha ton bya bar myi 'dod/ bsgom par myi 'dod par gyur na/
224b3('bum): rab 'byor da de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
224b4('bum): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/ 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bral/ gnod sems dang / snyom pa dang / gnyid dang / 'gyod pa dang
224b5('bum): bral/ the tsom dang bral la/ chos nyand pa ni/ 'dod pa'i sred pa dang / bcas/ gnod sems dang / snyom ba dang / gnyid dang / 'gyod pa dang bcas/ the tsom
224b6('bum): dang bcas par gyur na/ rab 'byor da de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyend myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor da de yang byang chub sems dpa'
224b7('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang chos nyand pa ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bral/ gnod sems dang / snyom pa dang / gnyid dang / 'gyod pa dang bral
224b8('bum): the tsom dang bral/ chos smra ba ni/ 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bcas/ gnod sems dang / snyom pa dang / gnyid dang / 'gyod pa dang bcas/ the tsom dang bcas par gyur na/ rab 'byor da de
225a1('bum): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi/
225a2('bum): las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'chad pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid
225a3('bum): byed pa'i tshe/ la la zhig der 'ongs te/ sems can dmyal ba'i myi snyand pa rjod/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul gyi myi snyanang brjod cing / sems can
225a4('bum): dmyal ba ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo// byol song gi skye gan/ sa ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo/ yi dgas kyi yul ni 'odi lta/ ra sdug bsngal lo// khyod kyis sdug bsngal 'di nyid du mthar
225a5('bum): phyind par gyis shig/ gang la sdug bsngal stong phrag mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la de ci zhig bya/ khyod yun
225a6('bum): ring por 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur da ta re zhes zer na/ rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyend myi ldan pa ste/
225a7('bum): rab 'byor da de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang
225a8('bum): klog pa dang / lung 'bog gdang kha ton byed pa dang 'chang pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ la la zhig der 'ongs te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi legs brjod cing
225b1('bum): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi legs parjod/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjodadaga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ gzhan 'phrul dbang
225b2('bum): byed kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyi legs brjod/ tshangs pa kund 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshangs chen gyi
225b3('bum): rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ chung snang gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod
225b4('bum): dge ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ chung dge'i lha rnams kyi legs brjod/ tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rje dad dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi legs parjod/ che ba'i rnas kyi
225b5('bum): legs pa rjod/ chung che'i lha rnams kyi legs brjodatshadamyed che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs brjod myi che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa
225b6('bum): rjod/ myi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ shi nad tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi legs brjodagya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs brjod/ 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod// nam maH
225b7('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha nas kyi legs brjod rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs parjod/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs parjod/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched
225b8('bum): kyi lha rnams kyi legs parjod cing / 'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa la longs spyod pas/ 'di ltar bde'o// gzugs kyi khams ni bsam gtan dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis/ gzug
226a1('bum): byed pa'i 'ams ni nyams par 'dug pazhi rnams kyis 'disar byed / de dag kyang phyi rtag cing sdug bsngal la bdag myed do// rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos sam/ zad pa'i chos pan/
226a2('bum): 'jig pa'i chos can/ skye ba'i chos can/ 'gag pa'i chos can yin gyis khyod kyis 'di nyid du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyis shig/ land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i
226a3('bum): 'drus chudang / sgra bcom pa nyid tho par gyis shig/ 'di nyid du rang byang chub thob par gyis // phyid pad 'khor ba nas 'khor bar gyis shig/ ces 'i radu/ rab 'byor de sa shes rab kyi pha
226a4('bum): tu byi nang ma zab mo 'di 'bri dang / lung 'bog pa dang / ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyenang kyi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las su

226a6('bum): pa dang pom 'i rkyed gyi ldang ste/ khyod des kyang chung pos dang mes dpa'i chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya/ rab 'byor de gzhan yang chos nyand pa ni gcig pu he zla myed cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/ chos smra ba ni 'khor gyi nang
226a7('bum): na gnas na/ rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

226b4('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/ 'di skad du/ su nga'i daphyi bzhin du 'brang ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'drir sbyin no// zhes zer la/ chos nyand pa ni phyi bzhin myi 'brang na/ rab
226b5('bum): 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor nga de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
226b6('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyand pa ni/ chos sba ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni drung du 'gro ba'i skabs myi 'byed na/ rab 'byor da de
226b7('bum): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i sgra rkyen gyi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las
226b8('bum): su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/ zang zing chung zad kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'drir gzhug par 'dod/ klog tu gzhug par 'dod/ lung
227a1('bum): 'bog par 'dod/ kha ton byed du gzhug par 'dod la/ chos nyand pa ni/ zang zing cung zad kyi phyir/ drung du 'gro bar ma mos na/ rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
227a2('bum): zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyend myi ldan pa te/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//
227a3('bum): rab 'byor nga gzhan yang chos nyand pa ni zang zing chung zad kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dri bar 'dod/ klag par 'dod/ kha ton bya bar 'dod/ bsgom par 'dod/ nyand par 'dod
227a4('bum): chos smra ba ni/ zang zing chung zad kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sbyin par myi 'dod/ 'drir gzhug paramyi 'dod/ klog tu gzhug par myi 'dod/ lung 'bog par
227a5('bum): myi 'dod/ kha ton byed du gzhug par myi 'dod/ sgom du gzhug par myi 'dod/ nyan tu gzhug par myi 'dod// rab 'byor nga de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di
227a6('bum): 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
227a7('bum): gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/ gang du srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyand pa ni der 'gro bar myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor da de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo
227a8('bum): 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//
227b1('bum): rab 'byor nga gzhan yang chos nyand pa ni/ gang du srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni/ der 'gro myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo//

227b3('bum): yang chos smra ba ni/ gang na zas dkon pa dang / gang na chu dkond pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyand pa ni der 'gro bar myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo
227b4('bum): 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyenang myi ldan pa te/ rab 'byor dade yang byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//
227b5('bum): rab 'byor nga gzhan yang chos nyand pa ni/ gang na zas dang/ nad pa dang / chu dkon pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la chos smra ba ni der 'gro bar myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor nga de yang
227b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las su
227b7('bum): rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan sang chos smra ba ni/ gang na zas mod pa dang / chu mod pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyand pa yang rjes su 'brang na/ des de la 'di skad du rigs kyi
227b8('bum): bu khyod zang zing gi don tu song ste/ ci rung legs par bsam pa sems par gyis shig/ zas thob ma thob dang / gsod kyi gsod kyis 'gyod par gyur da ta re zhes zer na de'i phyir chos nyond pa des kyang
228a1('bum): thabs phra mos chos la spang ba byas par 'gyur te/ de yang myi dga' zhing 'di snyam du 'du shes te/ 'di ni sbyin par 'dod pa'i mtshan ma ma yin gyi spong ba'i mtshan ma yin no snyam na/ rab 'byor
228a2('bum): de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyend myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor da de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las su
228a3('bum): rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang dge slong chos smra ba gang na/ rkunang po'i 'jigs pa dang / chos po'i 'jigs pa dang / rngon pa'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang /
228a4('bum): sbrul gyi 'jigs pa dang / 'brog dgon pa'i 'arigs pa yod pa der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyand pa drag kyang tsho kyi'o na yid kyis skom zhing rjes su 'brang na/ dge slong chos smrabs chos
228a5('bum): nyand pa de dag la 'di skad smras te/ rigs kyi bu dag byed pa/ ngan rku nad po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom po'i 'jigs pa dang rngo nad pa'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs pa
228a6('bum): dang / sbrul gyi 'jigs pa dang / 'brog dgond pa'i 'jigs pa yod pa der dong ste/ ci rung zhes de ltar dge slong chos smra ba des chos myi bstand pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzir
228a7('bum): gzhug par myi 'dod/ klog tu gzhug par myi 'dod/ lung 'bog par myi 'dod/ kha ton byed du gzhug par myi 'dod/ nya nang tu gzhug par myi 'dod par gyur da la/ de dag gis dge slong chos smra ba'i tshig de dag
228a8('bum): thos nas/ dga' zhing myi dga' ba'i tshul can du gyur te/ dge slong chos smra ba gang na ba der 'gro bar myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / sung 'bog pa dang /
228b1('bum): kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang dge slong chos smra ba ni/ bsod snyoms
228b2('bum): gtong ba'i grong khyer gtso bor byed par gyur te/ de bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer gtso' bor gyur pas/ bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong dag/ de yang dang yang blta bar sems shing / der yang dang yang blta bas
228b3('bum): chos nyand pa phyir zlog cing / tshe dang ldan pa dag ngas ni bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong blta dgos te/ thos na snyoms matong ba'i grong blta dgos s+ho/ bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong du 'gro dgos so zhes nas
228b4('bum): des chos nyand pa de dag phyir zlog pa'i phyir/ 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu
228b5('bum): rkyend myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor da de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag/
228b6('bum): slong gi cha byad du byas shing / ci nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di su yang 'dri bar myi 'gyur ba dang / lung 'bog par myi 'gyur ba dang / kha ton byed par myi 'gyur ba dang
228b7('bum): bzhin du yid la byed par myi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar thabs sbyor ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
228b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du bgyis shing / ci nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di su yang 'dri bar myi 'gyur ba dang / lung 'bog par
229a1('bum): 'gyur ba dang / kha ton bgyid par myi 'gyur ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par myi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar thabs sbyor ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
229a2('bum): rab 'byor nga 'di la bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / 'di skad du nged kyis ci ltar khong du chud pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di yind te/ ci skad du khyod klog pa de ni/ shes rab
229a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// zhes dben byed cing zlog la/ mos pa myed par byed do// rab 'byor de la bdud sdig to can gyis/ de ltar dben byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
229a4('bum): lung ma pa ha nad pa de dag ni the tsom skye bar 'gyur te/ ded ga the tsom du gyur pa nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa za ba mo 'di myi 'dri bar 'gyur/ myi klog par 'gyur/ lung
229a5('bum): myi 'bog par 'gyur/ kha ton myi byed par 'gyur/ bsgo ma par myi 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid kyi byed par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di
229a6('bum): 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen gyi ldan pa' ste/ rab 'byor nga de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
229a7('bum): gzhan yang bdun sdig tocan dag dge slong gi sa byang du byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs shing / 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' can pog
229a8('bum): rab kyi pha ro la tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis byed pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byed par 'gyur te/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ro// de ni land cig phyir 'o 'i
229b1('bum): 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ro// deni rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro// zhes zer na/ des tshig de thos nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
229b2('bum): pa la myi myod na/ rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
229b3('bum): dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa'i che/ bar chad du 'gyur ba'i bdud kyi las mang du 'byung ste/ bdud
229b4('bum): kyi las de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud dkyi las de dag rig par bya ste/ rig par byas nas/ rnam par spang bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal
229b5('bum): pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rin/
229b6('bum): par bgyis te/ spang bar bgyi ba de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las rab 'byor de bsam
229b7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byor nga bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzun

230a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rnam par spang bar bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i mdol
230a2('bum): sde dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya ste/ rnam par spang bar bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang dang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa
230a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa tong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa

230a8('bum): bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang / bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gis byang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems
230b1('bum): dpa' chen po la nye bar bstend te/ de yang de la dga' ba skyed na rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyend myi ldan pa ste

230b6('bum): yang bdud sdig to can dag rigs kyi bu de'i mdun du sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun nye bar stond te/ des de la 'dod pa bskyed cing / bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs
230b7('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bur shog shig/ ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dis tshogs yongs su bsdus pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang tshogs yongs su bsdu
230b8('bum): bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'di chos ji ltar nang pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos pa stand par bya'o// zhes ri dkris 'dod pa srung pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
231a1('bum): yongs su nyam par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dade yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dmyi ldan pa se rab 'byor/

231a3('bum): dum/ byang chub sems dpal+ya stong phrag du ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / brtson

231a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag la 'dod pa skyed par 'gyuraro/ des de dag la 'dod pa skyed nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyam par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de
231a6('bum): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dra ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / skom pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor
231a7('bum): 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la gzugs myed do// tshor ba myed/
