278a8('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i hond pa lags ji ltar na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ho nad pa lags/ ji ltar na/ bsam gtan rnams
278b1('bum): mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du stond pa lags ji ltar na tshad myed pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags ji ltar na gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i
278b2('bum): slad du nyond pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam par tha rad pa brgyad pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ho nad pa lags/ ji ltar na/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du
278b3('bum): nyond pa lags/ ji ltar na/ stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du stond pa lags/ ji ltar na mtshan myed pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du nyond pa lags/ ji ltar na/ smond pa myed pa mthon
278b4('bum): ba ma mchis pa'i slad du stonang pa lags/ ji ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du hond pa lag sa/ ji ltar na/ ting nge 'dzind rnams mthong ba ma mchis
278b5('bum): pa'i slad du stonang pa lags ji ltar na gzungs kyi smon mas mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du nyond pa lagasaji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mthong ba ma mchi/
278b6('bum): pa'i slad du nyond pa lags/ ji ltar na myi 'jigs pa bzhi mthang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du stond pa lags/ ji ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du nyond pa lags
278b7('bum): ji ltar na snying rje chen po mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du tond pa lags/ ji ltar na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du stonang pa lags/ ji ltar na/ rgyu nang tu
278b8('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du nyon pa lags/ ji ltar na/ la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du nyond pa lags/ ji ltar na/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i
279a1('bum): 'bras bu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du stonang pa lags/ ji ltar na rang byang chub mthong ba ma mchis pa'i hond pa
279a2('bum): lags/ ji ltar na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du nyond pa lags/ ji ltar na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du stonang pa lags bco
279a3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de nam gzugs la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ gzugs mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi
279a4('bum): 'byung ba'i tshe/ tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ho nad pa'o// nam 'du shes la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'du shes mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ho nad pa'o// nam 'du
279a5('bum): byed la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe 'du byed mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// nam rnam par she sa pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/
279a6('bum): rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// nam myig la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ myig mthong ba myed pa'i nyo nad pa'o// nam rna ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes
279a7('bum): ba myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rna ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyonang pa'o// nam sna la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sna mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ho nang pa'o// nam lce la dmyigs pa'i rnam par
279a8('bum): shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe lce mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam lus la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lus mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyo nad pa'o// nam yid la dmyigs pa
279b1('bum): rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ yid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam gzugs la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ gzugs mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyonang pa'o// nam sprul
279b2('bum): dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i rje/ smra mthong ba skyed pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam dri la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i rje/ dri mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam rol
279b3('bum): dbyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i rje/ ri mthong ba skyed pa'i phyir stonang pa'o// nam reg la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i che/ reg mthong ba byed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam chos
279b4('bum): la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ chos mthong ba myed pa'i phyir hond pa'o// nam myig gi rna dam par shes pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe
279b5('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir gyon pa'on ldan pa'i rnam par shes pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa phyin byung ba'i rtse/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyi
279b6('bum): na pa'o// nam pa rnam par shes pa myigs pa'i na ge sna 'i/ pa'i rnam par dashes pa yod pa byed pa'i phyir ston pa'o// sbyin pa shes pas dmyigs pa les pa /
279b7('bum): pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lce'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// nas lus kyi rnam par shes zla dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i
279b8('bum): phyir nyond pa'o// nam yid kyi rnam par shes pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba 'gyed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// nam myig gi 'dus te reg pa sa
280a1('bum): dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/
280a2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyo nad pa'o// nam sna'i 'dus te reg pa' la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba myed pa kyi nyond pa'o// nam lce'i dus
280a3('bum): te reg pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lce'i dus te reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyo nad pa'o// nam lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sus kyi yu
280a4('bum): te reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston sngon ma yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ yid 'dus te reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir/ ho nad pa'o//
280a5('bum): nam myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la dmyigs pa'irnam pa shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyu nad kyis tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam na hA
280a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// nam sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
280a7('bum): la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ho nad pa'o// nam lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa/
280a8('bum): myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/
280b1('bum): rgya 'gyur ba/ yul 'dus te rag thal rgyan kyis char ba mthang ba myang pa'i phyar ha nad pa'/ nas lus kyi 'dus te rag pa'i rgyan dkyis la 'am pal myags pa la rnam par shes pa s+ya 'byung ba'acha/ lus kyi
280b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba skyed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor/
280b3('bum): ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam sa'i khams la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa gyi 'byung ba'i che/ sa'i khams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ho nad pa'o// nam chu'i khams la dmyigs pa'i rnam par
280b4('bum): shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ chu'i khams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir/ nyond pa'o// nam mye'i khams la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes/ pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ mye'i khams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir
280b5('bum): stonang pa'o// nam rlung gi khams la dmyigs pa'i rnam par she/ sa pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rlung gi khams mthong ba myed pa'i phyirahond pa'o// nas nam mkha'i khams la dmyigs pa'i rnam par/
280b6('bum): shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ nam mkha'i khams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ho nad pa'o// nam rnam par shes pa'i khams la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mthong
280b7('bum): ba skyed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam ma rig pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ ma rig pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir hond pa'o// nam 'du byed la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'a
280b8('bum): ba'i tshi 'du byed mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyon pa'o// nam rnam par shes pa dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mthong ba byed pa'i phyir tsho rang pa'o// nam mying dang gzug
281a1('bum): la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ mying dang gzugs mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam skye mched drug la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ skye mched drug
281a2('bum): mthong ba myed pa'i phyir hond pa'o// nam reg pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i
281a3('bum): tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ho nad pa'o// nam sred pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sred pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyo nad pa'o// nam le nad pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe
281a4('bum): le nad pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ho nad pa'o// nam srid pa' la/ dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ srid pa mthong / ba myed pa'i phyir nyon rnonam skye ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa
281a5('bum): myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ skye ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir hond pa'o// nam rga shi la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rga shi mthong ba myed pa'i phyir hond pa'o// nam sbyin pa'i pha
281a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mthong ba'i myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi
281a7('bum): 'byung ba'i cha/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byur ba'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pal
281a8('bum): mthong ba myed pa'i phyir honang pa'o// nam patshon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir hond pa'o//
281b1('bum): nam bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dmyigs/
281b2('bum): pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyon pa'o// nas nang stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid mthong ba
281b3('bum): myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam phyi ngong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i// ras bya ra la nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i rgya/ phyi stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir
281b4('bum): ho nad pa'o// nam phyi nang stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la dmyigs
281b5('bum): pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ stong pa nyid hong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam chen po hong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i cha
281b6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid mthong ba'i myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam don dam pa stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam
281b7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyo nad pa'o// nam 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi
281b8('bum): 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyond dpa'o// nam mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe mtha' las 'das pa hong
282a1('bum): pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ho nad pa'o// nam thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid mthong ba myed/
282a2('bum): pa'i phyir ho nang po/ nam dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam rang bzhin stong pa nyid la dmyig
282a3('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe rang bzhin stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ho nang de/ nam chos thams cad stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ chos thams cad tong pa
282a4('bum): nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyonang pa'o// nam rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung / ba'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i
282a5('bum): phyir nyo nang pa'o// nam myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la dmyig sa pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pastong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir sgo nad pa'o// nam dngos
282a6('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ho nad pa'o// nam ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung
282a7('bum): ba'i rtsa ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyon pa'o// nam dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong
282a8('bum): ba myed pa'i phyir hond pa'o// nam dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam yang dag par
282b1('bum): spong ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe
282b2('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ho nang pa'o// nam dbang po la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dbang po rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir hond pa'o// nam hobs la dmyigs
282b3('bum): pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ stobs rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir honang pa'o// nam byang chub kyi yan lag la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
282b4('bum): mthong ba myed pa'i phyir honyo nad pa'o// nam 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'gyu nga ba'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthong
282b5('bum): ba myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam 'phags pa'i ba den pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i cha'aphags pa'i bden pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir honang pos
282b6('bum): nam bsam gtan la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyo nad pa'o// nam tshad myed pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ tshad
282b7('bum): myed pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i stond pa'o// nas gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthong
282b8('bum): babyed pa'i phyir nyon pa'o// nas rnam par tha rang pa brgyad la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i me/ rnam par b.rang pa brgyad mthong ba byed pa'i phyir nyod pa'o// rnam mapar kyis gnas
283a1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthong ba myed pa'i phyir hond pa'o// nam rnam par
283a2('bum): tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa
283a3('bum): mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam mngon par shes pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyo nad pa'o// nam ting nge 'dzind la dmyigs pa'i
283a4('bum): par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzind rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ho nad pa'o// nam gzungs kyi sgo la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo
283a5('bum): rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ho nad pa'o// nam de bzhi na gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
283a6('bum): mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyo nad pa'o// nam myi 'jigs pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ myi 'jigs pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir hon pa'o// nam so so yang dag par rig pa la dmyigs
283a7('bum): pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ho nad pa'o// nam snying rje chen po la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ snying rje chen po mthong
283a8('bum): ba myed pa'i phyir ho nad pa'o// nam sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad mthong ba myed pa'i phyir hond
283b1('bum): pa'o// nas rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i me/ rgyunang du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyon pa'o// nam la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dmyis/
283b2('bum): pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ phyir myi 'ob ba'i bras
283b3('bum): bu mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ho nad pa'o// nam dgra bcom pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dgra bcom pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyo nad pa'o// nam byang chub la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes
283b4('bum): pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rang byang chub mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyon/ da pa'o// nam lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam/ par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
283b5('bum): mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyond pa'o// nam rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshernam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir nyon
283b6('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor de de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten nyond pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
283b7('bum): pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing / 'jig rtend ho nad pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni 'jig rtend du tong pa zhes rjod de/ 'jig rten du ci sto dau zhes rjod ce na/ gzug
283b8('bum): hong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rte nang du rjod do// tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 'du shes tong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 'du byed hong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rnam
284a1('bum): par shes pa hong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// myig tong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rna ba hong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sna hong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rtend du rjod //
284a2('bum): lce stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// lus tong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// yid stong po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sma stong /
284a3('bum): zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// dri hong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rtend du rjod do// ro hong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// reg stong zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// chos nyong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten
284a4('bum): du rjod do// myig gi rnam par shes pa nyong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sna'i rnam par shes pa smos
284a5('bum): ro zhes bya bar 'jig rtend du rjod do// skye'i rnam par shes pahong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten rjod do// lus kyi rnam pa rashes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rtend du rjod do// da
284a6('bum): kye rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// myig gi 'dus te rig pa'i stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i hong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/
284a7('bum): sna'i 'dus te rem pa lta bzhes bya bar 'jig rten durjod do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nying dri zhes bya bar 'jig rtenang brjod do// sras kyi 'dus te reg pa stong nga zhes bya bar 'jig rtenang badzod do/ mi
284a8('bum): kyi 'dus te ga pa nying nge zhes bya bar 'jig rten da do// myig gi mas kyi rje gang pozhis bya bar 'jig ter nga ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa'i byirang kyi na khyi ma bayi na
284b1('bum): rjod do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba hong zhes bya bar 'jig rtenang du rjod do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
284b2('bum): tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sa'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// chu'i 'a
284b3('bum): stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// mye'i khams ho ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rlung gi khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// nam mkha'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod//
284b4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams tong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rdzo// da do// ma rig pa tong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod// 'du byed tong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rnam par
284b5('bum): shes pa tong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ mying dang gzu gas tong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// skye mched drug s+ho/ ngango zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// reg pa stong ngo zhes
284b6('bum): bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sred pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rtend du rjod do// lend pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// srid pa stong ngo zhes bya bar
284b7('bum): 'jig rtenang du rjod do// skye ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rtenang du rjod do// rga shi stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rtenang du rjod du/
284b8('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rte nang du rjod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa' stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong ngo zhes bya
285a1('bum): bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// nang
285a2('bum): stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// phyi stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes
285a3('bum): bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// chen po stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid tong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig
285a4('bum): rtenang du rjod do/ tang ma nyid hang ba zhes bya bar jig rten badzad do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
285a5('bum): stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig
285a6('bum): rten du rjod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar
285a7('bum): 'jig rtenang du rjod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya ba/
285a8('bum): 'jig rten du rjod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// yang dag par
285b1('bum): spong ba rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// dbang po rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rte nad du rjod do// stobs rnams tong ngo zhes bya
285b2('bum): bar 'jig rten du rjod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams hong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rtend du rjod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa/
285b3('bum): rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// bsam gtan rnams tong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// chad myed pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jun
285b4('bum): pa rnams stong po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rnam pa ra tha rad pa' brgyad stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong ngo zhes bya bar
285b5('bum): 'jig rtenang du rjod do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyidadang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// mngon par shes pa rnams stong
285b6('bum): ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// ting nge 'dzind rnams hong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rtend du rjod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten durjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i hobs
285b7('bum): bcu hong po zhes bya bar 'jig rtend du rjod do// myi 'jigs pa bzhi stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// byams pa chen po
285b8('bum): nying ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// snying rje chen po stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rtend du rjod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad hong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rgyu nang du
286a1('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'dzi/
286a2('bum): rten du rjod do// dgra bcom pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rang byang chub tong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rtenang du rjod do// sam gyi rnam pazhes pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'di
286a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten nyond pa'o// rab 'byord
286a4('bum): gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni de bzhin gshe gas pa la 'jig rten hong zhes bya bar nyon da / 'jig rte na ho'o zhes bya bar shes par byed de/ rab 'byor de de ltar na
286a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten dgond pa'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs
286a6('bum): pa la 'jig rten tong zhes bya bar ston te/ 'jig rtenano zhes bya bar ga na cen/ 'jig rten na gzugs song zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na rdzob hong zhes bya bar nyond to// 'jig rten na
286a7('bum): shes pa la ston to// 'jig rten na 'du byed sang zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten nanam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar yon // 'jig rtenan gyig song zhes bya bar
286a8('bum): 'jig rten man pa hong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na sna hong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten dan sre hong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na lus hong zhes bya bar nyond to// 'jin
286b1('bum): rten na yid stong zhes nyond to// 'jig rten ma gzugs hong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na sgra stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na dri stong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na ro hong zhes bya bar/
286b2('bum): ston to 'jig rten na reg stong zhes bya bar ston to/ yin rtenan chos hor zhe na ston 'jig rten na myig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rtem nan pa'i rnam par shes pa'oho zhes bya bar tond to// 'jig rten na sna'i
286b3('bum): rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar nyond to// 'jig rten na lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar nyond to// 'jig rten na lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar nyonang to// 'jig rten na yid kyi rnam
286b4('bum): par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ho nang to// 'jig rten na myi gi 'dus te reg pa hong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa hong zhes bya bar stond to/ 'jig
286b5('bum): rten na sna'i 'dus te reg pa hong zhes bya bar stond to// ga rten na lce'i 'dus te reg pa hong zhes bya bar hond to// 'jig rten na lus kyi 'dus te reg pal ho zhes bya bar hon
286b6('bum): 'jig rten na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa hong zhes bya bar ho nad to// 'jig rten na myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba hong zhes bya bar nyo nang to// 'jig rten na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
286b7('bum): tshor ba hong zhes bya bar ho nad to// 'jig rten na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba hong zhes bya bar ho nad to// 'jig
286b8('bum): rten na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba hong zhes bya bar ho nad to// 'jig rten na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar so nad to// 'jig rten na sa'i khams tong zhes
287a1('bum): byab ma nyan to// 'jig rten na tshu'i lal ma chog na tsu mas kyi 'jig rten nung she 'ams grang zhes bya ba byor da te/ 'jig rten rnam pa'a'i 'ams tsha zhes bya bam nyon tu/
287a2('bum): 'jig rten na rnam par shes pa'i khams hong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten nam rig pa ho zhes bya bar hor to// 'jig rten na 'du byed stong zhes bya bar nyonang to// 'jig rten na rnam par shes pa stong
287a3('bum): zhes bya bar nyon to/ 'jig rten na mying dang gzugs hong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten skye 'dun hong zhes bya bar nyonang to// 'jig rten ma reg pa hong zhes bya bar nyon to// 'jig rten 'tshor ba tong
287a4('bum): zhes bya bar ho nang to// 'jig rten na sred pa stong zhes bya bar ho nad to// 'jig rten na mend pa hong zhes bya bar nyond to// 'jig rten na srid pa hong zhes bya bar nyond to// 'jig rten
287a5('bum): na skye ba stong zhes bya bar ho nad to// 'jig rten na rga shi hongazhes bya bar hond to// 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya bar nyo nad to// 'jig rten na tshul khris
287a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa hong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa hong zhes bya bar nyond to// 'jig rten na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa hong zhes bya bar nyond to// 'jig
287a7('bum): rten na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa hong zhes bya bar sor dato/ 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten nanang stong pa nyid nyo ba zhes bya bar ston te/
287a8('bum): 'jig rten na phyi stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar nyo nad to// 'jig rten na phyi nang stong pa nyid hong zhes bya bar nyond to// 'jig rten na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid hong zhes bya bar nyond to// 'jig rten na
287b1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten mdon dam pa stong pa nyid hong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na 'dus byas stong pa nyid hong zhes bya bar brtond to// 'jig rten na 'dus byas stong pa nyid
287b2('bum): hong zhes bya bar nyo nang to// 'jig rten na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid hong zhes bya bar ho na to// 'jig rten na thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten nador ba myed pa
287b3('bum): stong pa nyid hong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na rang bzhin stong pa nyid hong zhes bya bar hor to// 'jig rten na chos thams cad stong pa nyid ho ba zhes bya bar nyond to// 'jig rten na rang gi mtshan nyid
287b4('bum): stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar nyond to// 'jig rten na myi dmyig rnas pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar nyond to// 'jig rten na dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid hong zhes bya bar nyond to// 'jig
287b5('bum): rten na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid hong zhes bya bar nyonang to// 'jin/ rten na dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid hong zhes bya band to// 'jig rten na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnas
287b6('bum): hong zhes bya bar nyon to// 'jig rten na yang dag par spong ba rnams hong zhes bya bar nyon to// 'jig rten mthu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams hong zhes bya bar nyond to// 'jig rten na dbang po rnams hong zhes bya bar
287b7('bum): ho nad to// 'jig rten na stobs rnams hong zhes bya bar hond to// 'jig rten na byang chub kyi yan lag rnams hong zhes bya bar nyond to// 'jig rten na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa hong zhes bya bar
287b8('bum): skor to// 'jig rten na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya bar hodang to/ 'jig rten na thams gnanamam stong zhes bya bar gon to// 'jig rten na chad myed pa rnams ho zhes bya bar nyon //
288a1('bum): 'jig rten na gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ho nad to// 'jig rten na rnam par tha rad pa brgyad stong zhes bya bar nyond to// 'jig rten na mthar kyis gnas
288a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu hong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten marnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa tong zhes bya bar sto da to// 'jig rten na mngon par shes
288a3('bum): pa rnams hong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na gzungs kyi sgo rnams hong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa'i
288a4('bum): stobs bcu hong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na myi 'jikas pa bzhi ho zhes bya bar hond to// 'jig rten naso so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong zhes bya bar hond to//
288a5('bum): 'jig rten na byams pa chen po stong zhes bya bar nyond to// 'jig rten na snying rje chen po hong zhes bya bar hond to// 'jig rten na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad stong
288a6('bum): zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten ma rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya bar rtonang to// 'jig rten na phyir myi 'ong ba na/
288a7('bum): 'bras bu stong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa nyid stong zhes bya bar nyon to// 'jig rten na rang byang chub hong zhes bya bar nyind to// 'jig rten ma las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong ni
288a8('bum): bya bar nyo nad to// 'jig rten na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid stong zhes bya bar stond to// rab 'byor de de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten stond to// /
288b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po / rab 'byor nga gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa/
288b2('bum): la 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// ji ltar 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab par ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar nyond to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten pas
288b3('bum): kyis myi khyab ces bya bar tond to// 'du shes kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stonang to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar nyond to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam
288b4('bum): kyis myi khyab ces bya bar stonang to// myig gi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar nyond to// rna ba'i 'ji ga rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// sna'i 'jig
288b5('bum): rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stonang to// s+ye'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar nyond to// lus kyi 'dzi/ narten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar nyond to// yid kyi 'a
288b6('bum): rten bsas kyis myi bya ba ces bya bar byonong to// gzugs kyi 'jig rten bsam kyis myi khyab ces bya bar nyon to// sgra'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// ri'i 'jig rten bsam kyis
288b7('bum): myi khyab ces bya bar gnad to// ro'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar nyond to// reg gi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stonang to// chos kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar
288b8('bum): nyond to// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam kyis kyi khya ba ces bya bar stond to// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis kyi khyab ces bya bar nyond to// sna'i rnam par shes
289a1('bum): pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar nyonang to// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rtend bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar nyonang to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab
289a2('bum): ces bya bar nyonang to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar sonang to// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar nyond to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
289a3('bum): 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rtend bsam gyis kyi khyab ces bya bar ston pa to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// lus
289a4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar hond to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar nyonang to// myig gi 'dus te reg
289a5('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam kyis kyi bya ba ces bya ton to/ na ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen du kyis tshor ba'i nga gtan pams kyis kyi khyab ces bya bar bad to/ bu'i 'a
289a6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyed dkyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam kyis kyi khyab ces bya bar nyon to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam kyis myi khyab ces bya bar da to// sus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
289a7('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis kyi khyab ces bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar nyonang to// sa'i khams kyi 'jig rte
289a8('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar nyond to// chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// mye'i khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar nyon to// rlung gi khams kyi

289b8('bum): gyis myi khyab ces bya bar brtond to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rtend bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar hand to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to//
290a1('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten gyis myi khyab ces bya bar nyonang to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar nyo nang to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi

293a2('bum): dben zhes bya la son // yar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgra'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar byor to// rnam par bar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / satshanas byed pa dang / slo pa

293a5('bum): par stond to// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'ji ga rten dben zhes bya bar tond to// byams pa chen po'i'i jig rten dben zhes bya bar ho nad to// snying rje chen po 'jig
293a6('bum): rten dben zhes bya bar honang to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar sond to// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ho nad to
