293a8('bum): rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar nyond to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ho nad to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar nyo nad to//
293b1('bum): rab 'byor de de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten hond pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig
293b2('bum): rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ho nad te/ ji ltar 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyond ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to//
293b3('bum): tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa hong pa se bya bar sond to// 'du shes kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar sonang to// 'jugs kye 'jig can mtha' las 'das pa tong ba zhes bya bar
293b4('bum): gnang tu/ 'du byed kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das stong ba zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar sond to// myig gi
293b5('bum): 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar honang to/ rna ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// sna'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das
293b6('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// lce'i 'jig rten lhas 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar sond to// lus kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar stond to// yid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las
293b7('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// gzugs kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar ho nad to// sma'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong ba zhes bya bar stor to// dri'i 'jig
293b8('bum): rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// ro'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// reg gi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar stond to//
294a1('bum): chos kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar hond to// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// rna ba'i 'arnam par shes pa'i
294a2('bum): 'jig rten las 'das pa stong ba zhes bya bar nyo nad to// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// lce'i 'arnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes
294a3('bum): bya bar nyond to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar nyo nad to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// myig
294a4('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhe des bya bar nyond to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// sna'i 'dus te reg
294a5('bum): pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar nyo nad to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten
294a6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ho nad to// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten
294a7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis cho mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las
294a8('bum): 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// snga 'dus ha rag la'i rgyan sa kyis tshor ba'i 'jig tan mtha' las 'das pa stong nas bya bar nyan ta / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten man
294b1('bum): las 'das pa stong ba zhes bya bar ston to/ sus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar som tsa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig
294b2('bum): rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar btond to//
294b3('bum): mye'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// rlung gi yi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyon da to// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong
294b4('bum): pa zhes bya bar ho nad to// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'ji ga rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar hond to// ma rig pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar
294b5('bum): stonang to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar gnang to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mying dang gzugs kyi
294b6('bum): 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar
294b7('bum): ho nang to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyon to rmed pa'ijis rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// le nad pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes
294b8('bum): bya bar ston to// srid pa'i 'jig rten sras 'das bstong pa zhes bya bar ston to// skye ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong ba zhes bya bar na to// rga shi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong /
295a1('bum): pa zhes bya bar nyond to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las
295a2('bum): 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong
295a3('bum): pa zhes bya bar nyond to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya
295a4('bum): bar ho nad to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'angs pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar stond to// phyi nang
295a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// stong pa nyid nyom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chen po stong pa
295a6('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha'
295a7('bum): las 'das pa tong ba zhes bya bar nyond to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das
295a8('bum): pa btong pa zhes bya bar nyo nad to// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa tong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar nyo nad to// dor ba myed pa tong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong
295b1('bum): ba zhes bya bar ston to/ rang bzhi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das 'gong pa zhes bya bar nyon to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya ba ston to/
295b2('bum): rang gis pan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig tem mthams pa 'das pa thong sa zhes bya ba thon ta/ bye dmyigs pa song pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa song pa zhes bya bar nyod to// dngam po myed pa stong pa nyid
295b3('bum): kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyon to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
295b4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// yang dag par spong ba rnams
295b5('bum): kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyon da/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// dbang po rnams kyi 'jig
295b6('bum): rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// hobs rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyon to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das
295b7('bum): pa hong pa zhes bya bar hond to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar hond to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha'
295b8('bum): las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ho nang to// tshad myed pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes
296a1('bum): bya bar horang to// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par tha rang pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das
296a2('bum): btong ba zhes bya bar nyod to// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong ba zhes bya bar nyonang to// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed
296a3('bum): ba dang / smon pa myed pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar hon to/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi
296a4('bum): 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar sto / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong ba zhes bya bar nyonang to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
296a5('bum): bcu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya b.raho nad to// myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar nyo nang to// so so yang dag par rig
296a6('bum): pa bzhi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa
296a7('bum): tong pa zhes bya bar ho nad to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las
296a8('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa tong pa zhes bya bar nyo nad to// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten las 'das pa stong pa zhes
296b1('bum): bya bar stonang to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi
296b2('bum): 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar rtond to// rab 'byor de gzhan yang shes rab
296b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// ji ltar 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ho nad ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa
296b4('bum): zhes bya bar nyonang to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// 'du shes kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten pong
296b5('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// myi/ gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// rna ba'i
296b6('bum): 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// sna'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar hond to// lce'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// lus kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa
296b7('bum): zhes bya bar nyond to// yid kyi 'jig rten ngos nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyon to// gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stor to// sgra'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
296b8('bum): bar gnad to// dri'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// ro'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// reg gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// chos
297a1('bum): kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa
297a2('bum): zhes bya bar stonang to// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyo na to// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar nyond to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten
297a3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stonang ngo //
297a4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar/ ho nad to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong / pa zhes bya bar to nad to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig
297a5('bum): rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ho nad to// lus kyi 'dus te/ reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
297a6('bum): bar ston to// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar sto//
297a7('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyo nang to// lus kyi 'dus te/
297a8('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar nyond to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rgya nad kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// sa'i khams kyi
297b1('bum): 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar stond to// mye'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// rlung gi khams kyi
297b2('bum): 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyon dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar stond to// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar stond to//
297b3('bum): ma rig pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid nyong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// mying
297b4('bum): dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong ba zhes bya bar hon to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya ba/ pa hond to// reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
297b5('bum): bya bar nyonang to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// sred pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhesabya bar ho nang to// lend pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa
297b6('bum): zhes bya bar nyond to// srid pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// skye ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// rga shi'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar stond to//
297b7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol da tu phyi nang pa'i 'jig rten ngo ba nyid tong ba zhes bya bar nyon to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten po bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyonang // bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i
297b8('bum): 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes nyond to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyo nad to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya/
298a1('bum): bar nyond to/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// phyi hong pa
298a2('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ho nang to// chen
298a3('bum): po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyo nad to// don dam pa tong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar to nad to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya
298a4('bum): bar nyond to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten da ngo bo nyi da hong ba zhes bya bar nyond to// mtha' las 'das pa tong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// thog
298a5('bum): ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten / bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar nyon to// rang bzhin tong pa nyid
298a6('bum): kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
298a7('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyo nad to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid
298a8('bum): pa zhes bya bar nyond to// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar 'don to//
298b1('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten po bo nyid ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid
298b2('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ha nad to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar sond to// 'phags pa'i lam
298b3('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa le bya bar stonang to// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyo nang to// bsam gtan
298b4('bum): rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong ba zhes bya bar nyond to// tshad myed pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar hon to// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi
298b5('bum): 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// rnam paratha rad pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya b.rand to// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
298b6('bum): dgu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar stond to// rnam par tha rang ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// mngon
298b7('bum): bar shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong ba zhes bya bar ho nang to// ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyon to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong
298b8('bum): ba zhes bya bar ho nad to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar ston da/
299a1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyon / byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten po
299a2('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyo nad to// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
299a3('bum): stond to// la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyo nad to// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar to nad to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig
299a4('bum): rte da ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stom/
299a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// rab 'byor de gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten
299a6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyo nad ce na/ gzug
299a7('bum): kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar nyo nang to// 'du shes kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
299a8('bum): pa zhes bya bar stond to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ho nang to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar rton to//
299b1('bum): myig gi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// rna ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
299b2('bum): bar stond to// lce'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ho rang to/ lus kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// yid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i rdo
299b3('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyo nad to// smra'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// dri'i 'jig
299b4('bum): rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ho nad to// ro'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar s+ho/ nad to/ reg gi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid nga
299b5('bum): pa zhes bya bar stond to// chos kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed ba'i ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar stond to// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
299b6('bum): pa zhes bya bar tshond to// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
299b7('bum): hond to// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar gon to//
299b8('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar ston to// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar stond to//
300a1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar stonang to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rtend dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar gnang to//
300a2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// lus kyi 'dus te reg gi di rnyed ma po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyo nang to// yid kyi 'dus te reg gi
300a3('bum): po skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyon to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i
300a4('bum): 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyo nad to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
300a5('bum): rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid tong ba/ zhes bya bar ho nang to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis// tshor ba'i dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyo/
300a6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// sa'i khams kyi 'jig rte nang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ho nang to//
300a7('bum): chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// mye'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed
300a8('bum): ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stor/
300b1('bum): pa zhes bya bar yor to// ma rig pa'i 'jig rte dngos po skyed pa'i ngos nyid 'ong ba zhes bya bar god datu/ 'du byed kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid spong ba zhes bya bar stond to// rnam par
300b2('bum): shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyon to// mying dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyo nang to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten dngos po myed
300b3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// sred
300b4('bum): 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar ston do// le nad pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya/ bar nyo nang to// sred pa'i 'jig rtend dngos po myed pa'i
300b5('bum): ngab nyid stong pazhes bya bar pod te/ skye ba'i 'jig sa po myed pa nyi nang ba zhes bya bar cod / 'jig rten dngam paskyed pa'i thab cid myong ba zhes bya bar mam
300b6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyo nad to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston
300b7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba
300b8('bum): ho nad to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ho nang to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
301a1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
301a2('bum): zhes bya bar ho nad to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to//
301a3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi
301a4('bum): 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar nyon to/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ ba zhes bya bar stond to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
301a5('bum): kye 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ro/ nad to// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten du ngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// dor ba
301a6('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// chos thams cad stong pa
301a7('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
301a8('bum): kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
301b1('bum): kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ho nad to// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar storang to// dran pa nye bar
301b2('bum): gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
301b3('bum): rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed
301b4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// byang chub kyi na lag rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa ni sa bya bar hond to/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi
301b5('bum): 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bya bar nyon dato// 'phags pa'i bden rnams kyi 'jig rten ngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar stor to//
301b6('bum): gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i cho ba nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to// chang byed pa'i rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed sto ngo ba nyid stong ba zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
301b7('bum): par 'dug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par thard pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyo rang ngo to// mthar kyis
301b8('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pal dgu'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid nyob pa zhes bya bar nyon to// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i 'jig rten
302a1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ho nang to// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi 'jig
302a2('bum): rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid tong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig
302a3('bum): rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten dngos po
302a4('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// byams pa/ chen po'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya/ bar stond to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i
302a5('bum): ngo bo nyid tong ba zhes bya bar nyond to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar gnod to// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i
302a6('bum): 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyond to// la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// phyir myi 'ong ba'i
302a7('bum): 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar stonang to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten dang
302a8('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyonang to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyon to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
302b1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid spong ba zhes bya bar nyod to// rab 'byor da gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyon te/ rab 'byor shes
302b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyon cen/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ho rang to// tshor ba'i 'jig rte'i zhes bya bar nyond to// 'du shes
302b3('bum): kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyon to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyon to/ rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyon to// myig gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyon du
302b4('bum): rna ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// sna'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stond to// lce'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyon da to// lus kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ho nad to// yid
302b5('bum): kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stond to// gzugs kyi 'jigarten zhi zhes bya bar stond to// sgra'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya ba ra ho nad to// dri'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to//
302b6('bum): ro'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// reg gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stonang to// chos kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar son te/
302b7('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyo nang to// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyon to// sde'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// lus kyi
302b8('bum): rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ho nang to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stond to// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhes bya bar nyond to// rna ba'i
303a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ho nad to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ho nad to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ho nad to// lus
303a2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ho nad to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stond to// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyon te/
303a3('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyo nad to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i
303a4('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ho nad to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes
303a5('bum): bya bar stond to// sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ho nad to// mye'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar
303a6('bum): honang to// rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stond to// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyo nad to//
303a7('bum): ma rig pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar hond to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// mying dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes
303a8('bum): bya bar nyonang to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyonang to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// sred pa'i 'jig rten zhe zhe bya
303b1('bum): bar stond to// le nad pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhe bya bar nyond to// srid pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyon to// skye ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// rga shi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar hon
303b2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyo nang to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stonang to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar cho
303b3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten zhes bya bar nyond to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes
303b4('bum): bya bar nyon to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhe/ sa bya bar nyon to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya ba ra hon to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar
303b5('bum): stonang to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhe zhes bya b.ragon to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya b.ranyon to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes
303b6('bum): bya bar stond to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes
303b7('bum): bya bar stond to// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ho nad to// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
303b8('bum): zhi zhes bya bar stond to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhe zhes bya bar nyond to// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jin
304a1('bum): rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
304a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyon to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stonang to// rdzu 'phrul
304a3('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyo nad to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'ja
304a4('bum): rten zhi zhes bya bar ho nad to// 'phags pa'i lam yan la ga brgyad pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to//
304a5('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ho nad to// tshad myed pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhe
304a6('bum): zhes bya bar nyond to// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar hond to// mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'a'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ho nad to// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong
304a7('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyon to// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stonang to// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig
304a8('bum): rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stond to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// myi 'jigs pa bzhi
304b1('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stonan to// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stonang to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes
304b2('bum): bya bar nyonang to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stond to// la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i phras
304b3('bum): bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar gond to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyon to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya ba
304b4('bum): nyon to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes/ bya bar nyond to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar nyond to// rab 'byor de de ltar na zhes
304b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing / 'jig rten gond pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten
304b6('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond te/ ji ltar 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyon ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stonang to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar
304b7('bum): stond to// 'du shes kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyonang ngo // 'du byed kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyon to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya ba stonang to//
304b8('bum): myig gi 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stonang to// rna ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// sna'i 'jig rten tong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// s+ye'i 'jig rten tong pa
305a1('bum): nyid ces bya bar nyond to// lus kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyon te/ yid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar sto/
305a2('bum): sma'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ho nang to// dri'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// ro'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyonang to// reg gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// chos kyi sa
305a3('bum): rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyo nad to// sna'i rnam par
305a4('bum): shes pa'i 'jig rten tong pa nyid ces bya bar ho nad to lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyon to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ce kya khyod yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ton pa nyid ces bya bar
305a5('bum): stond to// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten hong / pa nyid ces bya bar ho nad to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'ja ga rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ho nad to// sna'i 'dus te
305a6('bum): reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// yid
305a7('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend
305a8('bum): kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyonang to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jin/
305b1('bum): rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar
305b2('bum): ston to// sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten tong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// mye'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// rlung gi
305b3('bum): khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar son to// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnad to//
305b4('bum): ma rig pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// byed kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// rnam pashes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to/
305b5('bum): mying dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar hond rto// reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ho nad to// tshor
305b6('bum): ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyon to// sred pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// se nad pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyon to// srid pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya
305b7('bum): bar stond to// skye ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyon to// rga shi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol pa tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar rgan/
305b8('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyon to// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyind pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa'i jig
306a1('bum): rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar
306a2('bum): ho nad to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ho nad to//
306a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to//
306a4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyon dar to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig
306a5('bum): rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ho nad to// thog ma dang tha ma myedapa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ho nad to// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar
306a6('bum): ho nad to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
306a7('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// ngo bo nyid hong
306a8('bum): pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyon to// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces
306b1('bum): bya bar nyo nad to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyonang to// dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid/
306b2('bum): ces bya bar nyond to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten tong ba nyid ces bya bar nyond to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten
306b3('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyonang to// bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// tshad myed pa rnams kyi 'jig
306b4('bum): rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// gzugs myed pa'i snyom sa par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyon to// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces
306b5('bum): bya bar nyond to// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myang ba dang / smond pa spyad pa'i 'jig rten mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten
306b6('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// mngon par shes pa'i rnams kyi 'jin
306b7('bum): rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyon to// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stonang to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// de bzhin gsheg
306b8('bum): pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ho nad to// myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// soso yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar
307a1('bum): ston to// byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi
307a2('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten tong pa nyid ces bya bar
307a3('bum): gnad to// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten tshong pa nyid ces bya bar gnang to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stonang to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces
307a4('bum): bya bar nyonang to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'ji ga rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar nyond to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stonato/
307a5('bum): rab 'byor de de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de bzhi na gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ho nad to//
307a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po// rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'jig rten ji ltar nyond cen
307a7('bum): ci nas kyang 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su yang myi 'gyur la/ 'jig rten pha rol kyi 'du shes su yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar nyond te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis 'jig rten 'di'i 'du
307b1('bum): shes su 'gyur ba 'am/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu myed do// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas so//
307b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni don bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i slad du/ nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i
307b3('bum): slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni don
307b4('bum): myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dang/ rab 'byor da de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
307b5('bum): pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'a byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don bsam gyis myi pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// rab 'byor de shes rab kyi
307b6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni don dpag tu myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni don gzhal du myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor de shes rab
307b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa di ni don gyi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor de ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rang
307b8('bum): 'byor nga 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi don chen po ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i don dang / sems can thams cad yongs su myi
308a1('bum): gtang ba'i dond to// rab 'byor de rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po'i phyir nye bar
308a2('bum): gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa don bsam myi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang
308a3('bum): byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni bsam gyis myi khyab ste/ rab 'byor de rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
308a4('bum): rgyas rnams kyi don bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnaso// rab 'byor de ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa don// dpag tu myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab
308a5('bum): 'byor nga sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa la/ gang gis ches sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la bsam
308a6('bum): ba dang / dpag par nus pa de lta bu gang yang myed de/ rab 'byor de rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
308a7('bum): rnams kyi don dpag tu myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor de ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa don gzhal du myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga sangs rgyas
308a8('bum): nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni gzhal du myed de/ sus kyang gzhal bar myi nus so// rab 'byor nga rnagrangs des na/ shes
308b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don gzhal du myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor de ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol
308b2('bum): tu phyind pa don gyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mnyam pas mnyam pa yang
308b3('bum): su yang myed na/ lhag pa lta ci smos te/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi
308b4('bum): don gyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang
308b5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma ma chis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
308b6('bum): bka' stsal du ba/ rab 'byor de de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor nga sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni bas
308b7('bum): kyis kyi / rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa da dang / rang byu dang / thams cad sa khyen pa nyid ni dpag tu bye gnas du byed do/
308b8('bum): dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyis kyi khyab/ dpas tu myed ga'as du myed pa te/ khyi mnya ba dang mi nyas pa'o// rab 'byor tsho ga sang bams kyis myi rgya ba dpag tu byed gnas du srung
309a1('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'du shes kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'du byed kyang bsam gyis myi khyab/
309a2('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal tu myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab/ dpal tu myed gzhal du myed pa de/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor
309a3('bum): myig kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ngarna ba yang bsam gyis myi khya ba dpag tu myed gzhal tu myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//
309a4('bum): rab 'byor nga sna yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor/ lce yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
309a5('bum): myi mnyam pa' dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de lus kyang bsam/ gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam ba dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da yid kyang bsam myi khyab
309a6('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da gzugs kyang bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//
309a7('bum): rab 'byor nga smra yang bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu gzhal du myed pa te myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da dri yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu skyed gzhal du byed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
309a8('bum): rab 'byor nga ro yang bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da reg kyang bsam gyis myi khyab/ dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi ma
309b1('bum): ba dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da chos kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dmyig gi rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi byas
309b2('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byorangarna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//
309b3('bum): rab 'byorang sna'i rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da lce'i rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
309b4('bum): myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi byab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa
309b5('bum): ba dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dade yid kyi rnam par shes payang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dmyig/
309b6('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ngarna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du
309b7('bum): myed / phyimanyam pa dang mnyas pa'o// rab 'byor pa'i 'dus te rag pa yang bams kyis kyi bya ba dpag tu myed ga'as bu byed pa ste/ phyisanyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dkyu'i 'dus
309b8('bum): te reg pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
310a1('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal myed pa he myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dmyig gi 'dus te/
310a2('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ngan pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed/
310a3('bum): gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab
310a4('bum): 'byor pa lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang bsam kyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzha du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye rang
310a5('bum): kyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis myi khya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du n+ye da pa he/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de yid/ kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis myi khyab
310a6('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa haM/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga sa'i khams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor bdun
310a7('bum): sa kya mas kyis pa ga byed ga ngas padal nyas pan+d+ha/ rnams kyang rgyas kyi ga ca gas gyu /
310a8('bum): ba'o// rab 'byor da rlung gi khams kyang bsam gyis kyi bya ba dpag tu myang gzhas du myed she/ phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams kyang bams kyis kyi khyab dpag tu byed gzham du
310b1('bum): du myed pa te/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang thasas kyis myi khyab/ dpag tu byed gzhal du byed pa / gyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dam rig/
310b2('bum): pa yang bsas kyis myi khyab dpag tu byed gnas du byed pa te/ phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ rab 'byor 'du byed kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa'i/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//
310b3('bum): rab 'byor nga rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzham du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dmying dang gzugs kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa'o/
310b4('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de skye mched drug kyang bsam kyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa te/ phyis nyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da reg pa yang bsam gyi
310b5('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzham du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga tshor pa yang bsam kyis myi rgya pa dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
310b6('bum): ba'o// rab 'byor de sred pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab/ dpag tu byed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da lend pa yang bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa /
310b7('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyo ro rab 'byor nga srid pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang ma nyam pa'o// rab 'byor da skye ba yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed
310b8('bum): pa he/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dag shi yang bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga sbyin pa'apha
310'a1('bum): rol tu phyinang pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
310'a2('bum): gzha du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor/
310'a3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed ka sasadu myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpa'
310'a4('bum): tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang
310'a5('bum): mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da nang stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyi sa myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa nga mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dgyi stong pa nyid kyang bsam gis kyi
310'a6('bum): khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rang
310'a7('bum): 'byor brkang pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsas kyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du skyed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dachen po stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzham du byed
310'a8('bum): bste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dadon dam pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gas kyi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du byed pa te/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'dus byas gong ba
310'b1('bum): nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab/ dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpal tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnye
310'b2('bum): ba dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyi khyab dpag tu myed gzhas du byed pa he/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
310'b3('bum): nyid kyang bsas kyis myi khyab dpag tu phyed gzhas du byed pa ce/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam 'a'o/ rab 'byor dador bskyed pa song pa nyid kyang bams kyis kyi bya ba dpag tu byed gzhal du byed pa 'o/ gyis
310'b4('bum): ba dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi nyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga chos thams cad hong pa
310'b5('bum): nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa he/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'os khyor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed
310'b6('bum): pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam kyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de dngos po myed pa
310'b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste
310'b8('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kya bas kyis myi bya ba dang myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byorang dran pa nye/
311a1('bum): par gzhag pa rnams kyang bsam gis kyi khyab dpag tu myed gzhas byed pa / phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam thal/ rab 'byor da yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang bsas kyis kyi khyab dpag tu byed
311a2('bum): gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa 'ongs khyor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga dbang po rnams kyang
311a3('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga stobs rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//
311a4('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub kyi yan lag rnas kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dang / ga tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang bas
311a5('bum): gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi ma nyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
311a6('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de bsam gtan rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga tshad myed pa rnams
311a7('bum): kyang bsam kyis myi khya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab/ dpag tu myed gzhas
311a8('bum): du myed pa ste/ gyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyang bsam gis kyi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da mthar
311b1('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dgu yang bsam gyis kyi byab dpag tu phyed gzhal du byed pa nye/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtsham ma byed pa
311b2('bum): pa dang / smond pa myed pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du byed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga mngon par shes pa rnams kyang bsam gis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du
311b3('bum): myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang
311b4('bum): bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa he/ myi mnyadam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang bsam kyis myi khyab dpag tu myed dgas
311b5('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byoradamyi 'jigs pa rnams kyang bsam gis myi khyab dpag tu myed pa/ zhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor
311b6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dbyams pa chen po yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
311b7('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de snying rje chen po yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang
311b8('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rgyu nang du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang
312a1('bum): mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu byed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor daphyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang
312a2('bum): bsam gyis kyi khyab dpag tu byed gzhas du byed pa ste/ phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyang bsas kyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa nye/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab
312a3('bum): 'byor da rang byang chub kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
312a4('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da chos
312a5('bum): thams cad kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni mes kyi daphyogs so mas
312a6('bum): byung ba'i chos rnams kyang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga tshor ba bas
312a7('bum): kyis kyi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du skyed pa / spyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'du shes bsas kyis myi khyab dpag tu byed gzham du byed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yan
312a8('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga 'du byed bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ rab 'byor nga rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
312b1('bum): gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dmyig bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab
312b2('bum): 'byor ngan pa bsam kyis kyi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du byed pa he/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga sna bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ge/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
312b3('bum): yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dbye bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga lus bsam kyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste
312b4('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor/ yid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi ma nyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor
312b5('bum): gzugs bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa he/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da smra bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa
312b6('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da tri bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da ro bsam gyis myi khyab
312b7('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa che/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de reg bsam kyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam bu myi dmyigs so//
312b8('bum): rab 'byor chos bsam kyis kyi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du byed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa sangamanyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dmyig gi rnam par shes pa bsam kyis kyi khyab dpag tu myed ka'
313a1('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa yang mnyam pa yang
313a2('bum): myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab
313a3('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
313a4('bum): yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor
313a5('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed ga zhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyi gas so// rab 'byor da rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis/
313a6('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang /
313a7('bum): mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i bsam gyis kyi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du byed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga lus kyi 'dus te reg
313a8('bum): pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa se myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ gyis
313b1('bum): ba dang / mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dmyig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du byed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor/
313b2('bum): ba'i'adus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab/
313b3('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang
313b4('bum): mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga lus kyi 'dus te re ga pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhas du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnye ba yang myi dmyigs so/
313b5('bum): rab 'byor nga yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyi/ sa myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du byed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor
313b6('bum): sa'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga chu'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi'i
313b7('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da mye'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da rlung gi khams pas
313b8('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de nam mkha'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnye
314a1('bum): pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dam/
314a2('bum): rig pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga 'du byed bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnye
314a3('bum): ba yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da mying dang gzugs bsam gyis myi byab
314a4('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de skye mched drug bsam gyis/ myi khya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnya
314a5('bum): pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da tshor ba bsam
314a6('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de sred pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi
314a7('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byor da le nad pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga srid pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab/ dpag tu myed
314a8('bum): gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de skye ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa yang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so//
314b1('bum): rab 'byor dag gi bsas kyis kyi byab dpag tu bye dgranas du myed pa 9/ phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa sa kyi phyogs so// rab 'byor nga sbyin pa'i pha ro sa tu phyin pa bsas kyis kyi rgyab dpag tu byed gnas
314b2('bum): myed pa nye/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsam kyis kyi khyab dpag tu myed gzham du byed pa he/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs ma
314b3('bum): rab 'byor nga bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor ba rtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis myi khyab
314b4('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
314b5('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byord/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi
314b6('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byor da nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis
314b7('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor du phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang
314b8('bum): mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de chen po
315a1('bum): stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da don dam pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
315a2('bum): gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi gyis
315a3('bum): rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis
315a4('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed
315a5('bum): pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dador ba myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu mye da gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi
315a6('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsam gyis/
315a7('bum): myi khyab/ dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi byab dpag tu phyed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi nya
315a8('bum): pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyig so// rab 'byor nga myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de dngos po myed
