315b7('bum): kyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gapa khyen de myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu mye mchis gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam
315b8('bum): ba dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// gsomang pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gzugs bsas kyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhas du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
317a1('bum): ya myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshor ba bsdam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du shes pas/
317a2('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du byed bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gan sum mayi ka myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
317a3('bum): myi dmyigs pa lagasaci'i slad du rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myig bsam gyis
317a4('bum): myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa 'gas/ ci'i slad du rna ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam
317a5('bum): ba dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna bas ma gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
317a6('bum): du lce bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /
317a7('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzug

317b2('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa las
317b3('bum): ci srid du chos bsam gis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myig gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
317b4('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing
317b5('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi
317b6('bum): dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi rnam
317b7('bum): par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzha
317b8('bum): dum mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myig gi 'dus te reg pa bsas kyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
318a1('bum): pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs ba sags/ ci'i slad
318a2('bum): du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu mchis gzhal du mchis zhing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzha
318a3('bum): du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyis
318a4('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis// myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myig
318a5('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dang / ga tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg
318a6('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab
318a7('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce 'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
318a8('bum): shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi
318a9('bum): rtsi dbyigs pa lags/ ci'i slang du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzham du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam ba
318b1('bum): dbyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du pa'i khams bsas kyis kyi khyab dpag tum mchis gnas nus mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam bamyi dmyigs pasan/ ci'i slad du d+ha'i khams khams kyis kyi byam
318b2('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du s+ye'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa
318b3('bum): dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rlung gi khams bsam kyis kyi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhas du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nas
318b4('bum): mkha'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab/ dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi gas pa lags ci'i slad du rga par shes mi lam las kyis kyi
318b5('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyamab dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ma rig pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du
318b6('bum): ma mtshas shing / kyi mnyam pa dang mnyam brgya dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i thang du 'du byed thams kyis kyi rgyab dpag tum mchis gnas dus mchis shing kyimanyam pa dang mnyam pagyi gyis
318b7('bum): 'i sring du rnam par shes pa bsas kyis kyi khyab dpag tum mchis gnas dus mchi man 'dang mnyam pa gyi dmyigs pa sags 'i slang du mying dang gzugs pasas
318b8('bum): kyi khyab dpag tum mchis gzhal dus mchis shing / phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pagyi dbyigs pa lags 'i srang du skyes tshod drug thams kyis kyi rgyab dpag tum mchis gzham du ma mchis shing
319a1('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/
319a2('bum): ci'i slad du tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sred pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu mchis gzhal du ma mchis
319a3('bum): shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lend pa bsam gyis khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du srid pa
319a4('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du skye ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
319a5('bum): shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rga shi bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags
319a6('bum): ci'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
319a7('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
319a8('bum): mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
319b1('bum): ba myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhas du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du shes rab
319b2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khya ba dpag tu ma mchis shing gzhal
319b3('bum): du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags
319b4('bum): ci'i slad du phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam
319b5('bum): kyis myi khyab dpag tu mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du na po stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu mchis gzhal du
319b6('bum): ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du don dam pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs
319b7('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsam
319b8('bum): gyis myi khya ba dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du
320a1('bum): ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam/
320a2('bum): ba dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
320a3('bum): du rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsas kyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsam kyis myi byab dpag tu/
320a4('bum): ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dgyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsas kyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
320a5('bum): shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhas du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa kyi
320a6('bum): dbyigs pa lags ci'i slad du dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong ba
320a7('bum): nyid bamam gyis kyi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhas du ma mchis shing / phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa gyi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsas kyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
320a8('bum): kas dum mchis shing / phyim nyam pa dang sa nyam pa phyi dbyigs pa lags/ pa'i mang du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmas kyis kyi byab dpag tum mchis gnas dus mchos shing kyi mnyam pa /
320b1('bum): mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rdzu 'phrul/
320b2('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dbang po rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du
320b3('bum): ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du stobs rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mye mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags
320b4('bum): ci'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dang / tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mye mnyam pa dang mnyam ba myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam
320b5('bum): yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags / ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bas
320b6('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi nyam
320b7('bum): ba dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshad myed pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dngag tu ma mchis gzhal dus mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
320b8('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par tha rad pa brgyad pa
321a1('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis myi khyab
321a2('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bsam gyis myi khyab
321a3('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams bsam gyis skye khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa
321a4('bum): dang mnyam pa gyi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ting nge dzin rnams bsas kyis kyi rgya ba dpag tum mchis gzhas dus sa shi phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lag
321a5('bum): dugazungs kyi sgo rnams bsas kyis kyi khyab dpag tum mchis pa/ zhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi byin/ sa pa lags ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
321a6('bum): stobs pa cu bams kyis kyi thub dpag tum mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myi 'jigs pa bzhi bsas kyis kyi khyab dpag tum mas
321a7('bum): gzhas rnam mchis shing // khyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slang du khams kyis kyi khyab dpag dum mchis kAnas nus mchis shing / bdangam
321a8('bum): bamyi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du byams pa chen po bsas gyis kyi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal dus mchis shing phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du snying rjechen
321b1('bum): bsam gyis kyi khyab dpag tus mchis gnas du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam bgyi dbyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos sa 'dres pa bcwo brgyad pasam gyis kyi bya ba dpag tu ma ma
321b2('bum): gzhal dum mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsas kyis myi ba dpag tu ma mchis gzham du ma mchis shing / phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam
321b3('bum): ba myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
321b4('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i bras bu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyig/ sa pa lags/ ci'i slad du gra bcom pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab
321b5('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi myigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang byang chub bsam rgya sa myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam
321b6('bum): ba dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du
321b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/
322a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor nga gzugs la yang /
322a2('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnye dang nyi phyi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyig so/ rab 'byor nga 'du shes la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad
322a3('bum): dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga 'du byed la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa
322a4('bum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dmyig la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rna ba la yang
322a5('bum): bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga sna la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnye ba dang myinyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor
322a6('bum): lce la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da sum la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da yid
322a7('bum): la yang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga gzugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so//
322a8('bum): rab 'byor da smra la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myinyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da dI la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor
322b1('bum): ro la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga reg la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dachos
322b2('bum): la yang bsam pa dang dpag dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor/ myig gi rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so
322b3('bum): rab 'byor da rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da sna'i rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad pa dang mnyam pa dang
322b4('bum): myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da lce'i 'arnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da lus kyi rnam par
322b5('bum): shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par ro/ sa pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
322b6('bum): ba myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dmyig gi 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la la yang bsam pa
322b7('bum): dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da lce'i
322b8('bum): 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam
323a1('bum): ba myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga yid kyi 'dus te reg pa' la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dmyig gi 'dus te/
323a2('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad
323a3('bum): mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da lce'i
323a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'a bsam pa dang / dag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa spyi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la
323a5('bum): yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi ma nyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da yid kyi 'dus te ren/ pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
323a6('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da sa'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga chu'i khams la
323a7('bum): yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dmye'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam gyi gyigs 'o// rab 'byorapa
323a8('bum): rlung gi khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang /
323b1('bum): myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de rnam par shes pa'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang phyi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dam rig pa la yang bsam pa dang /
323b2('bum): dpag pa dang tsha dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga 'du byed la yang bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de rnam par shes pa
323b3('bum): la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da mying dang gzugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/
323b4('bum): rab 'byor de skye mched drug la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tsha/ da dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor/ rang reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam/
323b5('bum): ba dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga sred pa la yang bas
323b6('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da lend pa la yang bsam pa dang dpags pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga srid
323b7('bum): pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigasorab 'byor de skye ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs sor khyor ga/ shi la yang
323b8('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyig/
324a1('bum): rab 'byor nga tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la
324a2('bum): yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so//
324a3('bum): rab 'byor nga bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
324a4('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor/ nang stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam/ pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da phyi stong pa nyid
324a5('bum): la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da phyi nang tong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang da pag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so//
324a6('bum): rab 'byor da tong ba nyid stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de chen po stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi
324a7('bum): myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang /
324a8('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor
324b1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dade thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang /
324b2('bum): myi mnyam pa myi myigs so// rab 'byor nga dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag
324b3('bum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnye ba myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rang gi mtshan nyid
324b4('bum): stong pa nyid la yang bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang / myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da myi dmyigs pa hong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
324b5('bum): myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da dngos po myed pa 'o/ nga pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa/ dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga ngo bo nyid
324b6('bum): stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga dran pa nye bar ga/ zhag pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshang
324b7('bum): dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa/
324b8('bum): rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dbang po rnams sa yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so//
325a1('bum): rab 'byor nga stobs rnams la yang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag
325a2('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang / myi mnyam pa myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa gyi dmyigs so/
325a3('bum): rab 'byor da 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de bsam gtan rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
325a4('bum): ba dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da tshad myed pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
325a5('bum): rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyig so// rab 'byor de rnam par tha rad pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi myigs so
325a6('bum): rab 'byor da mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de rnam par tha radad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
325a7('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da mngon par shes pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad
325a8('bum): dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da ting nge 'dzind rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang kyi mnyam pa gyi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ya
325b1('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so//
325b2('bum): rab 'byor ba gyi 'jigs pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang mad dang mnyam pa dang kyi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor mos yang dag par rig pa rnams la yang bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshadang/
325b3('bum): mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dbyams pa chen po la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga snying rje chen po la yang bas
325b4('bum): ba dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyig/ so// rab 'byor de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi
325b5('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byor da rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bra/ sa bu la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang / myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da la nad cig phyir 'ong
325b6('bum): pa'i 'bras bu la yang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang tshad dang mnya
325b7('bum): pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rang byang chub la yang bsam pa dang
325b8('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ nga khyod dpa
326a1('bum): la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi
326a2('bum): mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs bsags/ ci'i slad du 'du shes la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
326a3('bum): kyi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnya
326a4('bum): ba dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myig la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam ba myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba la bsam pa dang
326a5('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du sna la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce la bsam pa dang dpag/
326a6('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs lags ci'i slad du lus la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid la bsam
326a7('bum): ba dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags// ci'i slad du gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi nyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
326a8('bum): sma la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dri la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
326b1('bum): du ro la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du/
326b2('bum): chos la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa
326b3('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi nyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
326b4('bum): ba dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang / myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi rnam
326b5('bum): par shes pa'i la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam par myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang /
326b6('bum): ba myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myig gi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam
326b7('bum): ba dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs 'phags ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg
326b8('bum): pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myaM dmyigs pa lags/ 6 a sams ka 'das ta ngag la la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang ma sa nyam pa 'am
326'a1('bum): pa la bsam pa dbang paga' ba dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang me mnyam pa ma lags pa lags / ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi
326'a2('bum): dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
326'a3('bum): ba dang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi
326'a4('bum): dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen da kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang / myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus
326'a5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la bsam pa
326'a6('bum): dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa
326'a7('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du sa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chu'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang /
326'a8('bum): myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mye'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rlung gi khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
326'b1('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nam mkha'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa sags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes
326'b2('bum): pa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ma rig pa la bsam pa dang dpag par tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad
326'b3('bum): du 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs la lags ci'i slad
326'b4('bum): du mying dang gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam ba dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du skye mched du ga la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam/
326'b5('bum): ba myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du reg pa la dpag pa dang tshadadang mnyam b+he dang myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshar ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang rmyi
326'b6('bum): mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sred pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lend pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
326'b7('bum): mnyam pa dang phyi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du srid pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam bu dang kyi dbyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sme ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
326'b8('bum): dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gshi la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lagasaci'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol/
327a1('bum): tu byind pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myinyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'azod pa pha rol tu phyind pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam/
327a2('bum): ba dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan
327a3('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
327a4('bum): dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang phyi mnyam dang myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du phyi hong pa nyid la
327a5('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi nang stong pa nyid la bas ma ba dang dpag dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyig
327a6('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chen po stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
327a7('bum): pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du don dam pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa
327a8('bum): nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyig pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus ma byas tong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyig pa lags ci'i
327b1('bum): slad du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
327b2('bum): chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa gyi phyogs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang bzhin
327b3('bum): stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi
327b4('bum): dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pamyi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myi dmyigs pa stong pa
327b5('bum): nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam ba myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang /
327b6('bum): myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
327b7('bum): pa nyid la bsas pa dang dpag pa dang cad dang mnyam pa dang kyi mnyam pa gyi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i srang bu da pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bsas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang phyin/
327b8('bum): ba myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la
328a1('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa kyi byig ci'i slad du dbang po rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags
328a2('bum): ci'i slad du stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang
328a3('bum): myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du 'phag
328a4('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam pa/ tan rnams la bsam pa dbang pag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
328a5('bum): myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshad myed pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du gzugs myed
328a6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi nyam
328a7('bum): ba myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam gyi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar
328a8('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// ci'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams la bas
328b1('bum): ba dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang kyi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad/
328b2('bum): du gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
328b3('bum): myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myi 'jigs pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la
328b4('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyi gas pa lags/ ci'i slad du byams pa chen po la bsam pa/ dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs
328b5('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang dpag/ pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa sngo brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag
328b6('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du lan
328b7('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyir myi 'ong ba'in yul bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa
328b8('bum): myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dgra btsob nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi nyam pagyi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa
329a1('bum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags
329a2('bum): ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor da gzug
329a3('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa he/ de'i phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang
329a4('bum): tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi byab dpag tu myed gzhal du mye nga la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshor ba la bas ma pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyin
329a5('bum): rab 'byor nga 'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khya ba dpag tu mye da gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du shes la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnya
329a6('bum): ba dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag dang tshad dang /
329a7('bum): mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da rna bar shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam
329a8('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dmyig gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis kyi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myig
329b1('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor darna ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba la
329b2('bum): ba dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga sna'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhan myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna la bsam pa dang dpag
329b3('bum): pa dang cang dang mnyas pa dang phyi mnyam pa gyi dbyigs so// rab 'byor nga lce'i ngo bo nyid bsam kyis phyi khya ba dpag tu myed gzhas du skyedas kyi mnyam samanyam pas/ de'i phyir skye la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang rjo/
329b4('bum): dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga lu sa kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus la bsam pa dang dpag
329b5('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da yid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhas du ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid la bsam pa dang
329b6('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs
329b7('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga smra'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sprul
329b8('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor du dri'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dri
329b9('bum): pa ba ga pa da 'dang mnyam pa dang mam pa sa/ 'byor do na che ma nying pasas rgyas rtsom ga med gnas zem
330a1('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de re'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir re/
330a2('bum): sa bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da chos kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chos la
330a3('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dmyig gi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa /
330a4('bum): de'i phyir myig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor darna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab
330a5('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa sa de'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor
330a6('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam
330a7('bum): ba myi myigs so// rab 'byor da sde'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang
330a8('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang gyi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu phyed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa he/ de'i
330b1('bum): phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpan par nga chang dang mnyam pa dang phyi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed/
330b2('bum): myi mnyam pa dngas tu de'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang rmad dang mnyam pa dang phyi mnyam pa kyi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dbyig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam kyis kyi khyab dngag
330b3('bum): tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa he/ de'i phyir myig gi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor ngarna ba'i 'dus te reg ni
330b4('bum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa he/ de'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa' la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi nyam
330b5('bum): ba myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rnga bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang nya ba nyi de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam
330b6('bum): ba dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam kyis kyi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de
330b7('bum): phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa' la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam kyis kyi khyab/ dpag tu myed
330b8('bum): gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa mnyam pa de/ de'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da yid kyi 'dus te/
331a1('bum): reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
331a2('bum): myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dmyig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myig gi
331a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor darna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab
331a4('bum): dpag tu myed gzhas du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bsam ba dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam bgyid gyim
331a5('bum): rab 'byor da sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bam dza/ nyid thasas gyis kyi thub dpag tu myed gnas tu byed sa kyis ma ba dang mnyam pa te/ de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa
331a6('bum): rkye nad kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
331a7('bum): du myed pa la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa te/ de'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga lus kyi 'dus
331a8('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag dang chad/
331b1('bum): dang mnyam pa dang myi lanyas ba kyi dmyigs so rab 'byor nga yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te re
331b2('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshong ba sa thamam pa dang dpag pa dang ca dang mnyam pa dang gyinyam pa myi dbyigs so// rab 'byor dpa'i khams kyi ro ba nyid bsas kyis kyi thub dpag tu byed gzhas du skyedas kyi mnyam pa dang
331b3('bum): bste/ de'i phyir sa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga chu'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa
331b4('bum): // ro'i phyi bu'i khamasas byas da ga na paso/ darang kyi'i 'ams myong ba nyid mas kyis kyi byab dngas tu byed pas
331b5('bum): du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mye'i khams la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam ba myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid
331b6('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du byed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rlung gi khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de nam
331b7('bum): mkha'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir nam mkha'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyis
331b8('bum): rab 'byor de rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnye
332a1('bum): pa dang kyi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dam rig pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhas du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ma rig pa la bsam
332a2('bum): ba dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam
332a3('bum): ba dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes
332a4('bum): pa' la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da mying dang gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam
332a5('bum): ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mying dang gzugs la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyig/ sa so// rab 'byor de skye mched drug gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
332a6('bum): myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir skye mched drug la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da reg pa'i ngo bo nyid
332a7('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mi de'i phyir reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
332a8('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga sred pa'i
332b1('bum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sred pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor
332b2('bum): le nad pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyeb nye de'i phyir lend pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorapa
332b3('bum): srid pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir srid pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab
332b4('bum): 'byor da skye ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa mnya la/ de'i phyir skye ba la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyig so//
332b5('bum): rab 'byor da rga shi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed pa zhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ de'i phyir \u0f7f/ shi la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi
332b6('bum): mnyam pa myi dmyigaso// rab 'byor de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed ka zhal du myed la myi mnyam pa mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
332b7('bum): pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi
332b8('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin ji
333a1('bum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi
333a2('bum): mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
333a3('bum): tu phyind pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la
333a4('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam ba dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de shes rab
333a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed ka zhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa
333a6('bum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi nyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khya ba dpag tu myed ka zhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir
333a7('bum): nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dpyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang
333a8('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyi nyos pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi nyas pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor daphyi nang tong pa nyid bo nyid bsam gyis myi khya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed
333b1('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa te/ de'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis kyi
333b2('bum): bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa he/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de chen
333b3('bum): po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab/ dpag tu myed gzhal du byed la myi mnyam pa da 9/ de'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so//
333b4('bum): rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi byab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad
333b5('bum): dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byo rang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dang / ga tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i
333b6('bum): phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed
333b7('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bas
333b8('bum): gyis myi khyab/ dpag tu myed gzhal du myedapa myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so//
334a1('bum): rab 'byor da thog ma dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la
334a2('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da dror pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu skyed gzhal du myed pa myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
334a3('bum): pa ste/ de'i phyir dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
334a4('bum): gzhas du skyed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'iphyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam kyi byig sa rab 'byor chos thams
334a5('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du sbed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sa thams cad stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang /
334a6('bum): mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid
334a7('bum): stong sa nyid la brtsam pa dang dpag pa dang cad dang mnyam pa dang kyis nyam pa kyi dbyigs so/ rab 'byor gyi dmyigs pa nga pa nyid kyi ba nyid bams kyis kyi khyab dadrug tu byed gnas du skyedas kyisanya
334a8('bum): ba dang mnyam pa nye/ rgya mnyam pa dang sanyas/ de'i phyir myi dmyigs pa tshong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang phyi mnyam pa mye dmyog mo 'byi dngom pa myed ma
334b1('bum): pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyin
334b2('bum): rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa te/ de'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang cha dang mnyam pa dang /
334b3('bum): mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba ni phyi bo lji ba'i gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa te de'i phyir dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bas
334b4('bum): ba dang dpag par nga chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dpyi gas so// rab 'byor nga dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas sa kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis kyi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed
334b5('bum): la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dran pa nye bar bya zhag pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam ba dang phyi mnye ba myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de yang dag
334b6('bum): bar spong ba rnams gyung ba nyid bsas kyis kyi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du skyed pa myi mnyam la dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang /

334b8('bum): la bams pa dang dpag pa dang cad dang mnyam pa dang byi ma nyam pagyi myigs so/ rang 'byor dbang po rnams kyi nga tsha nyid bsas kyis kyi khyab da tu byed gnas du byed sa phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam partse/
335a1('bum): xxx
335a2('bum): sa kyi mnyam pa dang mnyam bgyi/ de'i phyir nyobs rnams sa bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang phyi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bams kyi
335a3('bum): myi khyab dag/ myed gzhas du byed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa he/ de'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da 'phags
335a4('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsam pa/
335a5('bum): dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs rab 'byor da 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam kyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang
335a6('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab
335a7('bum): tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bsam gtan rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyig so// rab 'byor nga tshad myed pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
335a8('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnya ba ste/ de'i phyir tshad myed pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga gzugs myed kyi
335b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam kyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa
335b2('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rnam par thard pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par thar
335b3('bum): pa brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du/
335b4('bum): myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mthar kyi sa gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dgu la bsam pa dang dang dag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/
335b5('bum): rab 'byor nga rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis kyi / bdapag tu myed gzham du byedas myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
335b6('bum): de'i phyir rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de mngon par shes pa rnas
335b7('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mngon par shes pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor
335b8('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsas kyis kyi byib dpag tu myed gzhal du byed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa te/ de'i phyir ting nge 'dzind rnams sa bsas pa dang dpag pa dang ra dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pagyi
336a1('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byor de gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa dang
336a2('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
336a3('bum): de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
336a4('bum): du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myi 'jigs pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang / myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor so so yang dag par
336a5('bum): rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam kyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzha la du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir/ so so/ yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad
336a6('bum): dang mnyam pa dang phyi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ rab 'byor dbyams pa chen po'i ngobo nyid bsas kyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzham du byed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam paci/ de'i phyir byams pa chen po ma thams
336a7('bum): dang bag pa dang cad dang mnyas pa dang phyis nyam pagyi myigs so// rab 'byor shing chen za thon nyid bsas kyis kyi bya ba dpag tu skye gzhas du byed pa kyis nyas pa / de phyir dus
336a8('bum): mol rnams pa dang dpag pa dang cad dang mnyam pa dang phyi mnyam pa phyi myigs so// rab 'byor da sangs rgyas gyochomo ma 'dres pa 'on brgyad tu ngo bo nyid thams kyis kyi khyas dpag tu byed gnas brtse
336b1('bum): myi mnye ba dang mnyam pa he/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rgyu nad du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo
336b2('bum): nyid bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so//
336b3('bum): rab 'byor da la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag
336b4('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi// khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste
336b5('bum): de'i phyir phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyis so// rab 'byo rang dgra bcom pa nyid ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
336b6('bum): gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid bsam
336b7('bum): kyis kyi bya ba dpag tu ste ka' sa du byed la myi mnyas pa dang mnyas pa ste/ de'i phyir rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang cad dang mnyam pa dang kyi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor ngasam
336b8('bum): byinam bshes pa nyid kyi ba nyid posam gyis kyi byab dpag tu byed gzhal du myed la phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam paste/ de'i phyir las kyi rnam pashes pa nyid ma phamam pa dang dpag pa dang da dang
337a1('bum): mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam bu dang mnyam pa che/ de'i phyir
337a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so//
337a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa stong phrag brgyab/ bam po // rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs gang bsam/
337a4('bum): phyis kyi byab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa te/ myi mnyam ba dang mnyam pa de la gzugs dmyigs su yod dam/ tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du byed pa
337a5('bum): phyi mnyam pa dang nyas pa de sa tshor ba myigs pa yong dang / 'du zhes gang bams kyis kyi khya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du byed pa nyi bye mnyas pa dang mnyam pa des 'du shes dmyigs su so dadam
337a6('bum): byed gang bams kyis kyi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa te/ phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du byed dmyigs su yod dam / rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu byed gzhas du
337a7('bum): khyod pa rtse/ phyi mnyas pa dang sa nyam pa sarnam par shes par myigs su yod das/ phyog gang bas kyis kyi khyab dpag tu byed gnas du byed pa te/ gyi mnyas pa kyis pa de markyen
337b1('bum): dmyigs su yod dam/ rna ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa des rna ba dmyigs su yod dam/ sna gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du
337b2('bum): myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna dmyigs su yod dam/ lce gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce dmyigs su yod dam/ sus
337b3('bum): gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus dmyigs su yod dam/ yang gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myad gzhal du myang pa ha/ mya mnyam pa dang /
337b4('bum): mnyam pa da la lus dmyagasu yang dag yid gang bsam gyis myi bya/ pa dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam ba de la yid dmyigs su yod dam/ gzugs
337b5('bum): gang bsam gyis myi khya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gzugs dmyigs su yod dam/ sgra gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
337b6('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sgra dmyigs su yod dam/ dri gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa kyi nyas dmanyam pa de la dri dmyigs su yod dam/ ro gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
337b7('bum): kyi dga'as du byed pa mnyam pa dang mnyas 'dres ni dmyigs su mdo ngam/ reg gang bsam kyis kyi byab dpag tu myed gnas du myong ba te/ kyimanyas pa dang mnyas pa des rag myigs
337b8('bum): su yod dam/ chos gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa te/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chos dmyigs su song dam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa gang bsam kyis myi byas

339b2('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sred pa dmyigs su yod dam/ lend pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
339b3('bum): de la lend pa dmyigs su yod dam/ srid pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la srid pa dmyigs su yod dam/ skye ba gang bsam gyis
339b4('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam ba dang mnyam pa de la skye ba dmyigs su yod dam/ rga shi gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/

339b6('bum): smin pa'i pha ro lang tu phyind pa dasdigs su yod das/ tshul khrims kyi pha ros tu phyind pa gang bsas kyis kyi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pas/ kyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa des num
339b7('bum): mas kyi pha rol tu phyirang pa dmyigs su yo dam / bzod pa'i pharo yang tu phyin pa gang bsas kyis kyi khya ba dpag tu myed gnas du byed pa / mnyam pa dngas nyas pa des bzod pa'i
339b8('bum): ro la tu phyind pa dmyigs su yod dam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang bsam kyis kyi khyab dpag tu myed gzhas du byed pa ci/ myi mnyam pa mnyam pa da ma brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
340a1('bum): tu phyind pa dmyigs su yod dam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol
340a2('bum): tu phyind pa dmyigs su yod dam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su yod de
340a3('bum): nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi bya ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ phyi stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhan

340b7('bum): byeng gnas du myed pa / myi mnyas pa dang mnyam pa des das phyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ ngobo nyid stong pa nyid gang bams kyis rgya rgyab dpag tu byed gnas du byed pa /

341a1('bum): de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang bsam kyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa / pa de dag la dran pa nye bar
